column3: RFX - John Lewis PLC - My Work App - Sporadic behaviour within Comment Section on Walks (iPad) | 23858717
column7:
Hello Team

On IOS iPads we are experening an issue on inputting and removing text from the 'Comments' section.  I have attached 2 videos of this occring.  
You can test this yourself within 555 on the walk called Div Walk.  The issue only persists when you try to delete a word.
column17: Issue: In MyWork v25.9.0, users are unable to alter the content of a comment as intended because the cursor position of the TextField is reset after each change.
column21: Provided a proper code fix that before every text change, we recalculate the cursor position and assign the same position after changes.
column24:
Mobility side code changes are completed. Please validate with the latest version of the Mobile app. 26.1.0.



Issue: In MyWork v25.9.0, users are unable to alter the content of a comment as intended because the cursor position of the TextField is reset after each change.

We are assigning a new value after replacing the bullet Unicode characters
text.replaceAll('\uF0A7', '•').replaceAll('\uF076', '•').replaceAll('\uF0D8', '•').replaceAll('\uF0FC', '•');
This will always reset the cursor position to the end of the text. This creates a poor user experience.

Solution: Before every text change, we recalculate the cursor position and assign the same position after changes.

CC: [~SS2200]
column25:
Mobility side code changes are completed. Please validate with the latest version of the Mobile app. 26.1.0.

Issue: In MyWork v25.9.0, users are unable to alter the content of a comment as intended because the cursor position of the TextField is reset after each change.

We are assigning a new value after replacing the bullet Unicode characters
text.replaceAll('\uF0A7', '•').replaceAll('\uF076', '•').replaceAll('\uF0D8', '•').replaceAll('\uF0FC', '•');
This will always reset the cursor position to the end of the text. This creates a poor user experience.

Solution: Before every text change, we recalculate the cursor position and assign the same position after changes.

CC: Sopnil Shinde

column3: Comment box within store walk glitches
column7:
Comment box within store walk glitches when trying to edit text in a previous paragraph.  It does not let you edit or add any text, instead of moves the curser to the end of the text box. 

Issue appears on both iPhone and Android phones, tested on the following devices: 

iPhone 11 on iOS 18.6.2 with MyWork 25.9.1.2 
iPhone 12 on iOS 26.0.1 with MyWork 25.9 
iPhone 17 Pro on iOS 26.0.1 
Samsung on Android 15 with MyWork version 25.9.0 

Screen record video already sent to Snehal.

column17: As part of our security enhancement measures(https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-55468), we have implemented a security header to restrict HTML content rendering from another host to our application. This measure helps prevent unauthorized content loading. But for some of the client we are using kernel url with client url. Because of that it restrict the loading of the content.
column21: Allowing the *.host domain to load the content using header “Content-Security-Policy", "frame-ancestors 'self' *.clientdomain

column11:
Validate the data extracts for both standard modules (RTM, SWA)
Validate the data extracts for both standard modules (RTM, SWA) for multiple iterations
Validate that the records in RAR_EXTRACTSTATUS are marked with completed status
Validate that the "DataExtractaValidationJob" is submitted for successful extracts
column17:
# The system utilizes two distinct RestTemplate instances for external API communication - one used for internal Zebra API calls and another for MicroStrategy APIs. While the MicroStrategy RestTemplate bean is properly configured with a unique qualifier, the "extract validation job" submission code retrieves the RestTemplate using Spring's context.getBean(Type) method, which searches for beans by type alone without considering qualifiers.
# Since both RestTemplate beans share the same type, the getBean(Type) call encounters multiple matching beans and throws a NoUniqueBeanDefinitionException. This occurs because the method cannot determine which specific RestTemplate instance to return when multiple beans of the same type exist in the application context.
# This exception prevents the normal completion flow of the extract job, causing the RAR_EXTRACTSTATUS table (which maintains the execution status of extract jobs) to remain in an incomplete state rather than updating to "completed." The unresolved status creates a cascading effect where subsequent extract job executions encounter conflicts or validation failures, as the system incorrectly perceives previous jobs as still running or in an unknown state.
column21:
Added "primary" annotation for default resttemplate beans.
	Updated code to mark the "extract records with pending status beyond the allowed time" to error status.
column24:
CC: [~NT8452], [~PK3866], [~RI1188]

*Code fix versions*
 # [TASK-25.9.1.5|https://confluence.zebra.com/x/QAdkP]
 # [TASK-25.9.2.2|https://confluence.zebra.com/x/LgtXP]

*Root cause*
 * The system utilizes two distinct RestTemplate instances/beans for external API communication - one used for internal Zebra API calls and another for MicroStrategy APIs. While the MicroStrategy RestTemplate bean is properly configured with a unique qualifier, the "extract validation job" submission code retrieves the RestTemplate using Spring's {{context.getBean(Type)}} method, which searches for beans by type alone without considering qualifiers.
 * Since both RestTemplate beans share the same type, the {{getBean(Type)}} call encounters multiple matching beans and throws a {{{}NoUniqueBeanDefinitionException{}}}. This occurs because the method cannot determine which specific RestTemplate instance to return when multiple beans of the same type exist in the application context.
 * This exception prevents the normal completion flow of the extract job, causing the RAR_EXTRACTSTATUS table (which maintains the execution status of extract jobs) to remain in an incomplete state rather than updating to "completed." The unresolved status creates a cascading effect where subsequent extract job executions encounter conflicts or validation failures, as the system incorrectly perceives previous jobs as still running or in an unknown state.

*Corrective action*
 # Added "primary" annotation for default resttemplate beans.
 # Update code to mark the "extract records with pending status beyond the allowed time" to error status.

*Workaround*
[~HS8798] [~SG7981]  As confirmed in chat, I see that L2 is already correcting the RAR_EXTRACTSTATUS records. For reference I have added [Workaround for TM-60056|https://confluence.zebra.com/x/ZgtXP]. Please let me know if you have any questions.

*QA*
[~AV6155], [~PD7505]  As discussed over the call, please update the data extract scenario to validate report extracts for at-least 2+ iterations and validate RAR_EXTRACTSTATUS records along with existing test scenarios .
column25:
CC: Naresh Tirgar, Prasad Kalyanapu, Rahul Ingle

Code fix versions

  1. TASK-25.9.1.5
  2. TASK-25.9.2.2

Root cause

  • The system utilizes two distinct RestTemplate instances/beans for external API communication - one used for internal Zebra API calls and another for MicroStrategy APIs. While the MicroStrategy RestTemplate bean is properly configured with a unique qualifier, the "extract validation job" submission code retrieves the RestTemplate using Spring's context.getBean(Type) method, which searches for beans by type alone without considering qualifiers.
  • Since both RestTemplate beans share the same type, the getBean(Type) call encounters multiple matching beans and throws a NoUniqueBeanDefinitionException. This occurs because the method cannot determine which specific RestTemplate instance to return when multiple beans of the same type exist in the application context.
  • This exception prevents the normal completion flow of the extract job, causing the RAR_EXTRACTSTATUS table (which maintains the execution status of extract jobs) to remain in an incomplete state rather than updating to "completed." The unresolved status creates a cascading effect where subsequent extract job executions encounter conflicts or validation failures, as the system incorrectly perceives previous jobs as still running or in an unknown state.

Corrective action

  1. Added "primary" annotation for default resttemplate beans.
  2. Update code to mark the "extract records with pending status beyond the allowed time" to error status.

Workaround
Harsha Sutaone Shandilya Gade  As confirmed in chat, I see that L2 is already correcting the RAR_EXTRACTSTATUS records. For reference I have added Workaround for TM-60056. Please let me know if you have any questions.

QA
Abhay Vijay Patil, Pooja Doshi  As discussed over the call, please update the data extract scenario to validate report extracts for at-least 2+ iterations and validate RAR_EXTRACTSTATUS records along with existing test scenarios .

QR code for environment is attached. Note that this app is geo-fenced for an upcoming demo so you will have to update the geocodes to your location when trying to replicate.

column3: Unable to add minus while doing tasks. Issue with Mobility app
column7:
Hi,

In Legionella and Delivery temperatures checks all stores are not able to put - figure in the temperature field, instead it is putting a . (dot) which is falsifying the information and checks as temperatures need to be within a certain range.

The issue has started since the production upgrade and is happening on mobile devices (tablet, PDA), back office is fine.

There is no way to correct any incorrectly added/submitted forms. 

Please can this be looked into urgently as this is affecting all the stores. 

Also, I have a recording that a store sent which I am not able to attach to the ticket. Only PDF, JPG and JPEG are allowed to be attached?

I will send it to Shruti in an email for reference.

Thanks,
Veena

column3: RFX - BP International Limited - BP-CL26-US-PR- Product Recall Watch Reports did not Run for Recall Generated 10/10/25 | 23821007
column7:
We had a product recall come across in Reflexis that required hourly emails be sent to our Region Managers. Once the project was generated, we found that the hourly reports were not sending. We can confirm that none of the affected Region Managers received the Watch Report that should be sent automatically. I am attaching an image of the affected project as well as proof of the jobs failing from the administration console in Cognos. Please let me know if there is anything else I can provide.

We need this to work as soon as possible. We appreciate the effort.

Thanks, Leah

column17:
In MongoDB, we use GridFS file storage system which stores the checksum as hexadecimal.
In Google Cloud storage, we are using CRC32C which is a Base64-encoded 32-bit checksum.
From mobility side we were checking base64 format only.
column21: Fix: Now we are checking both base64 and hex formats for x-md5-hash header.
column24:
Hi team,

[~SC8885] 

Based on previous comments, it seems like the environment PULSE EMEAPARTNER01 stores files in MongoDB itself. Note that:
 * In MongoDB, we use GridFS file storage system which stores the checksum as *hexadecimal.*
 * In Google Cloud storage, we are using CRC32C which is a *Base64-encoded* 32-bit checksum.

Cc: [~NP5386]
column25:
Hi team,

Shubhangi Chavan 

Based on previous comments, it seems like the environment PULSE EMEAPARTNER01 stores files in MongoDB itself. Note that:

  • In MongoDB, we use GridFS file storage system which stores the checksum as hexadecimal.
  • In Google Cloud storage, we are using CRC32C which is a Base64-encoded 32-bit checksum.

Cc: Nilesh Pawar

column3: Filter goes to wrong menu
column7: See attached, when you press 'Recurring' it switches to 'Distribution' tab, expectancy would be the 'Schedule' menu that is now visible
column17: When we click on Recurring check box it is redirecting to the checklist tab rather than schedule.
column21: If we've switched to recurring due to a user interaction, delay the emit to allow the click event to finish processing in parent components. This prevents immediate UI navigation that would happen if the parent reacts synchronously to the Emit.
column24:
*Code Review Done* – Yes

*Impact* – When we click on Recurring check box it is redirecting to the checklist tab, and for other checkbox it is working Fine.

*Code changes -*

If we've switched to recurring due to a user interaction, delay the emit to allow the click event to finish processing in parent components. This prevents immediate UI navigation that would happen if the parent reacts synchronously to the Emit.
 

*Test* *Case* *–*

Verify it should not redirect to the other tab when we click on recurring.
Verify it should not redirect to the other tab when we click on Immediate.
Verify it should not redirect to the other tab when we click on Schedule.
Verify Schedule tab is visible after click on recurring tab.

column17: The issue occurs because the DELETE_ROLLOUT_FUNCTION function used in AuthorizationDefinition for the "rflx/rtm/miniform/deleteRollout" API doesn't include the required permission of Simple Project.
column21: MAP_SINGLE_STEP was added to CREATE_ROLLOUT_FUNCTION and DELETE_ROLLOUT_FUNCTION in RestApiAuthConstants to align required permissions for delete rollout operations.

column3: Unit_status does not sync to kernel for Unit close
column7: Unit_status does not sync to kernel for Unit close
column17: RWS is the only client that does not have the ORG data load feature from UI.
column21: Provide proper information to the client
column24:
As mentioned in my earlier comment, the *Kernel → Org → Data Load* feature requires a {*}TM license{*}. This functionality is specifically designed and developed to support *RTM data loads* only.

For {*}RWS{*}, data loads must be performed using the {*}RWS Admin screens{*}. Even if a domain has both *RWS* and *TM licenses* (e.g., [https://wfmproductqa04.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/REFLEXIS20.view]), users are required to upload *ROS data loads* (such as Unit, Dept, Unit Status, etc.) separately in both *ORG* and {*}RWS systems{*}.

Please note that *TM ROS data loads* uploaded via the *ORG module* are *not synchronized* with the {*}RWS modules{*}. Let’s schedule a quick call if you still have any confusion regarding this process.
h3. Breakdown of Scenarios:
 * *Case 1: RWS-only license (e.g., 23pp)*
ROS data loads must be completed in the {*}RWS screen{*}, as *ORG screens* are not applicable for this domain/user.
 * *Case 2: RTM-only license*
ROS data loads must be completed in the {*}ORG screen{*}.
 * *Case 3: RWS and RTM licenses (e.g., wfmproductqa - REFLEXIS20)*
ROS data loads must be performed in {*}both RWS and ORG screens{*}.

Let me know if you need further clarification or assistance!

 

CC: [~ML2529]  [~SS2200]
column25:
As mentioned in my earlier comment, the Kernel → Org → Data Load feature requires a TM license. This functionality is specifically designed and developed to support RTM data loads only.

For RWS, data loads must be performed using the RWS Admin screens. Even if a domain has both RWS and TM licenses (e.g., https://wfmproductqa04.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/REFLEXIS20.view), users are required to upload ROS data loads (such as Unit, Dept, Unit Status, etc.) separately in both ORG and RWS systems.

Please note that TM ROS data loads uploaded via the ORG module are not synchronized with the RWS modules. Let’s schedule a quick call if you still have any confusion regarding this process.

Breakdown of Scenarios:

  • Case 1: RWS-only license (e.g., 23pp)
    ROS data loads must be completed in the RWS screen, as ORG screens are not applicable for this domain/user.
  • Case 2: RTM-only license
    ROS data loads must be completed in the ORG screen.
  • Case 3: RWS and RTM licenses (e.g., wfmproductqa - REFLEXIS20)
    ROS data loads must be performed in both RWS and ORG screens.

Let me know if you need further clarification or assistance!

 

CC: Mamidi Lakshmi Ranganath  Sopnil Shinde

column3: Loop PP: Skip-based attributes are not working
column7:
This is a ticket for a Partner IMPL**
Hello,
I am trying to build a walk using the skip based attributes. Please find attached two screenshots related to the set up of the two skips I am testing this with. 
The objective is that when executing this walk, the stores that do not have the attributes Car_wash OR Fountain_unit with a value of 'Yes' should not have visibility of either of the two groups of questions. 
	
	



Example of store that do not have the Car_Wash attribute with Yes value:
STR106
Example of store that do not have the Fountain_Units attribute with Yes value but DO have the Car_Wash attribute with Yes value:
STR105
STR115

1. Log in as SYSADMIN / LOOP$y$@dm!n2274  https://looppp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/LOOP.view
2. Go to Walk templates, find walk template "Attribute based skips demo 4"
3. Go to Skips
4. See the set up of the two skips that skip one group of questions each depending of the attribute ID with value Yes. See screenshots attached.
5. Switch unit to STR106 and use Team Leader-Store as profile/dpt
6. Go to Store Walk execution
7. Find walk "Attribute based skips demo 4"
8: Expected result: That the "Carwash" group of questions should not appear when executing this walk as STR106 does not have the Car_Wash attribute mapped. 
9. Actual result: The "Carwash" group of questions does appear when executing this walk
10. Same happens when trying to test the other skip rule related to the Fountain_Units attribute. Switch unit to STR105 and Team Leader profile
12. Go to Store Walk execution
13. Find walk "Attribute based skips demo 4"
14. Expected result: The "Fountain Unit" group of question should not appear when executing this walk as STR105 does not have the Fountain_Units attribute mapped. 
15. Actual result: The "Fountain Unit" group of questions does appear when executing this walk

I've also tried to set the skips to be when "False" but then none of these two groups appear when applying that set up.
Thanks

column11: XmlProjectCreation with and without enabling "Is project schedule derived from task schedule" property.
column17: Validations added for project duration to be mandatory, but it will not be mandatory if "Is project schedule derived from task schedule" property is enabled
column21: Removed the validations temporarily. Validations will be added again after analyzing client usage.
column25:
I've suggested Victor to use the below updated version to communicate to Ahold 

 

In 25.8, the system introduced a new validation that required both the Project Start Date (P_STDT ) and End Date elements (<P_FINDT>) to be present in all submitted XML files.As a result , XML files which did not contain those tags were affected. In case of Hannaford , this affected the Online Orders project creation. XML files for Offline Scale Alerts had start & end date tags and they were processed successfully. To resolve this, the validation process has been improved to handle the missing tags case.

From: Salaskar, Akshat akshat.salaskar@zebra.com> 
Sent: 19 September 2025 13:50
To: Khude, Pooja pooja.khude@zebra.com>; *RFX-RNOC RFXrnoc@zebra.com>; RFX-Middleware.Deployments RFXMiddleware.Deployments@zebra.com>
Cc: *RFX-ATL NetOps RFXnetops@zebra.com>
Subject: Re: Z182SP-CVSDCRWSPRWAS01 System - Disk Usage - /mount critical

 

@*RFX-RNOC

 

We have deleted the logs and reduced the mount disk usage to below the threshold level. Please continue to monitor this alert, as the job is still running and the middleware will continue to clear files. If the alert reoccurs, please contact the applicable on-call person.

 

The space is being rapidly occupied because the log level is set to debug. We need a script to update the log level and restart the WFM JVMs.

 

@RFX-Middleware.Deployments, please use the following command to clear the files:

 

find /mount/RWS4/appuploads/upload/logs/SCHEDULE -type f -mtime +3 -print -delete

 

 

Kind Regards,

Akshat

column3: RFX - James Hall and Co Ltd - TM - G&E Harington Road Buffering Issue between 8-9am | 23544002
column7:
Hi,

Since Friday our G&E Harington Road store have reported issues with mobile devices in store that are not operational between 8-9am. The devices are buffering on all tasks, particularly bad between 8-8:30am. As an example it has nearly taken 3 minutes to upload a photo. After this time service resumes as normal. We have since had two other stores report the issue, Bluebell Way and Lowther Street. We have had similar issues to this in the past with system delays during certain periods, this was due to other customers launching a high number of tasks at that time. Please can this be investigated.

Steph

Author: Prasad Kalyanapu

column3: Security of Unsanitized HTML in Zebra Rendering Engine
column7:
Our current process reads the text/html body of the email and escapes the HTML using Python's xml.sax.saxutils library before sending it to Zebra. However, to maintain the original email formatting, we are not performing any further sanitization to strip out potentially active or malicious content.

While we've found that the content renders correctly on Zebra UI, as part of our security architecture we would like to understand how your platform handles raw HTML? 

We expect to encounter emails containing various elements, and we need to assess the risk of passing them through unmodified. Our specific concerns include:

Scripts and Active Content: (, , )

Event Handlers: (onclick, onerror, onload)

Dangerous URL schemes: (javascript:, data

Tracking Pixels and external images: ()

Forms and inputs: (, )


Could you please clarify whether Zebra employs a specific HTML sanitizer, or if your renderer is designed with a "safe-by-default" approach that only processes a limited subset of HTML/CSS tags and simply ignores unsupported (and potentially harmful) content like scripts?

I attached an example for a received email and the sent xml request to Zebra.
column11: N/A. Requested information is provided in the comments section.
column17: Information requested by customer
column21: Information provided. Please see comments
column24:
{+}If the notes are added from the notes editor{+}, while saving the notes, we check the data for any malicious contents such as javascript. We do this using kernel security. In the save notes call, we have defined the following authorization policies:  {color:#000000}{color:#2a00ff}ACCESS,LINE_OF_SIGHT,DOMAIN,INPUT_ESCAPING,INPUT_ESCAPING_JS,PARAM_REWRITE,XSS_1{color}{color}

Using these policies, kernel blocks the request if any malicious data is present in the request parameter. So if any such content is added in notes, the user will see an error while saving the notes and the notes will not be added to the project.

*However, for a project created using xml, if the notes are added in R_NOTES tag, we are currently not performing any sanitization.*

The notes will be added to the project as is, but while performing any actions on such projects on the UI such as edit, copy, opening summary etc. the request params will be scanned for the malicious data and if found, the request will not be processed.

cc: [~RS7567], [~NG5443]
column25:
If the notes are added from the notes editor, while saving the notes, we check the data for any malicious contents such as javascript. We do this using kernel security. In the save notes call, we have defined the following authorization policies:  ACCESS,LINE_OF_SIGHT,DOMAIN,INPUT_ESCAPING,INPUT_ESCAPING_JS,PARAM_REWRITE,XSS_1

Using these policies, kernel blocks the request if any malicious data is present in the request parameter. So if any such content is added in notes, the user will see an error while saving the notes and the notes will not be added to the project.

However, for a project created using xml, if the notes are added in R_NOTES tag, we are currently not performing any sanitization.

The notes will be added to the project as is, but while performing any actions on such projects on the UI such as edit, copy, opening summary etc. the request params will be scanned for the malicious data and if found, the request will not be processed.

cc: Rohit Sonar, Nitin Gangad

column3: GER - RTM - error message when querying responses
column7:
Dear Support Team,
for a couple of days, admins and task authors received the following error message when they tried to retrieve responses for a task under RTM -> Field View -> View Responses

Example Firefox message: Firefox is not allowed to open this embedded page

For your protection, bpgermany.reflexissystems.de does not allow Firefox to display this page when it is embedded in another page. To view the page, it must be opened in a new tab.

Example Microsoft Edge: bpgermany.reflexissystems.de have declined the connection.

	see the attached screenshot



Please check and fix.

Many thanks in advance!

Best regards
Thomas
column11: Not able to see the response of the tm projects.
column17:
As part of our security enhancement measures(https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-55468), we have implemented a security header to restrict HTML content rendering from another host to our application. This measure helps prevent unauthorized content loading. But for some of the client we are using kernel url with client url. Because of that it restrict the loading of the content.

Duplicate issue of https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-58149

column3: Approval Queue default date
column7:
The approval queue and inbox now have a default date under the total # of projects to approve. 
Why is the default date tomorrow? Can this be changed? We will need the default date to be defined as yesterday so we do not miss any projects launched late the day prior.
Thank you,
Bridget
column24:
Hi [~AJ5718], Please find the responses for the queries below and let us know if any more information is needed.

*1) changing values this can be achieved, nevertheless when session is terminated this set is lost,*

>> System applies the default filters when any inbox is loaded. The default value for duration is last 365 days onwards. The duration can be changed by adding the feature config as explained in previous comment.

*2)* *when attempting to save filters, Initial date is fixed*

>> If we set the start date to 1 sept 2025 and end date as 30 sept 2025, and save the filter. The filter will display the projects within same duration even after 1 year. This will not be desirable behavior for saved filter. Also we cannot keep the duration filed blank while saving the filter as the filed is mandatory, so currently duration is not being saved as a part of saved filter. We can change this behavior if this is a client's ask.

*3) client would have to use first a negative value of -1 to shift to current date, and then shift back to desired value.*

>> After changing the default duration, this will not be necessary.

*4) Every time client wants to shift back, this is accumulative, IE, by default last year 2024 is set, then if 2 years back is used, then it subtracts this from 2024, so 2024 is gotten, this shift back is not from current date but from whatever value is already set in the filter*

>>The shift start date option was added to widen the search duration.

If the inbox is showing projects starting from last 365 days, it also includes the project with duration within last 90 days. So if we consider the start date to be shifted back by 3 months from current date, it will shrink the search duration instead of widening it.

User can always add more filters or specific duration to search the desirable project. Also, the default duration filter can be changed which will change the initial search duration as per the need of the client.
column25:
Hi Abhijeet Jagtap, Please find the responses for the queries below and let us know if any more information is needed.

1) changing values this can be achieved, nevertheless when session is terminated this set is lost,

>> System applies the default filters when any inbox is loaded. The default value for duration is last 365 days onwards. The duration can be changed by adding the feature config as explained in previous comment.

2) when attempting to save filters, Initial date is fixed

>> If we set the start date to 1 sept 2025 and end date as 30 sept 2025, and save the filter. The filter will display the projects within same duration even after 1 year. This will not be desirable behavior for saved filter. Also we cannot keep the duration filed blank while saving the filter as the filed is mandatory, so currently duration is not being saved as a part of saved filter. We can change this behavior if this is a client's ask.

3) client would have to use first a negative value of -1 to shift to current date, and then shift back to desired value.

>> After changing the default duration, this will not be necessary.

4) Every time client wants to shift back, this is accumulative, IE, by default last year 2024 is set, then if 2 years back is used, then it subtracts this from 2024, so 2024 is gotten, this shift back is not from current date but from whatever value is already set in the filter

>>The shift start date option was added to widen the search duration.

If the inbox is showing projects starting from last 365 days, it also includes the project with duration within last 90 days. So if we consider the start date to be shifted back by 3 months from current date, it will shrink the search duration instead of widening it.

User can always add more filters or specific duration to search the desirable project. Also, the default duration filter can be changed which will change the initial search duration as per the need of the client.

column25:
Hi Shandilya Gade,
We have multiple RAR_ROLE_D for a single ROLE_SKEY in ETL_KEY_MAP. Please execute the script below to clear the ETL_KEY_MAP for ROLE_ID in MongoDB.

db.getCollection('ETL_KEY_MAP').remove({DOMAIN_ID:121660099, "ENTITY_ID" : "RAR_ROLE_D", KEY_ID : {"$in":["TEAMMANAGER\u0005","ASTMMNGRDUTY\u0005","ACT_PLANNER,CREATORRC\u0005","TMMNGR,DTYPRTNR\u0005","DTYMNGR,TMMNGR\u0005"]}})

Also, please execute the below script in the RAR DB to update ROLE_SKEY for RAR_WALK_ROLE.
 

UPDATE RAR_WALK_ROLE SET ROLE_SKEY = 6645 WHERE DOMAIN_ID = 121660099 AND ROLE_SKEY = 25; COMMIT;

 
 
Cc: Dhanuskodi Rengasamy Dileep Guntupalli Kushalavareddy Thota

column3: CLONE - [Major Incident] RFX - Travelodge Hotels Limited - URGENT - unable to edit walk template | 23380581
column7:
As per usual practice, we need to add a hotel to the distribution list on a walk template as we have had a new hotel added to our estate. We have done this multiple times in the past. 

When trying to update this today, it is throwing an error from the questions tab; although we don't want/need a description on each question group, this is a required field and it does not let us publish the walk template without one. 

Our walk template, that we've been editing and using for the last two years or so, does not have a description, and never has. This has not thrown the error before. 

Also - in trying to get these room checks out to the hotel (critical function), the system does not even allow us to add a description. There is nothing we can do with this template to add any new hotels. 

This means the hotel (and any new hotels we open in the next few weeks) will not be able to make any hotel rooms clean on the system, meaning they will not be available to the customer. 

Ideally we need the question group description removed from a mandatory requirement. We never use it as it clutters our screens and the users get what they need to know from the group title. 

Video attached show my adding the required hotel, shows the system error and me trying to edit the question group. When I click on the field, it does not do anything, I'm guessing as it does not give me the option to edit it / fix the error! 

Please can you look at this urgently. The hotel is waiting for an answer in what they can do. Our central management will also need to be informed of this critical issue and they will need regular updates on the fix. 

Do let me know if you need any more info - I look forward to hearing from you. 

Many thanks
Iain
column11: Template Submit in Edit Mode if Group Description field  was empty.
column17:
Due to new validations introduced as part of TM-51733.
When  the Question group description is empty and user tries to edit, it fails due to the validation.
column21: To resolve this issue, we will remove the mandatory validation for the Group Description field at both the UI and backend levels. This change will allow users to submit the Walk Template even if the Group Description is empty.

Author: Raaga Vardhini

column3: v45HNMROW: Cognos, problems with namespace USER_ACTIONS and/or AUTHORIZATION
column7:
In this case we have three different problem when retrieving data from these namespaces.

Description case 1:
The user 083941 has in the system access to two different stores, but when trying to list that in a report we can not get the information about store no2. I have made a report where I use the namespace USER_ACTIONS, but I have also tried the namespace AUTHORIZATION with the same result. That report is in the same place, so you can try that too.

Steps:

1. Login to WFM as sysadmin/cognos admin

2. Navigate to Users, and search for user '083941'

3. Observe that the this user has access to store ES0191 as an additional store.

4. Now open Cognos in design mode and navigate to folder: Development / Development Reflexis. 

5. run the report 'Users Access Report USER_ACTIONS'. 

Actual Result: In the report you can only see one of the stores for user 083941.

Expected Result: That all the stores which the user has access to, should be visible in the report.





Description case 2:
The user 386114 does not have access to two stores according to the user page in the system, but in the report it shows two rows. Could it be some hidden columns in the database that stores effective/end date or something?

Steps:

1. Login to WFM as sysadmin/cognos admin

2. Navigate to Users, and search for user '386114'

3. Observe that the this user don't have access to any other store then PL0111.

4. Now open Cognos in design mode and navigate to folder: Development / Development Reflexis. 

5. run the report 'Users Access Report USER_ACTIONS'. 

Actual Result: In the report you can only see two rows with different stores for user 386114.

Expected Result: That only the store which the user has access to, should be visible in the report.




Description case 3 (maybe the same as case 2):
The user 389345 does only have one profile according to the user page in the system, but in the report it shows two rows. Could it be some hidden columns in the database that stores effective/end date or something?

Steps:

1. Login to WFM as sysadmin/cognos admin

2. Navigate to Users, and search for user '389345'

3. Observe that the this user only have one profile (PD_MGR).

4. Now open Cognos in design mode and navigate to folder: Development / Development Reflexis. 

5. run the report 'Users Access Report USER_ACTIONS'. 

Actual Result: In the report you can see two rows with different profiles for user 389345.

Expected Result: That only the correct profile for the user, should be visible in the report.

Regards /Åsa Enderlein

column3: RFX - BP International Limited - TM - Unable to download answers from the task | 23450321
column7: When I try to download the response from the task, I get the message "bp.reflexissystems.de connection refused." This is an urgent issue because I need the results of the month-end closing tasks.
column11: Not able to see and download the response.
column17:
RCA:
As part of our security enhancement measures(https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-55468), we have implemented a security header to restrict HTML content rendering from another host to our application. This measure helps prevent unauthorized content loading. But for some of the client we are using kernel url with client url. Because of that it restrict the loading of the content.
column21:
Fix:
Allowing the *.host domain to load the content using header “Content-Security-Policy", "frame-ancestors 'self' *.clientdomain”

column3: Unable to edit time sensitive projects
column7:
Example project:  AM manual temperature check - complete before 2pm
PTS: AM manual temperature check

The above project is set to repeat daily between the hours 12AM - 2PM

When I go to edit the project, there is an error message on the start date that says "Start time cannot be in the past - 12AM"

It will still let me continue, however the end time changes from 2PM to 11:59PM, please see screenshot.

Even if I go back and reselect the end time as 2PM it still reverts back to 11:59PM.

Please can this be looked into.
column11:
Please validate the following scenarios:

- Time-sensitive program project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the past. 
- Time-sensitive program project post-launch edit with start date in the past, but start time is ahead of the current time.
- Time-sensitive program project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the future. 
- Time-sensitive Fiscal and adhoc Recurring project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the past.
- Time-sensitive Fiscal and adhoc Recurring project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the future.
- Time-sensitive Fiscal and adhoc Recurring project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the future. No errors shown on landing on the project details page. The user can edit the start date and time. If the start date is shifted to today and the start time is set to the current time, the start time field will not be disabled. Also, if the user selects a start time that is before their current time, then the error will be displayed.
- In case of the task time sensitive with and without the collect duration as start days, validate the above behavior.
- Recurring time-sensitive tasks.
- Time-sensitive templates.
- Simple/compose project.
column17: This issue is a duplicate of TM-58047.

column11: Duplicate of TM-51170. This issue will be addressed as part of epic TM-46700
column17: Refer the comments
column21: Duplicate of TM-51170. This issue will be addressed as part of epic TM-46700
column25:
This issue is same as that of TM-53389

Following are the steps by which this issue will replicate

  • On creator profile, create a new project, fill basic details and click on next (keep this browser open)
  • Add notes to the project
  • On a new tab, login with approver profile, do a department search, find the created project from previous step and open it
  • Advance to the second page (notes / tasks) and modify the notes
  • Back to creator profile, add a task and rollout to the project.
  • Go back to the inbox, and open that Draft project again. Launch button will be shown, launch it.

With this steps there will not even be any error in logs and creator user will be able to launch a project without sending it to approver. 

db.getCollection("PROJECT").find({"DOMAIN_ID" : NumberLong(122050099), "PROJECT_ID" : "1830500"}); 
db.RTM_ENTITY_EVENT_HISTORY.find({"DOMAIN_ID" : NumberLong(122050099), "IDENTIFIER" : "1830500"}).sort({"EVENT_DATE_TIME" : 1});
db.getCollection("PROJECT_APPROVAL_STATUS").find({"DOMAIN_ID" : NumberLong(122050099), "PROJECT_ID" : "1830500"});

db.PROJECT_TYPE_PROPERTIES.find({"DOMAIN_ID" : NumberLong(122050099),ID:"KP"}).sort({VERSION:-1});

We checked for the users matching with last approver(R389/ADMIN) there are 4 users present in the system. Form kernel (KNL_SECURITY_AUTH_HIST) we checked that out of those 4 users during the launch of project 2 users were logging into the sytem.

db.KNL_SECURITY_USER.find({domainNo:122050099,profileIds:{$in:["ADMIN"]},deptIds:{$in:["R389"]}});

db.KNL_SECURITY_AUTH_HIST.find({domainNo:122050099,userId:{$in:["LVMX00113581","LVMX00118302","LVMX00119985","LVMX00121093"]},issuedOn:{$gt:ISODate("2025-08-28T00:00:51.342Z"),$lt:ISODate("2025-08-28T23:59:51.342Z"),}}); 

LVMX00121093 - Laura Ozolina
LVMX00118302 - Kristiana Budrevica

Currently TM creator doesn't support project creation edit collaboratively and such issue can occur. This capability will be added later as part of EPIC TM-46700.

 

Regarding the 2nd issue. In Summary under approval summary section we show only approver specific actions instead of actual post launch action taken on project like complete. Such actions are part of the Changes Summary section in summary.

Resolving.

CC: Rohit Sonar Nitin Gangad Kapil Ranade

{*}Environment{*}: 
 # [https://mwdryrun05qa.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view]
 # DR05 Global domain
 # https://knlcl01uspt.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view

*Test Version:* Task-25.9.1.0

*Summary:*
The previously reported issue regarding errors during the copying of collaboration tasks has been successfully resolved. Post-fix validation was performed across several scenarios to ensure no errors were present.

*Test Scenarios Covered:*
 # Copying the collaboration task at different execution levels.
 # Copying a launched collaboration project and verifying the absence of the reported error message.
 # Editing a collaboration project post-launch and confirming the error message does not appear.
 # Copying tasks within a collaboration project during post-launch edits.
 # Copying project tasks with a single assignment.
 # Copying program project tasks with multiple assignments.
 # Copying program projects containing both single and multiple assignment tasks.
 # Post-launch editing of program projects and copying tasks with single and multiple assignments.
 # Launching, copying, and editing simple projects.

column3: Walk showing completed, however photos are not available in reporting
column7: Store 1172 is showing complete for a project that has an external walk attached, however the submission is not showing up in backend reporting. What is interesting is you can see it within field view.
column17:
Issue: Users can resubmit the External Walk Instance even after the Feed status is updated to “Complete.”

Current Functionality/Flow:

Upon submission of an External Walk, the application processes the responses and prepares ETL messages in a background thread, subsequently updating the Feed status to “Complete.” This process typically takes 5-10 seconds, depending on system load. Once the Feed status is updated to “Complete,” users are unable to conduct the External Walk Instance again, which is the intended behavior.

Problem:

Despite the intended functionality, users can resubmit the Walk Instance even if the Feed status is updated to “Complete.” This issue can be replicated under the following scenario:

Replication Steps:

Submit the External Walk Instance, which navigates the user to the Feed.
Quickly restart the External Walk Instance within 5-10 seconds.
If the user reopens the External Walk Instance and clicks “Next,” the application reverts the Walk Instance status back to “Incomplete.”
column21:
Fix:

The application would restrict users from restarting the External Walk Instance until a configurable waiting period of 2 mins (120 secs) has elapsed. A message should be displayed if the user attempts to restart before this timeframe.

Users would be able to Take Action on already submitted instance but when Users click on Next, Save and Exit or Review below error message will be displayed.

This prevents the system to send any ETL to revert the status from Active to Incomplete hence avoiding the issue.

Error Message: 
"This instance has already been submitted. Please wait a few moments for it to complete."

column3: Unable to edit recurring projects
column7:
We need to add new hotels to our recurring projects. We do this by adding them to the master project and then the launch each day until the end of the year.

However, in the past few days we've had issues doing this. One the first page, which we do not need to change, it is resetting the duration, and then throwing an error.

This means that we are unable to edit these projects. The only way round this is to close the project down and set up a brand new master to launch the next day. 

Something has changed as we have done this hundreds of times in the past. Please help urgently, it is causing major issues as the projects are going out incorrectly, break all timed skips and our 600 hotels are all raising tickets!!! 

Please let me know if you need any more information. 

Thanks
Iain
column11:
Please validate the following scenarios:

- Time-sensitive program project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the past.
- Time-sensitive program project post-launch edit with start date in the past, but start time is ahead of the current time.
- Time-sensitive program project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the future.
- Time-sensitive Fiscal and adhoc Recurring project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the past.
- Time-sensitive Fiscal and adhoc Recurring project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the future.
- Time-sensitive Fiscal and adhoc Recurring project post-launch edit has a start date and start time both in the future. No errors shown on landing on the project details page. The user can edit the start date and time. If the start date is shifted to today and the start time is set to the current time, the start time field will not be disabled. Also, if the user selects a start time that is before their current time, then the error will be displayed.
- In case of the task time sensitive with and without the collect duration as start days, validate the above behavior.
- Recurring time-sensitive tasks.
- Time-sensitive templates.
- Simple/compose project.
column17: When the user is post-launch editing any time-sensitive project on the details page, the Start time cannot be in the past error is shown. Along with that, the start time field value was cleared, and as this field is disabled, the user was also not able to set any time. This was blocking the user from continuing the post-launch edit.

column24:
[~AJ5718] 

I attempted to reproduce the issue in the QA environment using the latest template and project type but was unable to do so.

I discovered that the template in the client’s environment was migrated from an older version that lacks the *INBOX_TYPE_VISIBILITY* field, which should be set to either *PREPLAN* or {*}PROJECT{*}. This field is missing from the current production data. A similar issue has been resolved in cluster 2 under TM-41710.

Please run the data correction script provided below and inform us if any issues arise.


{code:java}
db.PROJECT.updateMany({DOMAIN_ID:120850099,TEMPLATE:true,ACTIVE:true,STATUS:"TC","INBOX_TYPE_VISIBILITY":{$exists:false}},{$set : {"INBOX_TYPE_VISIBILITY" : "PROJECT"}}); {code}

CC: [~RS7567]

Author: Vishal Kulkarni

column3: [Major Incident] RFX - Travelodge Hotels Limited - URGENT - unable to edit walk template | 23380581
column7:
As per usual practice, we need to add a hotel to the distribution list on a walk template as we have had a new hotel added to our estate. We have done this multiple times in the past. 

When trying to update this today, it is throwing an error from the questions tab; although we don't want/need a description on each question group, this is a required field and it does not let us publish the walk template without one. 

Our walk template, that we've been editing and using for the last two years or so, does not have a description, and never has. This has not thrown the error before. 

Also - in trying to get these room checks out to the hotel (critical function), the system does not even allow us to add a description. There is nothing we can do with this template to add any new hotels. 

This means the hotel (and any new hotels we open in the next few weeks) will not be able to make any hotel rooms clean on the system, meaning they will not be available to the customer. 

Ideally we need the question group description removed from a mandatory requirement. We never use it as it clutters our screens and the users get what they need to know from the group title. 

Video attached show my adding the required hotel, shows the system error and me trying to edit the question group. When I click on the field, it does not do anything, I'm guessing as it does not give me the option to edit it / fix the error! 

Please can you look at this urgently. The hotel is waiting for an answer in what they can do. Our central management will also need to be informed of this critical issue and they will need regular updates on the fix. 

Do let me know if you need any more info - I look forward to hearing from you. 

Many thanks
Iain
column17:
Due to new validations introduced as part of TM-51733.
When  the Question group description is empty and user tries to edit, it fails due to the validation.
column21: Existing data is updated so that the question group description is now populated with the question group name and because of this, validation is successful.
column24: We will close this customer specific ticket and address the other clusters through an internal ticket.
column25:
We will close this customer specific ticket and address the other clusters through an internal ticket.

column17: 32 projects created in 2023 have the calculatedCompletionDate field stored as a string instead of the expected date type in the PROJECT collection. This issue is causing auto-complete jobs to fail due to a ClassCastException.
column21:
Provided a script to correct data for those 32 projects, also provided scripts to schedule the autocomplete of the pending 4500 projects in batches of 1000 daily.

Also added a safety check to prevent a failure in single projects autocomplete from affecting a domain autocomplete job.

column3: User list inconsistencies

Jesse Vernon
column11: User List Screen should be tested for all filter/page navigation/sorting behavior
column17: System was not maintaining the page navigation and sorting
column21: Code fixed to maintain the page navigation and sorting
column24:
*Issue Description:* When browsing the Users list (Org → User), Page 1 initially shows users 1-50. After navigating to Page 2 (51-100) and then back to Page 1, the user list on Page 1 (1-50) changes unexpectedly. The list should remain consistent when navigating between pages.

*Code Review Done –* No

*Reviewed By -* Ankit Jain (AJ8037)

*Internal Impact –* The issue causes inconsistencies in user list pagination and sorting within the application, potentially affecting internal processes that rely on accurate and consistent user display. This may impact clients who require consistent and correct access to user lists for their operations.

*External Impact –* There no external impact on the other modules.

*Code changes -* During the navigation of the Users list (Org → User), the service https://knlgatepp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/listusers.view is invoked for initial loading. Upon changing pagination, the service https://knlgatepp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/client/auth/listusersbycriteria/PULSEGP.view is called.

Both services ultimately invoke the processAndGetSecurityUsersInterface method within the UserService, but they use different formData configurations. To ensure consistent user data across both services, it is necessary to correct the default formData parameters in the /kernel/views/listusers.view service call. This adjustment will align the data retrieval process, maintaining consistency in user lists during pagination transitions.

*Testing –*
*1) Initial Page Load Consistency:*

*Scenario:* Load the Users list (Org → User) and verify that Page 1 displays users 1-50.
Expected Result: Users 1-50 should consistently appear when the page is first loaded.

*2) Navigation from Page 1 to Page 2:*

*Scenario:* From the initial load of Page 1, navigate to Page 2 (51-100).
Expected Result: Users 51-100 should display correctly without altering the order or content.

*3) Navigation from Page 2 back to Page 1:*

*Scenario:* After viewing Page 2, navigate back to Page 1.
Expected Result: Users 1-50 should display the same as when initially loaded, with no changes in order or content.

*4) Repeated Navigation Between Pages:*

*Scenario:* Continuously navigate back and forth between Page 1 and Page 2 multiple times.
Expected Result: The user lists on both pages should remain consistent on every navigation, with no changes in order or content.

*4) Sorting Order Verification:*

*Scenario:* Verify the sorting order of users on Page 1 and Page 2 during initial load and after navigation.
Expected Result: The sorting order should remain consistent (e.g., alphabetically or numerically) every time a page is accessed.

*5) Logging Out and Back In:*

*Scenario:* Log out of the application after navigating between pages, then log back in and revisit the Users list.
Expected Result: Page 1 should display users 1-50 consistently upon re-login, matching the initial load.

*6) Cross-Environment Consistency:*

*Scenario:* Test the pagination and consistency across different environments (e.g., development, testing, pre-production).
Expected Result: Behavior should be consistent across all environments.

*7) Data Integrity Check:*

*Scenario:* Verify that the user data displayed is accurate and corresponds to the intended user profiles.
Expected Result: User data should be correct and consistent with the database records.

CC: [~AJ8037]

Upon changing pagination, the service https://knlgatepp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/client/auth/listusersbycriteria/PULSEGP.view is called.

Both services ultimately invoke the processAndGetSecurityUsersInterface method within the UserService, but they use different formData configurations. To ensure consistent user data across both services, it is necessary to correct the default formData parameters in the /kernel/views/listusers.view service call. This adjustment will align the data retrieval process, maintaining consistency in user lists during pagination transitions.

Testing –
1) Initial Page Load Consistency:

Scenario: Load the Users list (Org → User) and verify that Page 1 displays users 1-50.
Expected Result: Users 1-50 should consistently appear when the page is first loaded.

2) Navigation from Page 1 to Page 2:

Scenario: From the initial load of Page 1, navigate to Page 2 (51-100).
Expected Result: Users 51-100 should display correctly without altering the order or content.

3) Navigation from Page 2 back to Page 1:

Scenario: After viewing Page 2, navigate back to Page 1.
Expected Result: Users 1-50 should display the same as when initially loaded, with no changes in order or content.

4) Repeated Navigation Between Pages:

Scenario: Continuously navigate back and forth between Page 1 and Page 2 multiple times.
Expected Result: The user lists on both pages should remain consistent on every navigation, with no changes in order or content.

4) Sorting Order Verification:

Scenario: Verify the sorting order of users on Page 1 and Page 2 during initial load and after navigation.
Expected Result: The sorting order should remain consistent (e.g., alphabetically or numerically) every time a page is accessed.

5) Logging Out and Back In:

Scenario: Log out of the application after navigating between pages, then log back in and revisit the Users list.
Expected Result: Page 1 should display users 1-50 consistently upon re-login, matching the initial load.

6) Cross-Environment Consistency:

Scenario: Test the pagination and consistency across different environments (e.g., development, testing, pre-production).
Expected Result: Behavior should be consistent across all environments.

7) Data Integrity Check:

Scenario: Verify that the user data displayed is accurate and corresponds to the intended user profiles.
Expected Result: User data should be correct and consistent with the database records.

CC: Ankit Jain

column11: Display force close survey on summary page.
column17: Force close survey translations were not shown for single lang project
column21: Code change done to show translated text
column24:
The issue replicates if a project is created for single locale which is the domain default locale. In this case we send the base force close survey question in extract and do not send any translations.

Changes are done under TM-57471 to send all the translations provided for force close survey in the feedback extract even if project is created for single locale.

Changes to show the translations in summary are done under this ticket. The changes will not be retroactive. It will be applicable for the projects created after TM-57471 changes are applied.

column24:
Hi [~AS3228],

*Issue:* In MyWork v25.6.0, the walk icon sometimes disappears from the menu on the left. They have to logout, clear data, delete the app, and log back in in order for the icon to show.

*Could you let us know all the conditions under which the walk icon would disappear from the menu?*

Below are some preliminary questions and answers we received...(see logs attached)

*Questions:*

1) Is the issue now resolved for the user? Has the user been able to replicate this since our call?

2) How long was the user logged into the application for?

3) Does the user connect to the application via the store's network?

4) Did the user experience any network / connectivity issues prior to the issue occurring?

5) The client mentioned that some of the icons under the menu disappeared, which icons were they?

*Answers*

It worked for a couple days and then unfortunately went back to not working. Like I have said before, it seems to be a gamble on the day as to whether it does work. I do often now get connection 'lost' or 'found' come up throughout the day but otherwise the connection is fine. 

I log into the application when I start my shift and stay logged in until it logs me out automatically (sometimes randomly throughout the day, otherwise usually before my next shift)

I don't use the stores network as I find it doesn't work very well so instead it just uses my data.

No network issues.

column3: BP-CL26-US-PR- Violation Tasks for Walk Not Allowing Negative Integers
column7:
Hello,

I am trying to create a walk that has temperature readings included, and I would like it to create violation tasks for when the temperatures recorded are either too warm or too cold. In this case, we need a task to populate for temperatures below -40 degrees F. The question I am trying to reference in the rule allows negative integers, but when I try to create the violation task with the necessary rule, it does not let me save and gives an "invalid formula" error.

I was wanting to know if this is an expected behavior or if there is another way to enter the rule to allow it to go through? I would think that the rules would allow negative integers if the questionnaire allowed them. I am attaching images of the question configuration, as well as the rule configuration and the error that populates. Please let me know if there is any other information I can provide.

Thanks, Leah

column3: Edit Forum post
column7: Hi, is it possible to edit a forum post? we only found the delete button.
column17: N/A
column21: Not a bug. Works as designed. Informed customer.
column24:
[~KA6692]:
The forum Post edit option is available only to the creator. 
The Admin has the ability to delete the entire post, but cannot edit. This is how it is designed. 
We cannot allow anyone other than the post creator to edit the post. This is similar in other vendor applications, like Teams, etc.
[~GR2722]
column25:
Komal Anbhule:
The forum Post edit option is available only to the creator.
The Admin has the ability to delete the entire post, but cannot edit. This is how it is designed.
We cannot allow anyone other than the post creator to edit the post. This is similar in other vendor applications, like Teams, etc.
Gaurang Redker

column3: Project Created using inactive Project Type
column7:
During the dress rehearsal we successfully submitted requests with content to prod Zebra API but when we checked on the UI the content was rendered empty.
Our assumption is that the content of the notification was not rendered in Zebra WFM because we used a project code that was not active at the time (WN1) in the request. 

Is that the expected behaviour that we can successfully create projects using inactive project code (The API returned a 200 with a success response) but we can't rely on having the content stored?

An example of this is Project 10138945. The project was successfully created but the message did not render

Author: Mani Soundarajan

column3: Images in form's "Neatbilstības pieteikums" PDF file do not load
column7:
Issue: In MyWork we have a form "Neatbilstības pieteikumi", which info (after store fills the form) as a post action goes to an email "myworks-jira@maxima.lv" and turns into a Jira case. It converts all info from the form into a PDF file, which also has images in it. It worked well until last week when we started to see that in some PDF files pictures are gray, not loaded. We asked Jira IT team to check from their side, they answered that the problem was before ticket was sent to Jira. Jira can’t change attachment content in general. AS AN EXAMPLE: FORM_2272051 from store R180 from 08.08.25. (PDF file from e-mail already has gray pictures inside - find in the attached)

Expectations: Images from form "Neatbilstības pieteikumi" show in PDF.

Steps: 1. Log in to Prod; 2. Switch to DIVISION; 3. Go to forms- Show Form Reports-Master Feedback Report-find "Neatbilstības pieteikumi"-find a form from store R180, date 08.08.-open it and see that the Store has attached pictures in .jpg format; 4. In reports pictures are fine, but the PDF file which is being sent to an e-mail shows there two pictures as gray (see the PDF in the attached and the screenshot of an email. if it is needed we may send you the e-mail too).

column3: NASC01: Cannot Save Filter in Field View
column7:
We are currently unable to save any entered filters for continued use within Field View. 
Steps to replicate:
1. Log in as DIS10MGR/DIS10MGR
2. Navigate to Task Management >Field View
3. Expand filter criteria and apply any filters (Last 60 days, current month, etc.) and apply. Field View page will then update
4. Reopen the filter panel, designate a name for filter, and select the Save icon. You are able to select and the name field clears, but the filter does not save for use.

The attached pictures show some of the issues teams are encountering. All users reporting state they witnessed the walk complete correctly on the tablet, one user stated that they never lost internet connection, and watched the walk complete/upload/move to Approved walks on the tablet, then it moved to incomplete when accessing later.

column3: In project's " STEIDZAMI - Izņemt no tirdzniecības: 1270857 2098765986613	 Cāļu krūtiņas fileja 0.500 kg WIPASZ SP." task doubled answer for store R078
column7:
Issue: In project's "STEIDZAMI - Izņemt no tirdzniecības: 1270857 2098765986613	 Cāļu krūtiņas fileja 0.500 kg WIPASZ SP." task store's R078 answer is 0 and 3, which is doubled. After the call with the store, they said that they put only 1 number 1 time - 0. We don't know from where number 3 came. When you click on reporter's name you see only one correct answer 0.

Expectations: Problem is found and fixed. Store's only one correct answer is shown in answers and report.

Steps: 1. Log in to Prod; 2. Switch to DIVISION; 3. Go to Project Inbox and find a project "STEIDZAMI - Izņemt no tirdzniecības: 1270857 2098765986613	 Cāļu krūtiņas fileja 0.500 kg WIPASZ SP." (05.08.-06.08.); 4. Go to Task Completion Survey-View Responses-Total Responses; 5. Find store's R078 answer (Page nr.2) and see that there are two answers: 0 and 3. Then click on User name "Ilze Goncenko" and see that there is only 1 answer "0".

Screenshots in the attached.

Author: Pramod Duraphe

column3: Major Incident - RFX - James Hall and Co Ltd -  TM - Daily System Outage/Slowness from 4 PM to Next Day Morning | 23042353
column7:
Hi, 

On Monday, 4th Aug we have had reports from a number of stores that the system was working (wouldn't load the screen/extremely slow). However, the next day morning, it started working normally. 

Since then we have had multiple stores report that the system performance is quite poor and most often none of the tasks open as the wheel just spins. 

Below is one of the messages from a store - 

For the last 4 days we have had the same issue where come 4pm onwards reflexis on the pdas and on the back office take forever to load a page and then to complete a task takes over 20 minutes where every button press results in a spinning blue circle and a long wait time 

The rest of the store internet and services are fine, this just appears to be reflexis

Come the next morning and all pdas and back office reflexis are fine, this just seems to be happening from around 4pm but is now over consecutive days




Please can this be looked into urgently? The issue didn't seem to settle down.

Can you provide feedback as soon as possible?

Thanks,
Veena

Author: Sharad Dikule

column3: AP - Unable to change name of plan type
column7:
Hello, can you please tell me how I can change the name of a plan type? When I use the pen, the new name is not saved, see video in attachment.
Thank you, Floor
column24:
Hi [~KA6692],

 

Please run the following script to fix this issue:

 
{code:java}
db.RTM_TRANSLATION_DATA.deleteMany({ TYPE: 'PROJECT_TYPE', DOMAIN_ID: 122510099, CATEGORY_KEY: { $in: ['105', '115']}}); {code}
It will delete the translations for two plan type (105 and 115). After that, any change done by customer will be correctly reflected in the inbox screen.

 

I was not able to recreate this issue by using our apis, translation is never added for a plan type. 

 

CC: [~HS8798]
column25:
Hi Komal Anbhule,

 

Please run the following script to fix this issue:

 

db.RTM_TRANSLATION_DATA.deleteMany({ TYPE: 'PROJECT_TYPE', DOMAIN_ID: 122510099, CATEGORY_KEY: { $in: ['105', '115']}});

It will delete the translations for two plan type (105 and 115). After that, any change done by customer will be correctly reflected in the inbox screen.

 

I was not able to recreate this issue by using our apis, translation is never added for a plan type. 

 

CC: Harsha Sutaone

column3: Rack Room Shoes PROD: Please move WFM permissions of respective profiles from Pre-Prod to PROD.
column7:
This ticket is just for early heads up to L2 team. So that L2 team can plan it accordingly.

Rack Room shoes will be starting their scheduling pilot on 08/18.

We will be getting the sign from the customer on 07/24 and after that CLM team will be starting PP DB copy activity on 07/28. After that we need to move WFM profile permissions from PP to PROD.

We need to copy permissions only for WFM eligible profiles as we have enabled WFM permissions only for certain profiles in PP. We are not going to update any RTM related permissions for any of the profile in PROD.

For, all store level profiles, we need to keep only scheduling side permissions in PROD and all RTA permissions should be disabled as they will be starting pilot only for scheduling. 

For above store level profiles, we can move both RWS+RTA permissions from PP to PROD for the profiles which are eligible for WFM.

We will provide you list of all eligible profiles once we have sign off from the customer on 07/25. So that accordingly you can focus on those profiles only and move WFM permissions to PROD.

Author: Sakshi Ade [X]

column3: Walk Template Overdue Notification
column7:
We previously worked on SR-06023 and were able to setup a Mobile Notification going to the Regional Manager when a Walk assigned to the Store becomes Overdue (the Branch did not have to start the Walk in order for the Regional to get the notification via mobile).  Notification was configured to be sent 12 hours AFTER it becomes due. This was tested in PP and moved to Prod.

Then we submitted SR-06605 to have the same type of notification go to the Regional Manager, however change it to email notification and send the Notification 6 days prior to due. Basically, if Walk has not been started or Completed at 6 days prior to due date, send a notification to the Regional. 

We did several tests in PP (see attached) and I was receiving the notification at the time the Walk becomes Overdue. I want to change this to 6 days prior to due date, if not completed at that time.
column17: Email address was not configured for regional user (userId:208492).

column3: Multiple user profiles in Cognos do not match UI
column7:

column3: Activity Planner - Error at Last Approver
column7:
Hi Kyle ~ I spoke with Mel and she agrees that this needs to be reviewed by the team because there isn't anything that she can see would be causing plans to error out at the last step in the approval workflow.  

Plan Types affected are Standard Plan and Standard - No Proposed State.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create plan as Stager profile, send to Scheduler
2. Switch to Scheduler profile and go to PLN > Approval Inbox, forward plan to Publisher
   **If Standard Plan, take action to "propose plan" before forwarding to Publisher
3. Switch to Publisher profile and go to PLN > Approval Inbox, approve and launch plan... You will receive error message.. screenshot attached.

	
	
		
		
			After some time when you go back into the Approval Inbox, it will show you that the plan has been locked even though no one has taken the action to lock it.
 ****After you take the action to try and launch the plan and receive the error, it also disappears the plan from the Plan Calendar.  
		
		
	
	



I'm trying to get testing kicked off this week so if you could help me get this resolved as soon as possible, that would be much appreciated.

column17: System was not deleting existing change request before resetting the project
column21: code fix done
column24:
Issue occurs while resetting a project which is currently being edited.

Reason: While resetting from inbox/summary, if there is active change request, we ask user if he still wants to proceed. If user says Yes, then we discard current change request. On action widget, we were not discarding the active change request.

Fixed:

If a project is being edited and the same project is reset from action widget, user will see the "Project is currently being edited. On taking this action, ongoing changes will be discarded." message. On taking action, the active change request will be discarded.
column25:
Issue occurs while resetting a project which is currently being edited.

Reason: While resetting from inbox/summary, if there is active change request, we ask user if he still wants to proceed. If user says Yes, then we discard current change request. On action widget, we were not discarding the active change request.

Fixed:

If a project is being edited and the same project is reset from action widget, user will see the "Project is currently being edited. On taking this action, ongoing changes will be discarded." message. On taking action, the active change request will be discarded.

column3: Last unread on desktop - Doesn't work
column7: Hi, see video in attachement. I cant replicate this myself, maybe because im the creator of the chat group; but the last unread doesnt seem to work on desktop. PRD UserID = 731249
column11:
Impact Analysis:

Code Review Done	Yes
Internal Impact – (Function Areas)	QCHAT > Groups at least 3 users.
The issue arises under specific conditions, predominantly affecting group settings. Consider a scenario involving multiple users in a group:

User A sends a message and subsequently deletes it.
User B does not view this message before deletion.
User C views the message before it is deleted.

User B experiences the issue because the deleted message does not contribute to the unread message count. However, the database retains the isRead property for this message. As a result, although User B did not read the message prior to its deletion, the unread counter does not include the deleted message, and thus the badge is not displayed. Conversely, the logic responsible for displaying the last read separator message accounts for all messages, including those that have been deleted, leading to the problem.

External Impact – (Product Names)	N/A
API Test	N/A
JUnit Test	Yes

Solution:
Code fix, to skip deleted messages from logic to add the last read separator message.
column17:
Issue is happening from beginning.

Not cover case at development time.
It is a corner case, which now is handled.
column21:
Handling corner case when user had a message sent by someone else, but deleted before read it.
Solved this corner case.

Author: Mani Soundarajan

column3: Reports sending without attachments
column7:
On all of our daily walks we receive the confirmation email to state that the walk has been completed with an attachment. 
Since 14:30 we have noticed that alot of the walk confirmation emails have come in without the PDF attached. Example hotels are: GB0783 GB2006 GB0785 (117 emails received so far without the attachement. 

Can you please review to understand what happened at 2:30 for this to start
column11:
Solution Implemented
+ Backend logic was changed to always use questionText from the QUESTION_DATA collection (DB) instead of user input.
+ User answers are stored, but question text is always sourced from the DB, preventing any override/corruption from user-submitted data.
+ Test coverage was added to ensure this logic in addQuestionResponse.
column17:
+PDF generation fails due to exceptions in question responses.
+Unexpected characters in question responses (from user input), not present in the original question data, cause the issue.
+Backend was saving questionText from user encoding instead of the one from DB, leading to overwritten or corrupted data.
+There was also a historical encoding issue in January, so some mobile apps might be sending incorrectly encoded data.

Author: Pratik Gandhi

column3: Checklist Schedule Date During Creation Extends Automatically
column7:
We have noticed that when creating a checklist (whether copying a prior one, or creating a new one), the end date for the checklist gets extended by one day when you go to the Review screen (then subsequently launch it out). Each time an edit is made on the Schedule portion (such as adjusting the time) the due date gets extended an additional day.

In the attached examples, the due date of 7/18/2025 was selected (first photo), then the review was clicked on the checklist (moving the date to 7/19/25), then the review was closed, and the time was adjusted (moving the date to 7/20/2025, pictured in the second photo).
column17: When we save End Date in Check Recurring checklist than End Date is automatically extends by 1 date.
column21:
We are saving start date and end date in UTC time zone in Database, but in response also we are getting UTC time. so on UI it is Automatically extends by 1.

While making the Json response in API we provide Creator timezone Date.

column3: Drug Test Order Form Issue
column7:
Good morning,
A store reached out today asking why they haven't received some drug test kit they ordered back on 6/27.  I logged into the stores profile and noticed that the drug test form that they filled out was still showing Pending Review in the history tab even though the status was showing complete.  The form should have went to Linda or I after it was submitted but it never showed up (as you can see in the history flow).  I have attached a screenshot showing the form in question.  If you need to log into the store the username and password are both 1227.
Thank you,
Jesse Vernon
column17:
Issue:

The form instance was submitted on 2025-06-27T19:43:24.813+00:00 and initially held a “Pending Review” status. It was subsequently approved by the reviewer, and the status was updated to “Active.”

However, a Model History record was not generated when the instance became active, and the status was not updated to “Active (15)” in RAR.

Observations:

No ETL transactional records were found in NOTIFICATION_DATA, AUDIT_ETL_LOG, or ETL_SQL_LOG collections after the instance was approved. This indicates that the application did not process any ETLs when the instance was approved, resulting in the Model History not being generated and the status not being synced with RAR.
No logs were available in Google Console prior to June 29, preventing us from identifying any exceptions or determining the root cause of the issue.
column21:
Model History records are being generated for new instances, and the issue has not been replicated. Please notify us if a similar issue arises again so we can review the logs and determine the root cause. Due to the lack of logs and audit records, we are currently unable to provide a detailed root cause analysis.

L2 team has ran ETL Utility tool and SFDC case is closed as per the comments in Salesforce hence resolving this issue.

column3: Project Inbox filter - Duration only accepts 365 days
column7:
Good morning,

I had a creator reaching out looking for a project that she had sent a couple years ago because she wanted to redo a similar one.  I went in to the Project Inbox and tried to go back 5 years to search for her projects and got an error saying the duration can't be more than 365 days.  This made the process very long because I ended up having to use the calendar 4 different times to find the correct year.  Why can't this allow you to search for as many days as possible when doing a custom search?  Before the change to only include the last year as default, you could go back as far as you want to search. 

Also, the calendar jumps around a lot when moving from month to month, as seen in the video I attached.

Thank you,
Jesse Vernon

column3: Tasks Cannot Be Deleted
column7:
Good morning, 

I am editing various projects and need to delete specific tasks. (Each summer, we review all projects for accuracy with our corporate teams). 

There have been instances were tasks inside some of these projects need to be deleted, but I am getting an error message when I click the trash can icon on the task, or the "Delete" option is grayed out when a task check box is selected. The "Saving" blue circle just keeps spinning. 

This is the case for all projects that include the highlighted portion of the title in the screen shot. This is true for numerous projects, so I'm not sure if there's a way to update this for all projects in the system, or if you need to check each project individually. 

Thanks,
Allie
