column3: Time Restriction Calculation
column7:
Hi Mark,

Can you help us understand how to calculate time restriction within the Walk setup correctly? For our Quarterly and Semi-Annual Walks, we have to set a time restriction in the walk to have the due date set correctly. 

We just launched new walks on 7/7/25 @ 12AMand set them with a 92 day time restriction, in order for them to be due 10/6/25 @ 11:59 PM. For some reason, they are showing a due date of 10/7/25 @ 11:59PM which is an extra day. But I'm still showing 92 days is the correct count. Same happened for our Semi-Annual where we used 184 days, should be due 1/6/26, but shows 1/7/26. How should we be calculating or do you have any idea why this is including an extra day all of the sudden. You can use the 911 Testing (Quarterly) or Alarm System Testing (Semi-Annual) Walk Templates to review (please don't make changes in Prod).
column11: Repeating Walk Schedule Setup at Template Screen
column17:
Issue 1: Time Restrictive Toggle Behavior

Description: When a user enables the “Time Restrictive” toggle to input a specific number of days, navigates to a different tab, and then returns to the original tab, the toggle becomes disabled.

Root Cause: The Time Restrictive Setup (Days option) was not being saved in the database, causing the toggle to revert to its original state.

Technical Issue: There was a UI issue where the Time Restrictive Setup JSON was not being returned when fetching the parameters needed to save data in the database.

Issue 2: Incorrect End Date for Time-Restricted Schedule

Description: For a schedule restricted to 92 days, with a start date of July 7 at 12:00 AM, the expected end date should be October 6 at 11:59 PM. However, the system currently displays the end date as October 7.

Explanation:

This behavior aligns with the current functionality, where the application adds the specified number of days to the current date and sets the Walk End Date to the end of the day. This approach ensures that users have at least one full day to complete the Walk Instance.
column21:
Issue 1:

Corrective Action: The solution involves ensuring that the Time Restrictive Setup JSON is returned when the “Days” option is selected, allowing it to be properly saved in the database.

 

Issue 2:

Example: If a template is submitted at 3 PM on July 30 with a Time Restrictive setup of 1 day, the application will generate a Walk Instance with a Start Date of July 30 at 12:00 AM, ending on July 31 at 11:59 PM. This configuration provides users with more than a day to complete the Walk Instance, rather than just a few hours.

 

Considerations:

We have observed that other customers utilize this functionality and adjust the number of days according to the current setup. Modifying this behavior could impact existing customer configurations. Therefore, it’s important to communicate this functionality to customers and advise them to adjust the number of days as needed to align with their requirements.

Please convey this explanation to the customer to ensure they understand the current functionality and make any necessary adjustments.
column24:
[~NS2154]/[~MS5895]:
As per the initial discussion, we agreed that we will fix issue 1 and not make any changes to issue 2 (because of the reasons cited). We will stick with that approach and resolve this ticket, since issue 1 has been validated. Also, we have already informed L2 about this and L2 in turn have informed L1/customer.

We have to discuss issue 2 comprehensively and decide the path forward after discussing with PDM. For example, what if the start time is set as say 12:00 noon and days are set for 1 day? As a user my expectation would be for the project to end at 12:00 noon the next day and not at 11:59 PM as the application currently would behave. I will create an internal ticket to track this.
I have created internal ticket - TM-57715 to track this.

column3: RFX - Asda Stores Ltd - TM - Group Handle missing underscores | 22607046
column7:
I have today come to assign Walks to further sites taht are going live, when putting the Walk into edit and adding the updated CSV file, this is fine.  When coming to submit the Walk, get an error message stating "Please correct the errors before submitting template", on investigation the underscores have dropped out of the Questionnaire Group Handle.  These were present as these Walks have been live and being completed.  Walks impacted are:

•	Asda Money
•	Counters Scale Weight Check
•	Out of Oven Temperature Checks
•	Baby Food, Baby Milk and Powder Confirmation
•	Fire Alarm Panel Checks
•	Fire Exit Checks
•	GSM validation of Online Grocery checklist
•	Weekly Call Point Confirmation
•	Home Shopping Scale Weight Check
•	Online Grocery
•	Optical Weekly Compliance
•	2 - PFS Daily DCD
•	3 – PFS Fire Checks
•	4 – Petrol Weekly Checks
•	Pharmacy Monthly Compliance
•	Produce Scale Weight Check
•	Chiller Temperature Action Procedure
•	Freezer Temperature Action Procedure
•	Thermometer Calibration
•	PPT Pre Op Check
•	Waste and Recycling Transfer
•	Weekly Racking Checks

Steps to replicate:

Place template into Edit
Assign CSV
Click Save
Click submit tab
Click publish
Error appears.

I have had to copy each of these walks to enable me to correct the error and be able to publish the Walks.  I have then placed the offending Walks into Withdrawn.

Can this please be investigated as to why it has happened as it has added substancial time to resolve
column11:
Template submission in Edit mode having Group Handle with spaces or characters outside the allowed set.
Allowed Set :(a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and underscore _).
column17:
The Group Handle field had UI and backend validations that restricted input to certain characters.

Allowed Set :(a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and underscore _).

If older data contained spaces or characters outside the allowed set, users were unable to edit and update the Group. Consequently, they were also unable to submit the Template in Edit mode.
column21:
The application has removed the restrictive validations. Now, the Group Handle field only enforces the following validations:

	Mandatory Field Check
	Maximum Length Check: 40 characters
These changes apply at both the UI and backend levels.
With this fix, users can now edit the Group Handle, save the Group, and successfully submit the edited Template.

*Internal Impact* – In dataload logs, time will be displayed as per the time zone provided in "kernel.cron.default.timezone".

*External Impact* – In cron file upload logs, time will be displayed as per the time zone provided in "kernel.cron.default.timezone".

*Code changes* - Time calculation in dataload logs will be done based on the timezone provided in property "kernel.cron.default.timezone"
If the timezone is not provided in "kernel.cron.default.timezone" then by default "UTC" time zone will be considered.

*Testing* –
 # Provide the timezone against property "kernel.cron.default.timezone"
 # Upload the file using dataload/Cron upload
 # Go to Dataload > View logs
 # Check the time printed in the log is as per the timezone provided in kernel.cron.default.timezone

 

Issue Details :

*Issue :*
Previously, the Start Time and Complete Time for batch jobs were displayed according to the server/system time zone. However, due to recent changes in the GKE (Google Kubernetes Engine) setup, the JVM time zone has been explicitly set to UTC. As a result, the times are now displayed in UTC.

The displayed timestamps currently do not include the time zone information, which creates confusion. This ambiguity has led to the false impression that the batch jobs are being triggered at the wrong time.

For instance, in the ticket [https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-56324], the client has scheduled the batch job to run at 4:00 AM US time. However, due to the lack of a time zone indicator, it appears as though the jobs are being triggered at 8:00 AM, even though they are indeed running as per the intended schedule at 4:00 AM US time.
!NewLogs.png|thumbnail!

 

*Prerequisite*
Value of "kernel.cron.default.timezone" property should be set in each environment.

!Time zone changes.png|thumbnail!

 

*Solution:*
The Start Time and Completed Time will now be displayed based on the time zone configured in the kernel.cron.default.timezone property. This ensures that the timestamps align with the specified time zone for clarity and accuracy.

Additionally, the displayed time will explicitly include the time zone value for better understanding. For example:

Format with Time Zone:
2025-09-19 04:35:37 AM EDT
2025-09-19 04:35:37 EDT
This approach eliminates any ambiguity regarding the time zone and provides clear, user-friendly timestamps.
Like below :
IST:
!IST.png|thumbnail!

UTC:
!UTC.png|thumbnail!

EDT:

!EDT.png|thumbnail!

column17:
As part of Release Process, we export Translation files from Translation Manager and commit it under ztm-localization-store repository.

However while exporting Translation files for TASK-25.7.1.0 release, we only exported Translations for v17 version which created discrepancy as mentioned Translation keys were part of 16.10.

Ideally we need to export for all versions and commit it before sending the release but we missed to select all Version in the dropdown for this release which created this issue.

column17: The ztm-localization-store Git repository contains only a single branch. During the deployment of the 25.7.1.0 release on June 26, 2025, corrupted data was inadvertently inserted, affecting the Resource Bundle in CL 26 PR, which was updated on June 30, 2025.
column21:
The Resource Bundle was updated on July 7, 2025, under TM-56064. This update corrected the corrupted translation keys.

 

Issue is fixed in latest release.

 

Please verify the following as part of Validation for the Fix:

	Walk Template Screen status description should display as per locale.
	When User switches to a different locale then translations should display accordingly.
column24:
*Root Cause:*

The {{ztm-localization-store}} Git repository contains only a single branch. During the deployment of the 25.7.1.0 release on June 26, 2025, corrupted data was inadvertently inserted, affecting the Resource Bundle in CL 26 PR, which was updated on June 30, 2025.

*Corrective Action:*

The Resource Bundle was updated on July 7, 2025, under [TM-56064|https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-56064]. This update corrected the corrupted translation keys.

 

Issue is fixed in latest release.

 

Please verify the following as part of Validation for the Fix:
 * Walk Template Screen status description should display as per locale.
 * When User switches to a different locale then translations should display accordingly.

 

CC:[~NP5386]
column25:
Root Cause:

The ztm-localization-store Git repository contains only a single branch. During the deployment of the 25.7.1.0 release on June 26, 2025, corrupted data was inadvertently inserted, affecting the Resource Bundle in CL 26 PR, which was updated on June 30, 2025.

Corrective Action:

The Resource Bundle was updated on July 7, 2025, under TM-56064. This update corrected the corrupted translation keys.

 

Issue is fixed in latest release.

 

Please verify the following as part of Validation for the Fix:

  • Walk Template Screen status description should display as per locale.
  • When User switches to a different locale then translations should display accordingly.

 

CC:Nilesh Pawar

column11:
We checked the logs but were unable to identify the queries causing the deadlock. However, we noticed that the PROJECT_SKEY condition is missing in the WHERE clause of the ETL_STATUS_UPDATE message and the Rule Task Completed/Force-closed (Query2:RAR_TASK_EXECUTION). We suspect this might lock all user records without properly considering exact project skey, task, user records. A fix was provided as part of the TASK-25.8.0.7 release.

When the issue occurs next time, could you capture the exact SQL queries and work with the DBA team to determine why the deadlock is happening? We request all L2 team members to raise a ticket with the DBA and attach the queries that are causing the deadlock.

column3: ERROR en la reportería, estatus de Usuarios se encuentran mal configurados en la base de datos de COGNOS
column7:
ERROR en la reportería, estatus de Usuarios se encuentran mal configurados en la base de datos de COGNOS

1er Error ->   En COGNOS se está Mezclando los Estatus "A" y "Y" en el Namespace [MISC].[RAR_USER].[USER_NAME]    En los dos muestra los estatus Activos


2do Error ->  No solo los mezcla, si no que también está desplegando usuarios inactivos, como se muestra de ejemplo en el Adjunto y al buscar de manera general muestra una diferencia de 923 Usuarios que muestra de más, estos 923 usuarios son inactivos o los confunde la herramienta con otro estatus

¿Como confiar en los datos extraidos de la plataforma si los Namespace tienen errores?
Se tiene duda siempre que se requieren extraer datos desde la base de datos, favor de hacer un arreglo de Raíz de todos los namespaces que sufran con errores

(I know that if you click into details you can see the due by time, but this is not as efficient)
Thanks,
Will

Author: Mani Soundarajan

column3: API Infomration
column7:
I have a request for some details on the Zebra API for the benefit of the performance testing that we will have to perform whilst moving our current XML platform. I have been asked if the following are documented/can be provided? 

Identify performance characteristics and limitations of the third-party API.
Define internal handling strategies for rate limits, timeouts, retries, and fallbacks.

Specifically;

Third-party API details captured:

-Rate limits (e.g., requests per second/day/week)
-Response time SLAs or average response times
-Payload size limits
-Concurrent request handling
-API usage quotas or throttling policies

Capture any service-level expectations or guarantees (e.g., 99.9% uptime).

Are you able to support with this?

Thanks

Steph

column3: [Major Incident] RFX - JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. - myCP: Active users showing Inactive status in myCP | 22294073
column7:
During the past two weeks, we have received 30+ reports from non-branch users (primarily Market Admins) and also some branch employees stating that they lost access to myCP even though they are Active employees.  When viewing the impacted employees in myCP, their user status is Inactive.  Our dev team has conducted research, and there appears to be a disconnect between what is showing in the UserListExtract file, and what displays in myCP.

Examples:
Validated data for this 2 employees (W587165; R742104).
Particularly for this 2 employees myCP didn't send any termination and in userListExtract file I can see active profiles but in tool profiles showing as inactive. 
Observed similar behavior for MSAdmin profiles as well.
in latest userListExtract file (06/16) am seeing most of them as active but in tool profiles are inactive.

Please review and let us know if additional information is needed.  This issue may need to be raised to MIM if we continue to receive access-related tickets.

column3: RFX - James Hall and Co Ltd - Overall Walk Report Not Showing Correct Information | 22251557
column7:
When viewing the overall walk report its not showing the correct information on task completion. 

For example on may 31st Blackpool completed all 3 temperature check tasks, you can see this from the store level execution report. 

But on the overall walk report this is only showing that Blackpool completed 2 of the temperature check tasks. It says they didnt do the evening check but when you view it on store level execution you can see they did complete it. 

This is happening at more than 1 store so reporting isnt correct and we cant rely on this as we have external companies coming in and completing visits
column17:
Issue: Users can resubmit the External Walk Instance even after the Feed status is updated to “Complete.”

Current Functionality/Flow:

Upon submission of an External Walk, the application processes the responses and prepares ETL messages in a background thread, subsequently updating the Feed status to “Complete.” This process typically takes 5-10 seconds, depending on system load. Once the Feed status is updated to “Complete,” users are unable to conduct the External Walk Instance again, which is the intended behavior.

Problem:

Despite the intended functionality, users can resubmit the Walk Instance even if the Feed status is updated to “Complete.” This issue can be replicated under the following scenario:

Replication Steps:

Submit the External Walk Instance, which navigates the user to the Feed.
Quickly restart the External Walk Instance within 5-10 seconds.
If the user reopens the External Walk Instance and clicks “Next,” the application reverts the Walk Instance status back to “Incomplete.”
column21:
Fix:

The application would restrict users from restarting the External Walk Instance until a configurable waiting period of 2 mins (120 secs) has elapsed. A message should be displayed if the user attempts to restart before this timeframe.

Users would be able to Take Action on already submitted instance but when Users click on Next, Save and Exit or Review below error message will be displayed.

This prevents the system to send any ETL to revert the status from Active to Incomplete hence avoiding the issue.

Error Message: 
"This instance has already been submitted. Please wait a few moments for it to complete."

column3: Session duration

Employees in the stores should remain logged in to the app for 12 hours so that they do not have to constantly log in again. Please set this value back to 12 hours.

Scenario:
 * Verify user should see the time format for due today task or projects in feeds
 * Verify user should see the time when unit and device timezone are same else time will not displayed 
 * Verify user format should display as per the config even device time is in 12 hr format
 * Verify the same with switch unit  
 * verify the same in Android

column3: AP - can't edit plans properly
column7: When I edit a plan all the pre-requisite questions that were filled in dissapear and become empty. I have to open a new screen of the project summary and copy paste al answers given every time I edit a plan. This isn't workable.
column11:
- Launch plan/project with plan/project type having a prerequisite defined.
- Post-launch edit plan/project with plan/project type having a prerequisite defined. The prerequisite question and response should be retained as is from the previous version.
- Add a new prerequisite question in the plan/project type. Post-launch edit plan/project, it should retain the previous prerequisite data, but should not display a new question in case of an Edit.
- Copy the existing plan/project, and it should populate all the latest prerequisite questions in the new copy. If the "Copy pre-requisites while copying project?" is enabled, then it should copy responses of existing questions in the plan/project.
column17: This change resolves the issue of prerequisite responses not populating in the post-launch edit of plans/projects. The issue occurred when a new prerequisite was added to the plan/project type before the post-launch edit.
column21: The change includes retaining the prerequisite data as it was from the previous version in case of the Edit of plans/projects. Also, includes the fix to copy the prerequisite responses if the copy prerequisite property is enabled at the time of the Copy of plans/projects.

Author: Mani Soundarajan

column3: Repeating Walks Showing As Scheduled
column7:
Hello,

I was looking to understand why a Walk which has been set up as a repeating shows on the Store Walk landing page as a scheduled Walk?

I've attached a screen shot for reference, this is the Out of Oven Temperature which was created under site 1001 as a store colleague role. It was Saved and Exited by Craig Chelton and then when I go to view the Walk, it shows as scheduled.

Thank you for your help.
column24:
Hi [~HD1845] ,

CL 55 PR:

{DOMAIN_ID:122480099,MODEL_ID:"FORM_489",TXN_CATEGORY:"C"}

Walk Template : "Out of Oven Temperature Checks"

For Above Walk Template, Auto Un-Claim feature is enabled.

Hence when a User clicks on Save and Exit button then Walk Instance will get auto-unclaimed.

Below are some technical details when a Walk Instance gets Auto Unclaimed.

Application updates below fields in WALK_SCHEUDLE_INFO Collection for the Instance:
 * USER_ID to -1
 * CLAIM_FLAG to N
 * CLAIM_DATE  to null
 * STATUS to N

 

Now, because the STATUS has been updated to N (New), we show Walk Instance status text as Scheduled in the UI.

For the Adhoc Walk Creator, when an Instance is either Unclaimed or Auto-Unclaimed, we show status text as Scheduled ,a Continue button and Claim label.

This indicates the User that the Walk Instance is available to claim and User can continue the Walk Instance which is currently scheduled to the User Profile (As the Adhoc Walk Instance was originally started/scheduled by that User Profile).

Note: Adhoc is a frequency, Walk Instance is always scheduled either at Adhoc/Scheduled/Repeating Frequency.

 

However, for the mentioned Walk Template SYSADMIN User profile is the Walk Admin.

Hence, SYSADMIN user profile is able to view/conduct the unclaimed walk instance.

As Walk instance was not created by SYSADMIN user profile, application does not show continue button and claim flag as it was originally started by Store User Profile.

For Walk Admins, application would only show Resume button as Walk Admin has View/Conduct permissions for the instances.

 

Note: Claim Flag and Continue button is visible to Store User who has started the Adhoc Walk Instance.

This is working as per functionality and hence not an issue.

Please communicate with the Client and explain the above functionality.

 

CC:[~NP5386]
column25:
Hi Hardi Dadhaniya ,

CL 55 PR:

{DOMAIN_ID:122480099,MODEL_ID:"FORM_489",TXN_CATEGORY:"C"}

Walk Template : "Out of Oven Temperature Checks"

For Above Walk Template, Auto Un-Claim feature is enabled.

Hence when a User clicks on Save and Exit button then Walk Instance will get auto-unclaimed.

Below are some technical details when a Walk Instance gets Auto Unclaimed.

Application updates below fields in WALK_SCHEUDLE_INFO Collection for the Instance:

  • USER_ID to -1
  • CLAIM_FLAG to N
  • CLAIM_DATE  to null
  • STATUS to N

 

Now, because the STATUS has been updated to N (New), we show Walk Instance status text as Scheduled in the UI.

For the Adhoc Walk Creator, when an Instance is either Unclaimed or Auto-Unclaimed, we show status text as Scheduled ,a Continue button and Claim label.

This indicates the User that the Walk Instance is available to claim and User can continue the Walk Instance which is currently scheduled to the User Profile (As the Adhoc Walk Instance was originally started/scheduled by that User Profile).

Note: Adhoc is a frequency, Walk Instance is always scheduled either at Adhoc/Scheduled/Repeating Frequency.

 

However, for the mentioned Walk Template SYSADMIN User profile is the Walk Admin.

Hence, SYSADMIN user profile is able to view/conduct the unclaimed walk instance.

As Walk instance was not created by SYSADMIN user profile, application does not show continue button and claim flag as it was originally started by Store User Profile.

For Walk Admins, application would only show Resume button as Walk Admin has View/Conduct permissions for the instances.

 

Note: Claim Flag and Continue button is visible to Store User who has started the Adhoc Walk Instance.

This is working as per functionality and hence not an issue.

Please communicate with the Client and explain the above functionality.

 

CC:Nilesh Pawar

column3: Data Discrepancy in Walk Schedule Report (regular or v2)
column7:
I am trying to report on our Walk Completion for the month and noticed that the reporting is inaccurate. I have tried both the regular Walk Schedule Report and the v2 (in this version, we added Completed Late column). Filter to date 5/7/25 to 6/6/25. It shows 8 Walks in the Incomplete column, but if you click on the 8, it only shows 1 record. 

Using Store 24 Crystal Lake to look further, it shows 9 Scheduled. If you click on the 9, you get the pop up for only shows 5 records (should show 9). And it says 4 in Incomplete. If you click the 4, the pop up shows no data. If I go look at the Crystal Lake Branch View, all 9 Walks launched during that timeframe are in "Approved" status, there are NONE in Incomplete. 

Can we please look into why this reporting is showing several Incomplete when they are not (across all Branches) and why the pop outs are not providing correct information?

This is hindering my ability to provide completion metrics to leadership that are accurate.

Hi Ajay,

 

As discussed on call, the query on KNL_ORG_UNIT was the slowest  : 



 

 

 

We found below 2 Indexes was missing on collection KNL_ORG_UNIT which can cause slowness :

 

db.KNL_ORG_UNIT.createIndex({"domainNo":1,"unitLevel":1},{background:true,name:'UI_KNL_ORG_UNT_ULVL'});

db.KNL_ORG_UNIT.createIndex({"domainNo":1,"unitSkey":1},{background:true,name:'UI_KNL_ORG_UNT_USK'});

 

Please create the above indexes and monitor for next day

Regards,

Sachin

column11: All the batch jobs will run as per the provided time zone against the property "kernel.cron.default.timezone"
column17: The Quartz scheduler library was not working properly in GKE environments
column21: All the batch jobs will run as per the provided time zone against the property "kernel.cron.default.timezone"
column24:
We have validated same on local QA application cl07pt which is GKE, and there also the batches are getting executed properly based on respective time zones and not per UTC.

Refer attached reference of user import schedule and its actual run time.

schedule: '0 30 1,5 * * ?'
data:
  domainId: APPRL
  entity: USER_IMPORT
name: scheduleUSER_IMPORTBatchUpload
command: '@batchService.scheduleBatchUpload(domainId,entity)'
group: userImport

which is - 1:30am and 5:30 am - EST

!image-2025-07-14-15-28-33-981.png|width=458,height=228!

Executed on 9:30 UTC which is 5:30 EST.

Based on this observation, we are closing this ticket.
column25:
We have validated same on local QA application cl07pt which is GKE, and there also the batches are getting executed properly based on respective time zones and not per UTC.

Refer attached reference of user import schedule and its actual run time.

schedule: '0 30 1,5 * * ?'
data:
  domainId: APPRL
  entity: USER_IMPORT
name: scheduleUSER_IMPORTBatchUpload
command: '@batchService.scheduleBatchUpload(domainId,entity)'
group: userImport

which is - 1:30am and 5:30 am - EST

Executed on 9:30 UTC which is 5:30 EST.

Based on this observation, we are closing this ticket.

column3: Completed Walks Not Showing in AAR reporting
column7:
So far we have a few units that have reported not being completed walks in AAR reporting.  We were able to switch to the units and see the completed walks that are not pulling on the report by selecting the all walk feature.  We should be able to see there walk when pulling reporting.  The two walks that we know of right now are the Next Day Account Review and the Teller/Vault Surprise Cash Audit/Zero Balance Verification.  

Some of our affected units that we are aware of right now are Unit 379C4, 881N1, 860L4, and 607C2.

You can not see the walks in question on the Performance Analysis report

Author: Priya Kanojiya

column3: Reflexis User Load Processing Delay – Error Files One Day Behind
column7:
Hello,

We are currently facing an issue with the daily User Load process generated through Reflexis. Typically, we receive an email notification from Reflexis at around 9:30am each day with either a success or error message once the load is processed for the day.

However, since May 10, 2025, we’ve observed that the error notifications being received correspond to the previous day’s file, rather than the current day’s. Notably, no User Load was received on May 9, and ever since, the files being processed appear to be a day behind. (User load integration ran successfully on 9th May)

Ideally, Reflexis should receive and process the current day's file after Workday's User Load Integration runs, and the corresponding notification (with errors, if any) should reflect the same day’s data.
It is very important that the error file for a given day is generated and loaded on the same day, so all associates load into reflexis without any issue.

Attached are screenshots of notifications on 8th and 10th may for your reference.

Request you to please look into this issue and help resolve the misalignment in the file being processed.

Thanks,
Sruthi

column3: AP: Approval Notifications wording incorrect
column7: AP: Approval Notifications wording incorrect
column11:
Plan/ Project Approval workflow with different levels of approvers defined.
Plan/ Project Launch and all Post-launch events/ actions
Configuration Issue
column17: Configuration issue
column21:
We have configured a new rule, "Plan Approval Workflow All Message Rule" under the Project Approval Work Flow Notification RTM20 (PROJECTAPPRWRKFLW) flow.
	Plan Approval Workflow All Message Rule will be triggered for the Plan in case of Launch and Post-launch events for the approval flow.
column24:
*Validation Summary:* Updated Wording for Approval Notifications.

*Environment:* [https://mwdryrun05qa.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view]

*Test Version:* Task-26.1.0.2

*Summary:* The wording for *Approval Notifications* has been updated. Validation has been performed for both *Projects* and *Plans* under different workflow configurations.

*Test Scenarios Validated:*
h3. 1. *When "Plan Approval Workflow All Message Rule" is Enabled*
 * *Single Approver:*

 * 
 ** Submitted notification
 ** Launch notification
 ** Rejected notification
 ** Post Launch approval notification
 ** Post Launch rejected notification
 * *Multiple Approvers:*

 * 
 ** Submitted notification
 ** Launch notification
 ** Rejected notification
 ** Sent to prior approver
 ** Post Launch approval notification
 ** Post Launch rejected notification
 ** Post Launch sent to prior approver

h3. 2. *When "Plan Approval Workflow All Message Rule" is Disabled*
 * *Single Approver:*

 * 
 ** Submitted notification
 ** Launch notification
 ** Rejected notification
 ** Post Launch approval notification
 ** Post Launch rejected notification
 * *Multiple Approvers:*

 * 
 ** Submitted notification
 ** Launch notification
 ** Rejected notification
 ** Sent to prior approver
 ** Post Launch approval notification
 ** Post Launch rejected notification
 ** Post Launch sent to prior approver

*Status:* Approval notification wording functions as expected for both enabled and disabled configurations of the {*}Plan Approval Workflow All Message Rule{*}.

*Screenshot:*

!image-2025-10-16-16-46-31-209.png|width=422,height=177!

column3: Grupo Control PP: System is allowing mapping a user with a Corp profile  to a unit from field through the user load
column7:
Review the user file attached. All user records are mapped to a Unit from Zone level (ZONA12) to a Corporate profile (SUPERVISOR). When processing this file via a user data load, no error occurs and this is allowed (all records like this should actually get rejected)
For user ID TESTUSERZONE, it appears mapped to a Zone level unit, but no profile mapping occurs.  It even allows to map the SUPERVISOR profile to the GERENTE_ZONA profile (field level profile at zone level) at the same time. 

1. Login as SYSADMIN / GCTL$y$@dm!n22275 on https://gccpp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/GCTL.view
2. Go to Data Loads, choose user
3. Load file attached
4. ALl records will get processed as Successful
5. Go to User screen, search for TESTUSERZONE
6. See that on the first screen before going into the user record, it appears as it were mapped to the SUPERVISOR profile. When clicking on the user record, this user is not actually mapped to any profile. 

Expected result is that all of these user records should've gotten rejected as it is a discrepancy when mapping a field level unit to a corporate profile. However, records were successful.

See attached screenshot and user file

column24:
Hi Team,

Project types BT2 and OSK

====
{code:java}
SELECT rpe.PROJECT_ID, rpe.UNIT_ID, rpe.EXEC_FIN_DATE_SKEY, rpe.STATUS_SKEY, rpe.NUM_TOT_USER_TASKS ,rte.TASK_STATUS_SKEY, count(rte.TASK_STATUS_SKEY) AS #Task FROM RAR_PROJ_EXECUTION rpe , RAR_TASK_EXECUTION rte WHERE
rpe.DOMAIN_ID = 122580099
AND rpe.STATUS_SKEY =15
AND rpe.PROJECT_TYPE_SKEY IN (4000080, 4000055)
AND rpe.DOMAIN_ID = rte.DOMAIN_ID
AND rpe.UNIT_SKEY =rte.UNIT_SKEY
AND rpe.PROJECT_SKEY =rte.PROJECT_SKEY
AND rte.TEXC_COM_DATE_SKEY BETWEEN 20250304 AND 20250602
GROUP BY rpe.PROJECT_ID, rpe.UNIT_ID, rpe.EXEC_FIN_DATE_SKEY, rpe.STATUS_SKEY,rpe.NUM_TOT_USER_TASKS ,rte.TASK_STATUS_SKEY
HAVING rpe.NUM_TOT_USER_TASKS = count(rte.TASK_STATUS_SKEY) AND rte.TASK_STATUS_SKEY=5
ORDER BY rpe.EXEC_FIN_DATE_SKEY DESC; {code}

Author: Prasad Kalyanapu

column3: Force Closed Projects using Auto Complete
column7:
Trying to understand why Projects being "Completed" using the Auto Complete feature on Projects are showing as Force Closed in Reporting.

We set the Auto Complete to 100 days for all of our Wednesday Communication  & Scoop Projects (sent out weekly). I can see that several Projects from early January were closed by the system and within the Project Inbox, you can view the Project and the status is "Completed Late". However, when you view the Field View Execution Metrics Report (v2), they show under Force Closed. Should these not just show as Completed Late instead (we added that column in this report for v2)?

There is a difference between Force Closed and Completed Late, correct?

Also, to note - this was NOT the behavior prior to the 12/25/24 Wed Comm Project. If you look at the Wednesday Communication 12.04.2024 Project, there were many that were closed by the system on 3/22/25 and those are not showing in the same report as Force Closed. So it seems this behavior changed sometime before 12/25/24.

Can you look into this and provide more information on expected behavior. I have looked in Knowledge Center and cannot find any detailed information on how Force Closed or Auto Complete affect reporting, etc. 

Screenshots attached of examples and what I'm seeing.
column17: Due to Records not present in RRCProjectData  We are getting null pointer exception.
column21: Added null check in the for RRCProjectData.

waiting for client confirmation on the data fix.

column3: RFX - Coppel, S.A. de C.V.- No permite seleccionar la Caminata en "Caminata para Otros" | 21750979 (It doesn't allow you to select the Walk in "Walk for Others.")
column7: No permite seleccionar la Caminata en "Caminata para Otros", en los permisos de la Plantilla de Caminata si se le dio permiso para que el perfil de "Gerente de Departamento" de cualquier departamento pueda aplicarla, les comparto la evidencia.
column17:
It appears that when the template was initially created, schedule permissions were granted to the mentioned Profile ID and Department ID.

Currently, the department “TNDA” is no longer associated with the profile “SP004.” As a result, when a user accesses the template’s Access Permissions tab, the department name does not appear on the user interface, giving the impression that no department has been added to the permissions.
The user attempting to schedule the walk from the “Walk for Others” tab has the required profile but not the required department. So he will not be able to schedule the walk.
Same issue will replicate in the imported template.
column21: As a work around for this issue, please edit the template. Delete the existing permission, and then add the desired permission.

column25:
Hi Team, 

As user has already selected "No", when the popup was shown to him so we will have to correct the data in database.

Please note that it is not possible to have old questionnaire. Below data script will display the updated questionnaire.

  1. Update the Iteration Time to Override Time for the Instance.
  2. Set Override Flag to "Y"
  3. Delete Responder Session Data

 

db.getCollection("FORM_MODEL").updateOne({"DOMAIN_ID": NumberInt(122600099), "FORM_TRACE_ID": NumberLong(1746543967634)}, {$set: {"ITERATION_TIME": ISODate("2025-05-09T15:44:36.612Z"), "OVERRIDE_FLAG": "Y"}});

db.getCollection("WALK_SCHEDULE_INFO").updateOne({"DOMAIN_ID": NumberInt(122600099), "FORM_TRACE_ID": NumberLong(1746543967634)}, {$set: {"ITERATION_TIME": ISODate("2025-05-09T15:44:36.612Z")}});

db.getCollection("RESPONDER_SESSION_DATA").deleteOne({"DOMAIN_ID": NumberInt(122600099), "FORM_TRACE_ID": NumberLong(1746543967634)});

column3: AP: When copying a plan as a project, the duration isn't copied over properly
column7: AP: When copying a plan as a project, the duration isn't copied over properly
column11:
Project created from pre-plan:
1. Verify that if project is created from future dated plan then project duration is same as that of pre-plan duration.
2. Verify that if project is created from active plan (start date is passed but end date is in future) then project end date should be same as that of plan end date and start date is updated to current date.
3. Verify that if project is created from past dated plan then created project should be of one day duration with start date as current date.
column17: Handling was not to update project duration while creating project from pre-plan as per V16.
column21:
Added support to update project duration while creating project from pre-plan as below:
1. While creating project from future dated plan, project duration will remain same as that of pre-plan.
2. While creating project from active plan (Start date in past but end date in future), project end date will remain same as that of plan end date and start date will be updated to current date and working days will be updated accordingly.
3. While creating project from past dated plan, project will be created with one day duration with start date as current date irrespective of plan duration and working days.
This behavior is align with V16 behavior.

Author: Jaganmohan Devendraguru

column3: AP -Prerequisite Questions appear in plan summary for store users
column7:
In the plan type set up we have disabled the visibility of  the questions for the store users and field users. However, the questions and answer are still appearing. 

We have previously tested this in another system and the functionality worked as expected. 

Expected Results = When a store user opens the plan summary they can not see the list of prerequisite questions or answers. They just see a section called 'Information' with no details included 

Actual Results = The store user can all of the questions and answers in the plan calendar. 

Plan Type Used = Pilot 

Screen shot of the plan type set up has been added. For all of the questions the option to make them visible to field or store users has been disabled. 

I noticed this only seems to be a problem if I switch down from a corporate profile to the store profile, but I wanted to check as to whether this is an issue. Surely when we switched we should just see the store profiles permissions?
column11:
- Project/Plan summary with prerequisites from the creator's view. It should show the prerequisite.
- Project/Plan summary with prerequisites when the creator switches to the store. It should show the prerequisite if it is configured to show to the store user.
- Project/Plan summary with prerequisites from the store user view. It should show the prerequisite if it is configured to show to the store user.
- Project/Plan summary with prerequisites launched to the field user and from the field user's view. It should show the prerequisite if it is configured to show to the field user.
NOTE: The Prerequisite is shown on the basis of the user's unit category as per V16, and the same is maintained in V17.
column17: In the switch unit case, the logged-in user was not correctly identified as a store or field user.
column21: Added checks to classify the logged-in user as a field or store user based on summary view type or unit category, home unitId and current unit ID in case of switch unit.

column3: Unable to add locations to distribution lists
column7:
Hey Team, 

I'm unable to add locations to distribution lists. I've attached a MP4 for your review. Please look into this and report back as soon as you can. Thanks!
column24:
As discussed on call with [~HS8798] [~PA1587] [~YP3517] , we are not going ahead with any Kernel changes for the switch unit use case. *We are sticking to the existing Line of Sight implementation, where we define the LOS based on the context of the loggedIn unit and not* *on the context of the* *switched unit.* The customer can add these units to distribution list by logging in through any HO level user. The current LOS behaviour for the Unit Select under distribution lists is outlined in the table below. under the column name "Existing behaviour".

Also as communicated by [~PA1587] , the client has not raised the issue post 7th May and hence the priority had been decreased for the ticket. Assigning to L2 on Waiting for Info.

CC:[~AJ8037] [~JT9332] [~XVB863] [~AW7799] [~NB9129]
column25:
As discussed on call with Harsha Sutaone Priyanka Anumula Yogesh Prabu , we are not going ahead with any Kernel changes for the switch unit use case. We are sticking to the existing Line of Sight implementation, where we define the LOS based on the context of the loggedIn unit and not on the context of the switched unit. The customer can add these units to distribution list by logging in through any HO level user. The current LOS behaviour for the Unit Select under distribution lists is outlined in the table below. under the column name "Existing behaviour".

Also as communicated by Priyanka Anumula , the client has not raised the issue post 7th May and hence the priority had been decreased for the ticket. Assigning to L2 on Waiting for Info.

column11:
We have introduced a timeout mechanism in the Kernel Client jar communication with the Server, ensuring that requests are retried in case of any issues. This change addresses the intermittent project launch issue

Impact Analysis Document:

column21:
We have introduced a timeout mechanism in the Kernel Client jar communication with the Server, ensuring that requests are retried in case of any issues.
Client jar released
column24:
We have completed the testing for the hotfix introducing the timeout mechanism in the Kernel Client jar communication with the Server, aimed at resolving the intermittent project launch issue. 
Below is the update on the test results for the specified scenarios:

•	Multiple Project Launches for ALL Stores with High Unit Count: All projects launched successfully with no issues observed.
•	System Idle for 3 Hours Followed by Test Case 3: The system was kept idle for 3 hours, and subsequent execution of test case 3 resulted in successful project launches.
•	Multiple VU Load Test + Project Launch: The load test with 810 virtual users was conducted, and a total of nearly 600 projects + 40 program projects launched successfully.
•	Multiple VU Load Test + Large size Project Launch: Conducted load test with 10 projects launched at a time, with 15 tasks each.
column25:

Below is the update on the test results for the specified scenarios:

• Multiple Project Launches for ALL Stores with High Unit Count: All projects launched successfully with no issues observed.
• System Idle for 3 Hours Followed by Test Case 3: The system was kept idle for 3 hours, and subsequent execution of test case 3 resulted in successful project launches.
• Multiple VU Load Test + Project Launch: The load test with 810 virtual users was conducted, and a total of nearly 600 projects + 40 program projects launched successfully.
• Multiple VU Load Test + Large size Project Launch: Conducted load test with 10 projects launched at a time, with 15 tasks each.

column3: RFX - MAXIMA LATVIJA - Cannot create projects from templates | 21790723
column7:
Issue: Cannot create projects from templates. It shows an error. The issue is applicable almost to every template (there are 2 exceptions that I saw, templates "INFO: project type - AD preču grupu iepirkumu daļa" and "INFO: project type- tirdzniecības uzdevumi). A big part of office employees create projects from templates and it is slowing our work, especially with a project "Derīguma termiņi", from a template "Derīguma termiņu pārbaude".

Expectations: All templates are working and projects can be created from them.

Steps: 1. Log in to Prod; 2. Switch to DIVISION; 3. Go to Task Manager-Project Inbox; 4. Click on "Templates"; 5. As an example find a template "Derīguma termiņu pārbaude" and try to click on "Submit". It will show an error; 6. Then try to find a template "INFO: project type - AD preču grupu iepirkumu daļa" and try to submit it. It will be okay. 

We must fix this issue ASAP since it is a very important feature and we need all the templates to work well. Video in the attached.

Thanks
Steph

Author: Prasad Kalyanapu

column3: AP - Reserved Hours not showing in the 'Overall Hours' section of the Workload Screen
column7: I have created 2 plans commencing on the 20th of October, they both appear correctly in the gnatt view of the plan calendar. However when I switch to the 'Workload' screen the hours do not appear in the Overall Hours section as expected.
column17:
Root cause: 
The issue occurs in a corner case scenario:
Creator submits a plan to approver.
Approver proposes the plan.
Approver rejects the plan.
Creator edits the plan, reduces the efforts, and again submits to approver.
Approver approves.
column21: Fixed in TM-44132
column24:
Validated on : [https://knlcl79pp.reflexissystems.de/kernel/]

Credentials : SYSADMIN

Software Version : 25.7.1.5

Steps : 
 * Create a plan, Submit it to Sales Coordinator profile
 * Sales Coordinator profiles proposes a plan
 * Creator edits the proposed plan and re-submit to Sale Coordinator once again
 * Sale Coordinator profile approves the plan
 * No plan was rejected during this workflow

Now, after performing the above steps for multiple plans. We found that, the data seen in the plan calendar for specific weeks where the department capacity is defined in both workload & Gantt view. Reserved hours and Used hours are reflected correctly as per defined capacity.

PFA Snapshots.

Since this issue is working as expected, closing and marking this done.
column25:
Validated on : https://knlcl79pp.reflexissystems.de/kernel/

Credentials : SYSADMIN

Software Version : 25.7.1.5

Steps : 

  • Create a plan, Submit it to Sales Coordinator profile
  • Sales Coordinator profiles proposes a plan
  • Creator edits the proposed plan and re-submit to Sale Coordinator once again
  • Sale Coordinator profile approves the plan
  • No plan was rejected during this workflow

Now, after performing the above steps for multiple plans. We found that, the data seen in the plan calendar for specific weeks where the department capacity is defined in both workload & Gantt view. Reserved hours and Used hours are reflected correctly as per defined capacity.

PFA Snapshots.

Since this issue is working as expected, closing and marking this done.

column11: Kernel Batch Translations should come properly in ztm specific environments.
column17:
The "No translation found" issue on 03/15/2025 was because no translation was present for below mentioned keys that's why it was "No translation found for knl.security.import.process.log.recordSummary" like values
 
The translation was created on 04/01/2025 for de_AT and 05/01/2025 for en_US local
Because of which when the upload was done on 05/02/2025 it was showing correct values as File name and all

column24:
Hi [~NS2980], The resource type and estimated hours should never be displayed on Let's create screen for plans.

This is a data issue occurred due to the script provided in https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-53393.

If the data has been corrected with the scripts mentioned in this ticket and https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-55521, the issue will never come again.

You can validate this issue for the affected plan type and also by creating a new plan type. If the issue still exists, please assign the ticket back to engineering team.

cc: [~NG5443], [~RS7567]

Analysis details: ExampleI am attempting to update the logo from the kernel site, but the logo has not been changed.

I have performed a full restart and a rolling restart, yet the system continues to display the current logo. Although the image file uploads successfully, refreshing the page reverts it back to the original image.

Could you please advise on how to resolve this issue?
Steps To Replicate:

2. Navigate to Domain Configuration
3. Go to Basic Details -> Header Logo ->Replace File or Reset
4. File replace successfully 
5. Click on Save button -> Details updated .
6. Now Refersh the same page you will see page reverts it back to the original image.

9. As of now secondary color is set to RED and its applied to Quicklink Button background .

That should not be happen . I have taken the restart as well still its not working .Can you please check the issue I have added image for reference .

column7:
Hi Sonali,
We encountered an issue with when copying a project that the old roles are getting assigned the projects.
Replication steps-
We created 2 new roles GM and CSM,there by removing their assignment from the Deptmgr lead roles.
But when a project is copied and launched ,the system is sending these projects to GK for approval and GK has to make these changes.
The intention is that the application should not let them send to these roles since they no longer exist in the env.
Few screenshots are attached showing how the project without assignment is allowed to go to next stage with hitting next.
also project is sent for approval without assigned role.
Thanks,
Radhika
column11:
assignee selection on following screens:

- Project creation screen (pre and post launch)
- task screen (pre and post launch)
- simple project creation screen (pre and post launch).

For single assignment project, user will be forced to select new assignment on edit. For multi assignment only the available will be marked as selected by default. If none, user will need to select new assignment(s).

For task it will work same way, unless its multi assignment. In case of multi assignment, user wont be able to edit the task as the assignment is no longer visible for him, so it will need to be deleted and a new one created.

Same applies to simple project, for draft status it will require new assignment(s) to be selected, but for post launch edit its not possible to change assign.
column17: User could send a project/task to a assignee which he does not have access anymore
column21: User will only be able to assign project/task to values which he still have access / exists.

column11:
Issue: User is not able see updated Question Text after updating the Question Text from the UI.

Please find more details in my comment below:

https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-53329?focusedId=12673223&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-12673223
column17:
MYWORK default langCode and Kernel default langCode discrepancy caused this issue.
Technical Issue: 

Example:

In CL 12 PR for COPPEL Domain:

MYWORK Default Lang Code : en_US

Kernel Default Locale : es_MX

SWA was referring to MYWORK default lang code (en_US) to save translations in Domain Lang Keys Collection and hence Users were not able to see updated Question text when they logged in es_MX locale.

 

Impact Functions: Store Walk/Forms/Survey Template while saving Question/Option/Footnotes text.
column21: Corrective Action: SWA will now refer to Kernel base locale to save Question Data and there wont be a dependency for MYWORK default locale value.
column24:
I checked this issue on the latest GROCERY (v25.6.1.0) environment and found that the functionality is now working fine.

URL- [My Work|https://knlcl01uspt.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/GROCERY.view]

We deliberately mismatched the MyWork and Kernel locale values to en_US and es_MX respectively and checked the question/footnotes/options update mechanism while logged in the English locale and checking the updated text by logging in with the Spanish locale.

I was able to see the updated question text/footnote and options correctly in the Spanish locale even though I had updated the same in the English locale.

PFA the snapshots.

Closing this ticket.
column25:
I checked this issue on the latest GROCERY (v25.6.1.0) environment and found that the functionality is now working fine.

URL- My Work

We deliberately mismatched the MyWork and Kernel locale values to en_US and es_MX respectively and checked the question/footnotes/options update mechanism while logged in the English locale and checking the updated text by logging in with the Spanish locale.

column24:
[~PA1587] [~HS8798] 

We have modified the walk instance status from "Active" to "Incomplete" in Mongo and tested the ETL's. We don't have any impact on the RAR end.

After changing the status in Mongo, we are receiving the following ETLs ([^ETLMessages.txt]) to update the data in the RAR.

If the customer wants to resubmit the instance responses, we can change the instance status from ‘A’ (Active) to ‘I’ (Incomplete). However, if the customer does not submit the responses after changing the status, the responses will still be available in RAR. It is advisable to delete the data from the tables after changing the instance status in Mongo.

Run the delete script in RAR after changing the status in Mongo.

Please find the [^RAR_DeleteScripts.sql]delete scripts for 33 instances mentioned in ticket.

cc:[~DR8222] [~KT1298] [~PG6179] 

Thanks

Dileep G
column25:
Priyanka Anumula Harsha Sutaone 

We have modified the walk instance status from "Active" to "Incomplete" in Mongo and tested the ETL's. We don't have any impact on the RAR end.

After changing the status in Mongo, we are receiving the following ETLs (ETLMessages.txt) to update the data in the RAR.

If the customer wants to resubmit the instance responses, we can change the instance status from ‘A’ (Active) to ‘I’ (Incomplete). However, if the customer does not submit the responses after changing the status, the responses will still be available in RAR. It is advisable to delete the data from the tables after changing the instance status in Mongo.

Run the delete script in RAR after changing the status in Mongo.

Please find the RAR_DeleteScripts.sqldelete scripts for 33 instances mentioned in ticket.

cc:Dhanuskodi Rengasamy Kushalavareddy Thota Prashanth Geetla 

Thanks

Dileep G

column3: RFX - First National Bank Texas - Attachments & PDFs not opening/showing image | 21681614
column7: Attachments & PDFs are not opening/showing in walks that were conducted on today's date (4.21.25).  We have had several units reach out to us about this issue.  Not having the attachments, pictures, or PDFs show is critical to our auditing process.  Over 90% of the attachments today to our 'Teller/Vault Surprise Cash Audit/Zero Balance Verification' Walk attachment are unable to be opened for more than 30 unit (we stopped counting and there are still additional units)
column24:
[~KA6692] [~PA1587]:
The root cause of this issue was a problem with the  root certificate trusted list. The issue happened due to a google update and we have rais ed a ticket with google.
Meanwhile, our Cloud ops team have implemented a workaround by manually updating the trusted list. 

Walk attachments Recovery:
As Nikhil explained below, the attachmnets have not been stored anywhere, due to GCS connectivity issue.  As a result, we are unable to retrieve these attachments/images. 

In related ticket - TM-53314, we have suggested a workaround where the walk status could be changed to "I" and then users could resubmit the walks with the attachments. 
However, in case of this customer(First National Bank), there is a problem with this approach, as these walks have violatons and the violations have already been generated and also completed. 
Please discuss with the customer and update. 
I will also set up a call for Monday to answer any further questions.
CC:[~HS8798] [~UM2540] [~JD9860]
column25:
Komal Anbhule Priyanka Anumula:
The root cause of this issue was a problem with the root certificate trusted list. The issue happened due to a google update and we have rais ed a ticket with google.
Meanwhile, our Cloud ops team have implemented a workaround by manually updating the trusted list.

Walk attachments Recovery:
As Nikhil explained below, the attachmnets have not been stored anywhere, due to GCS connectivity issue. As a result, we are unable to retrieve these attachments/images.

In related ticket - TM-53314, we have suggested a workaround where the walk status could be changed to "I" and then users could resubmit the walks with the attachments.
However, in case of this customer(First National Bank), there is a problem with this approach, as these walks have violatons and the violations have already been generated and also completed.
Please discuss with the customer and update.
I will also set up a call for Monday to answer any further questions.

column7: We had a form raised today in which the colleague was able to edit the form title which confused the approval team. What permission allows this to happen?
column17: N/A
column21: Advised customer to raise a PIR.
column24:
Resolving the ticket.
There is push back from customer that this should not be treated as a PIR. However, this has been the design and intended behavior. The customer may only have noticed this now, but this has been the behavior from the beginning.
Change to this behavior is a change request and has to go through the Idea route. 
However, we will fast track the PIR internally. Will create  an internal epic to add a configuration to the Template and consider this for delivery by end of the year.
column25:
Resolving the ticket.
There is push back from customer that this should not be treated as a PIR. However, this has been the design and intended behavior. The customer may only have noticed this now, but this has been the behavior from the beginning.
Change to this behavior is a change request and has to go through the Idea route.
However, we will fast track the PIR internally. Will create an internal epic to add a configuration to the Template and consider this for delivery by end of the year.

column3: Lowes API Failures
column7: This case is to track the API failures Lowes has provided us
column17:
Assumption

In our application, sometimes when we insert a record and immediately try to fetch it, the fetch returns nothing, even though the record exists in db. We suspect this is happening because if primary nodes flips temporally and the new primary may not have the latest writes at the exact moment of read.
column21:
the readConcern and readPreference for the subsequent read request
	other potential cluster performance related issues. This is relevant if readPreference is secondary or secondary preferred or the query target is primary using non-default readConcern



Base on this we have made code changes when userseeion is null.
column24:
*Code Review Done* – Yes

*Impact* 

Mywork's /loginSuccess API.

Assumption:- In our application, sometimes when we insert a record and immediately try to fetch it, the fetch returns nothing, even though the record exists in db. We suspect this is happening because if primary nodes flips temporally and the new primary may not have the latest writes at the exact moment of read.

*Code changes -*

the readConcern and readPreference for the subsequent read request
other potential cluster performance related issues. This is relevant if readPreference is secondary or secondary preferred or the query target is primary using non-default readConcern
Base on this we have made code changes when usersession is null.
 
*Junit Test Case Done*

cc: [~DN2676] [~RJ5203] [~PG5466] [~CR4339]

Impact 

Mywork's /loginSuccess API.

We suspect this is happening because if primary nodes flips temporally and the new primary may not have the latest writes at the exact moment of read.

Code changes -

the readConcern and readPreference for the subsequent read request
other potential cluster performance related issues. This is relevant if readPreference is secondary or secondary preferred or the query target is primary using non-default readConcern
Base on this we have made code changes when usersession is null.

column3: Inbox Filter Update
column7:
Hi Sonali,

Can you walk me through this inbox filter update?  We need to be able to see and search all projects.  
When I open up the filter and try to change the duration it is not working.  

We need a simple way to click to search all projects in all statuses.

Can we change the default setting on this?

-Laura
column17: Please see Comments
column21: Information provided
column24:
Hi [~JD9860]

Please refer to the confluence for updating the default configuration for Inbox screen - https://confluence.zebra.com/x/0g0WJw.
As per engineering recommendation, it is better to keep the value as 365 days but the default values can be changed for customer up to 3-4 years if there are not much projects created for the customers. 
There is an additional status filter applied on default landing screen which will be limiting the search. Refer to the same confluence page for updating the configuration, if required. 
*Impact:* Performance of default landing of Inbox screen may degrade with increasing the default and max duration days and including completed projects.

*Please note that the configuration should be changed only by the exception for the customers who really wants to search from old projects.*

Improvement for UI would be developed against the Epic TM-51520

cc: [~RS7567], [~KR8296], [~JT9332]
column25:
Hi Jaganmohan Devendraguru

Please refer to the confluence for updating the default configuration for Inbox screen - https://confluence.zebra.com/x/0g0WJw.
As per engineering recommendation, it is better to keep the value as 365 days but the default values can be changed for customer up to 3-4 years if there are not much projects created for the customers.
There is an additional status filter applied on default landing screen which will be limiting the search. Refer to the same confluence page for updating the configuration, if required.
Impact: Performance of default landing of Inbox screen may degrade with increasing the default and max duration days and including completed projects.

Please note that the configuration should be changed only by the exception for the customers who really wants to search from old projects.

Improvement for UI would be developed against the Epic TM-51520

column3: RTM: Need to disable ability for user to edit form title
column7:
The user is able to edit the title of a form when they are submitting it.
We use forms for several types of communication, so the form title is crucial in determining what the team is sharing and in reporting (for tracking specific issues).
We need the ability for users to change the form name to be disabled for forms.
I could not locate a permission switch/button in the form itself for turning off editing the form name.  Perhaps, there is one located somewhere else in the module and we just need some direction on where to find it.  Otherwise, we need Zebra to make changes.
(See attached video.)
Thanks for your help.
Stefanie

column21: Configuration
column25:
Hi Sai Krishna Ravula 

You can run the below provided query in this environment to resolve the issue.
Note: If the issue persists after executing the query, please try restarting and checking again.

var updateResult = db.getCollection("SERVICE_ROUTER").updateMany(
    { "SERVICE_PARAM.request.class":"javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest" },
    { $set:
        { "SERVICE_PARAM.request.class":"jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest" }
    }
);
print("Service Router updated HttpServletRequest documents: " + updateResult.modifiedCount);
 
var updateResult2 = db.getCollection("SERVICE_ROUTER").updateMany(
    { "SERVICE_PARAM.response.class":"javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse" },
    { $set:
        { "SERVICE_PARAM.response.class":"jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse" }
    }
);
print("Service Router updated HttpServletResponse documents: " + updateResult2.modifiedCount);
 
var updatedResult3 = db.getCollection("SERVICE_ROUTER").updateMany(
    { "SERVICE_PARAM.httpSession.class":"javax.servlet.http.HttpSession" },
    { $set:
        { "SERVICE_PARAM.httpSession.class":"jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession "}
    }
);

column11: This issue is fixed under : https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-50626
column17:
Issue	Multiple DA statements sent for RAR_WALK_RATING
Root cause	At the time of publishing the template, Delete All statement was getting sent while preparing Insert statement for each Lang Code.
Due to this, only Rating data for one lang code would get saved in the RAR Table.
Fix	As a fix for this issue, we have updated the code to send Delete All Statement only once at the time of Publish
Code Review Done	Yes
Internal Impact – (Function Areas)	Create Walk Template -> Add score data -> Publish the template (Verify that env has multiple langCodes enabled)
External Impact – Product Names	RAR
Manual Test	Yes. Verify that DA statement is received only once for RAR_WALK_RATING

column3: Monro - Prod - Walk Execution Store Walk Filtering
column7:
When setting a filter in the Store Walk Execution screen, it works correctly the first time it is used, but if you make any changes to the filter, it doesn't retain the original criteria. 

For example, if you set it to one unit and apply the filter, you get the intended results, but if you go back into the filter, expand the date range, and reapply the filter, you will get all units, not just the one you set it for.

The reporting I'm referring to is in Quality Control > Execution > Store Walk.
column11:
Issue: Filter options are not getting retained in walk template execution screen.
The issue is happening when we edit the filter and add new fields and click Apply.
The previous settings in the filter are not retained.

Impact Area: Walk Instance Filter
column17: Technical Issue: Walk Date filter and Unit Filter did not get already selected parameters when User edits and clicks on Apply again.
column21:
Corrective Action: Code fix done to retain the already selected filter options.

Replication Steps:

	Select Walk Date Range and Unit filter options and click on Apply.
	
		Walk Instance Filter will work correctly and will show filtered results.
	
	
	Open Walk Instance Filter again and observe previously selected filter options are still visible and then click on Apply
	
		Observe: Walk Instance Filter does not give correct filtered results (Fixed under this issue)

column3: Justin Esasky No Store Assigned in Walk
column7:
See attached.
Justin is trying to complete an assigned Walk. When he goes to start the Walk, he gets an error message that no store is assigned though the Walk does say its for Store 5138. I cannot select a store for him. I cannot remove the Walk.
column24:
Hi Team,

SWA Analysis: 
{code:java}
// WALK_SCHEDULE_INFO
{DOMAIN_ID:120990099, MODEL_ID:"FORM_155", SCHEDULE_CATEGORY : "R", ASSIGN_UNIT : "STR05138"}

2 records found
FORM_TRACE_ID : 1720065643252   // created on 2024-07-04
FORM_TRACE_ID : 1728014426406   // created on 2024-10-04{code}
Both instances were generated using Repeating setup. 

The instance "1728014426406" was also conducted & submitted by a user. This means that that the UNIT "STR05138" was previously present in the distribution list.

 

The template was later edited on 2024-10-30, and 2024-11-06.
It seems like the Store was removed from the distribution during these edits, but the Walk instance for that store had already been generated.

Therefore, user is not able to conduct this walk.

This is working as Expected.

Cc: [~NP5386]

Author: Vishal Kulkarni

column3: Repeating Walks Missing 31 March 2025
column7:
A unit reported yesterday that all of the daily repeating walks under the Petrol category were not visible only the weekly one.

Having looked at other sites who have the daily repeating Walks assigned under Petrol, the pattern has been repeated. Please could I have your help t understand why these Walks were not there and if others have been impacted please?
column17:
Technical Issue: The Walk Repeating Conduit ran on March 31st at 12:00 AM UTC to check if any instance needed to be generated for the day. However, the compareDates utility method did not account for DST (Daylight Saving Time) and incorrectly returned that the instance had already been generated. As a result, the process skipped the instance creation.

Root Cause: The system did not use the correct offset while comparing dates.
column21:
Corrective Action: The system has been updated to use the raw offset when comparing dates to ensure instances are generated correctly.

Replication Steps:

	Create a Walk Template with units in the WET time zone and set the Walk Start Date to 12:00 AM daily.
	Verify if the walk instance is being generated according to the unit time zone.
column24:
URL: https://knlcl01uspt.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view

Version: 25.6.1.0

Unit Used: 010103, 010104, 010106, 01034, 01035

Time zone: Europe/Budapest, Indian/Mahe, US/central, Europe/London, WET

Instance time: 12 AM, 4 AM, 6 PM and 10 PM

Scenario:
 * Verify user is able create a  repeating walk instance with different time zone with different units
 * Verify user is able to schedulw the walk in different time 
 * Verify walk instance should be generated with scheduled time according to the unit time zone
 * Verify user is able to submit the walk with response 
 * Verify user is able to view the walk instance with response in reports

Note: As mentioned in previous comment, new ticket will be raised to the track the issue,

column24:
Hi [~NS2980] 

As discussed, this is not a bug.

Database refresh being performed to only one module will result in data discrepancies with other products. Going forward, can you please plan the refresh to be done for Kernel as well so that data is kept in sync.

For resolution on current scenario:
 * RWS only client : 
 ** Perform complete Sync of Units as there can be Units with different hierarchical structure as RWS is refreshed from another database.
 * RTM & RWS Integrated client (For this scenario, there are two options that can be followed):
 ## Dataload - 
 *** Create Unit dataload file with complete Units data as per existing RWS and import the same into Kernel.
 ## Sync
 *** Unlicense RTM20 temporarily.
 *** Perform complete Sync of Units using trigger.
 **** Note that in this case, the source of truth for Unit data will be RWS as trigger will sync units by getting data from RWS. 
 *** License RTM20

*Note:*
 * Syncing the units by using trigger will clear all the existing data from Kernel and sync the complete data from RWS.
 * After syncing , ensure to perform *Publish* as updated units information has to be synced into RAR.
 ** Publish All Units Modified Notification

Please let us know in case of any queries.

cc: [~AJ8037] [~ML2529] [~AW7799] [~XVB863]
column25:
Hi Neha Shukla 

As discussed, this is not a bug.

Database refresh being performed to only one module will result in data discrepancies with other products. Going forward, can you please plan the refresh to be done for Kernel as well so that data is kept in sync.

For resolution on current scenario:

  • RWS only client : 
    • Perform complete Sync of Units as there can be Units with different hierarchical structure as RWS is refreshed from another database.
  • RTM & RWS Integrated client (For this scenario, there are two options that can be followed):
    1. Dataload - 
      • Create Unit dataload file with complete Units data as per existing RWS and import the same into Kernel.
    2. Sync
      • Unlicense RTM20 temporarily.
      • Perform complete Sync of Units using trigger.
        • Note that in this case, the source of truth for Unit data will be RWS as trigger will sync units by getting data from RWS. 
      • License RTM20

Note:

  • Syncing the units by using trigger will clear all the existing data from Kernel and sync the complete data from RWS.
  • After syncing , ensure to perform Publish as updated units information has to be synced into RAR.
    • Publish All Units Modified Notification

Please let us know in case of any queries.

cc: Ankit Jain Mamidi Lakshmi Ranganath Avdhoot Walvekar Vernekar Anil

column17: Google Android System Webview issue
column21: Informed customer
column24:
[~AL5699]:
We are not fixing this issue as this is not our code related. This issue relates to Android System Webview. This bug appears to have appeared in v 134.0.70xx. Google is releasing the fix in Android System Webview v 136.0.70xx on April 22/23. Customers should be advised to upgrade to that version.
Meanwhile, the interim solution is for customers to downgrade the Android System Webview v 134.0.70xx to 128.x.x. They can do this by following these steps.
Access Settings: Open your device's settings
Navigate to Apps: Scroll down and tap on "Apps" or "Application Manager".
Select the App: Locate and select the app named "Android System Webview" whose update you want to uninstall.
Open the Menu: Tap the three dots (menu) in the top right corner.
Uninstall Updates: Choose "Uninstall Updates".
Confirm: Confirm when prompted.

column3: History not updating for Comms in Android App
column7:
Hi
When testing pre prod today we are seeing that history is not updating correctly in the Android App for Comms. I have attached 2 screenshots, the first a snip of the desktop taken at 15.13 which shows the 105 Test Partner had been in the comm at 15.11 and 15.12 - the second showing 15.17 on the Android app for the same comm and no history showing. 
Interestingly if Reviewed is pressed it seems the history immediately populates 
Please could you have a look at this and let us know why the lag and if there is anything that can be done, thanks.
column11: History updated immediately after the user reviews a thread.
column17: Based on having history, we call the history service, but the issue was that the history was not updating locally immediately, causing us to avoid the history service call.
column21: We are updating the feed that has been viewed/reviewed/or any action taken, so that the history flag is updated as soon as the user views/reviews/or any action taken for a feed. This will trigger the history service call immediately.
column24:
I checked this issue on the latest MyWork mobile application (v25.5.1.0) and found that the functionality is now working fine.

The user is now able to see the history details of the project correctly when he reviews the project by clicking on it. Manual refresh of the whole filter/page is not required now.

PFA the video snippet.

Closing this ticket.

column7:
Issue: Users cannot open MyWork through the phone. Some users with Samsung devices A14/ A15  need to restart their devices, clear cache memory and close it as a background app, for it to start (but it is only for the current moment, then they will need to do it all over again every time). Our IT team reinstalled the apps for all users that had these problems but it didn't work. The other devices, for an example Honeywell, works well.

Expections: Users can enter MyWork mobile 

Steps: 1. Go to Prod MyWork through mobile; 2. Users see the white screen; 3. Try to delete cash memory; 4. Open app again, it says "App is not reachable" and it offers to close the app.

See the screenshot in the attached.

column3: URGENT - Batch jobs need returning to correct time following maintenance
column7:
Hi Sophie - the batch jobs that deliver all our projects seem to have been moved during the maintenance. These are still running at the wrong time, they were all delivered at 3:15am this morning instead of 1:30am. 

Please can these be moved back to the correct time as our night fire walk is missing it's time slot. 

Can you confirm when this has been done so I can inform the business? 

Thanks
Iain
column11: Schedule batch triggering at correct timings.
column17: There was an issue in the locking mechanism of scheduled batches, causing a delay in triggering batches.
column21: Changes have been added to release the lock immediately once JVM executes the batch.
column24:
I checked the launch time of the project that I had created yesterday, and it's launching at the correct time set in the environment.

The job is set to be run at 0330 hours, and the launch time suggests (UTC) that the repeating instance was created at the same time, even though DST is in effect on the environment.

PFA the snapshot.

Closing this ticket.

Author: Aakarsh Gupta [X]

column3: Violations Disappear
column7:
When creating the Gap Check for Q2 in pre prod it was noted that some violations were missing when a question was selected as 'issue, Minor Issue or Major Issue'.

On checking the violations were all present in the build and had previously worked. It was found that when we deleted the violation and rebuilt it it then would flow through when 'issue, Minor Issue or Major Issue' was selected.
After running some test I believe when i change the sequence of my questions this is what has caused the violation to not flow through. 
I have never had this issue before and it is not unusual for us to realign (adjust the sequence of our questions ) during the build.  This has caused a lot of extra work in our testing as we have had to : 
1. Establish if the violations were built correctly
2. Retest multiple times
3. Try and work out the cause of the issue i.e. Human error or system based
4. Rebuild all the violations that failed (approx. 15)
5. Retest once these were rebuilt.

If this could please be reviewed as to why this is now happening that would be appreciated as it is going to add to our workload if we have to rebuild and retest a violation every time we move a question.

I will send a video through shortly.
Thank you, 
Karen

column3: RFX - CO-OPERATIVE GROUP LTD - Stores unable to access MyWork - stuck on loading screen | 21347301
column7:
We have been receiving reports that stores are having trouble logging into MyWork.

When trying to log in, the screen is then freezing, or they just seen the spinning wheel and then that freezes.

The issue is effecting the app on Zebra HHT's, tablets and personal devices.

We have found that wiping the data from the app works, however this is only temporary and the store is again unable to log into MyWork.

Please find attached screenshots of what our stores can see when the log in.

Please can this be looked into urgently.

column3: Discrepancies in job codes and users.
