For instance, the first attachment is the project.  You can see that there is a small box icon and then an image of a chart that looks nice in the notes section during creation.

However, on the PDF export, BOTH images are squished and unreadable.

column3: QWALK: The group and the question in the walk cannot be deleted
column7:
Issue: In the walk "Augļu un dārzeņu kvalitātes pārbaude / Fruits and vegetables quality control" the group "Atbilstība specifikācijai / Compliance to specification" and the question in it cannot be deleted. It shows that this question has a skip option, even though there's no skip options in the walk.

Expectations: The group "Atbilstība specifikācijai / Compliance to specification" and the question in it will be deleted.

Steps: 1. Log in to prod; 2. Open "Walk"; 3. Open "Show Walk Template"; 4. Open "Kvalitātes pārbaudes"; 5. Open "Augļu un dārzeņu kvalitātes pārbaude / Fruits and vegetables quality control" walk; 6. Go to "Questionnaire"; 7. Open the first group "Atbilstība specifikācijai / Compliance to specification" and try to delete a.) the group itself; b.) the question in it. It will show that the question in this group has a skip option and it cannot be deleted.

Video is in the attached.
column11: Users can delete the question if the question does not have any dependence.
column17: Question level Zombie skip data is available for the Non pick-one, pick-many, and yes-no type questions.
column21:
While deleting the question, it will not check the question level data for the Non pick-one, pick-many, and yes-no type questions.

Also, new zombie data for the pick-one, pick-many, and yes-no type questions, will not be created.

column3: RFX - CVS Pharmacy, Inc. - RTM Advanced Analytics not capturing ESS & SM activity | 20383303
column7:
I received my weekly report for Store Manager App logins & I noticed that the logins dropped by nearly 50% from Week 10/27 to 11/3. I expanded the filters on the report to include all App Ids (SM, ESS, QAUDIT, QCHAT, MYWORK, PINBOARD) for the mobile activity from 11/5 - 11/12. All activity completely stops for both the WFM apps (SM & ESS) after Calendar Date 11/7/24 after 3 PM UTC. I just was able to log into both ESS & SM apps in the Production version of the apps successfully and neither logins are picked up on the report. It seems that something is not syncing up from the RTM side of Cognos for the WFM mobile apps. 

Please see the attached report, which includes a Pivot table showing the drop-off of activity compared to the RTM apps. This is the path for the report in the RTM Cognos: Team content > CVS > WFM > SM App Logins

Prod Test User

column3: Template at Region Execution Level
column7: I tried to clone Case #20252267, but am getting an error. I copied the Action Template in PP and changed the Execution to Region. It made we reset up Project Properties. However it will not enable me to select the option to turn on feedback/survey on task, while the Action Template does. Why is this different for different execution levels? should be able to do a survey no matter the execution level? Template Code AX is the new one I'm testing for Region.
column24:
Hi [~NS2980] 

We saw older tickets of V16 where properties were turned on for some clients in production.

But the base scripts of v16 this was not supported, so the same has been propagated to V17.

We understand that client wants to use this functionality, but we would suggest not enabling directly in production. 

We would request client to raise a PIR, so that PDM can take a look at it, decide priority and then we can take this up. After enabling, let it go through proper QA cycle with all scenarios tested, so that we don't have any surprises.

[~DR8222] - Just FYI, since impact will be there on reporting end as well.
column25:
Hi Neha Shukla 

We saw older tickets of V16 where properties were turned on for some clients in production.

But the base scripts of v16 this was not supported, so the same has been propagated to V17.

We understand that client wants to use this functionality, but we would suggest not enabling directly in production. 

We would request client to raise a PIR, so that PDM can take a look at it, decide priority and then we can take this up. After enabling, let it go through proper QA cycle with all scenarios tested, so that we don't have any surprises.

Dhanuskodi Rengasamy - Just FYI, since impact will be there on reporting end as well.

column24:
Hi [~RS7567] ,

SWA API : MYWORK/model/getFormTemplates

Above API will fetch External Walk Templates which are currently active.

Meaning, Walk Template Start Date should be in past and Walk Template End Date should be in future as per current Date.

So once Walk Template becomes inactive then this API will not return the Walk Template in the response.

 

Please verify and resolve the issue if Project copy API does not copy inactive External Surveys as this should be as per functionality.

 

[~PA1587] ,

 Walk Template 'ATM Spot Check Scheduled' is currently in Published status.
modelId: FORM_135

As this External Walk Template End date was 2024-11-14T23:59:59.000+00:00, SWA will not return this as a response as Walk Template is now inactive.

This is as per functionality and hence not an issue.

Please verify issue with new External Walk Template which has active effective dates.

CC:[~NP5386]

column7:

I click through the steps to creating the task to save it, and when I return into that task the changes to priority are not kept.

I am attaching pictures of the process I am taking. I'm also attaching a picture showing which walk I am specifically working in. Please let me know if there is any other information you need from me. It seems to do it across profiles I am able to edit the template in. It also seems to do it no matter what priority I change it to from normal.
column11: Verify Walk template -> Violation Task -> Add/ Edit Violation Task
column17: In case of priority, the data was saved correctly but the issue was in the UI. The priority was getting set to the default value upon component initialization.
column21: As a fix, value saved by the user will not be overriden by default value when he opens the Violation Task Popup.
column24:
I checked this issue on the latest environment (v25.2.1.0) and found that the functionality is working fine.

The user now sees the correct priority that he originally selected when he opens up the violation task for editing. Also, the URL is correctly retained in the task when it's originally saved by the user and opened up for editing later.

Refer attached video-:[^Video Screen1736322083865.webm]

hence closing this issue.

column3: Incorrect language via the API for splitted projects
column7:
We tested the splitted projects in the pre-production environment.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a splitted project in the master language German
1. Selection of several countries (e.g. DE + AT)
Recording the translations
3. Selection of markets in DE and AT
4. Publish the splitted project
5. Release by gatekeeper and quality gate
Actual situation: The AT-specific translations/adaptations, e.g. of the titles and descriptions of the projects and tasks, do not arrive in AT, but the projects and tasks appear in the AT market in the German master language (see example in appendix).
Target situation: The projects and tasks of the austrian translations should arrive in AT and not in the German master language

To view the issue:

	Go to Docs
	Change the language to English US
	Go to Customer Service
	Select service training (PDF)
	See the issue
	Now select Customer Service (JPG)
	See this works okay



Thank you

Nick

Author: Rohit Sonar

column3: Create project from a template not honouring timings - times seem to be switched from am to pm
column7: Even though I have defined a start and end time on the project template, when creating a project from a template the timings are not honoured and seem to be switched from am to pm.
column11: Template, project creation for time sensitive project and time sensitive tasks, with both AM and PM timings.
column17: When a user selects PM times from the UI, they're passed as 21H30M format. But while preparing the Date objects for the same, Calendar APIs were used to set hour and minute fields. Calendar API Calendar.set(Calendar.HOUR, 21) works on a 12-hour format, and passing hour values more than 11 causes time to overflow and convert into AM timings.
column21: Changes have been added to use the Calendar.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 21) API, which works in a 24-hour format. The same issue was present for time-sensitive tasks, so changes were also added for that.
column24:

Additionally, if the issue occurs again, please immediately copy the XML files and relevant logs from those days to the ticket. This information would be important in helping us resolve the issue.

column3: Reporte no actualizado - Completed Late Status not Changing to Completed on Time after Project Date Extension
column7:
Buen día,

Se encontró en un reporte, con datos no actualizados, sobre una tarea con nombre de "CALIDAD-  ACTUALIZACIÓN DE RETIRO DE PRODUCTOS DE CENTRO DE FABRICACIÓN (SÓLO LOS SKUS QUE SE INDICAN)", indicando que como fecha inicio tenia 22-10-2024 al 22-10-2024 con duración de 1 día. donde se edito la fecha del 22-10-2024 al 23-10-2024 con duración de 2 días.
Estas actualización no se muestra en el "reporte predeterminado de la herramienta" que adjunto como imagen.
También no actualizando el status de dicha tarea adjunto imágenes.
column11: On project edit, case the store completion is before the new project version end date, the store status will be set to 'Completed on time'.
column17: Store status was being kept as 'Completed late' even when project end date was changed to be after the store completion date
column21: Store status now considers the new project version end date. If the end date did not change, no change will be done on status. If the end date is now past the store completion date, it will be changed from 'Completed late' to 'Completed on time'

column3: myWalk: PM Daily Compliance Checklist did not generate 11/1/24
column7:
The PM Daily Compliance Checklist did not generate for stores CVS09663 and CVS09275 on 11/1/24. We can see the walks generated 11/2/24 and are currently generating correctly.

Can you please look into why this walk did not generate for these two stores on this one particular day?

I've attached a screenshot of both stores' ques showing the missing PM Daily Compliance Checklist.
column11:
Walk Schedule conduit did not generate walk instances for some units
Internal Impact – (Function Areas)	Walk Schedule Conduit
column17: Kernel API to fetch attribute units did not return a valid response and hence walk instances were not scheduled to those units. Also next schedule date was updated to next day as the system was able to schedule instances for other units.
column21: Next Schedule Date should not get updated unless walk instances are scheduled to all units. Code changes are done to wait for the next iteration to fetch valid response from kernel and only then the next schedule date will be updated.

column3: Desktop/Mobile Walk: Repeating Walks Had Incorrect Start Date After Daylight Savings Time
column7: On Sunday, 11/3/24, all of the repeating walks for the day have a start and end time that is an hour earlier than what it is scheduled for. I've attached an example of the AM Daily Compliance Checklist from one of our stores in Pennsylvania where it should be starting at 4 AM EST and ending at 12 PM EST, but it starts at 3 AM EST and ends 11 AM EST.
column11:
Note to QA: Please verify Walk Schedule/ Conduit functionality by generating repeating walks.
Issue : Walk is scheduled at an incorrect walk start time and walk end time because of DST.

Walks should be scheduled at correct Walk Start and Walk End Time as per Unit Timezone.

Internal Impact – (Function Areas)	Walk Schedule Conduit

This specific issue may not be tested until DST starts on March 9 but we can verify the basic functionality meanwhile.
column17: System did not calculate the timezone offset properly
column21: Code fix done to calculate offset correctly so that walks can be scheduled at correct time regardless of DST.
column24:
I had created three different repeating walks (with different setup) in HOSPITALITY (v25.2.0.7) to check the generation of repeating instances.

All of these instances were generated successfully via the two generation triggers, i.e. via the application and via the conduit.

The information about these walks is mentioned under TM-44999.

Closing this ticket on the basis of these observations. The validation regarding DST is still pending as it's yet to start. QA shall validate that separately.

column7: A store (0528) is having an issue trying to send a message to the option for SSC Department. Author: Prasad Kalyanapu

column3: Form signatures window "Name" do not work correctly
column7:
Issue: While filling out all types of forms and putting a signature, in the window where the transcript of the signature should be written manually (person's name, surname) it shows only Form owner's name and surname without a chance to edit it.
Expectations: The window "Name" for the signature's transcript (name, surname) is free to be edited.
Steps: 1.Log in to Prod 2. Switch to Test Store 1 - Store Director; 3 Open Forms- Execution-Form; 4. Open My Forms; 5. Open Create Form Instance; 6. Open Employee Vacations - "Darbinieka atvaļinājuma pieteikums"; 7. Fill out all the needed information - Click "Next"; 8. Fill out and click "Next"; 9. Click "Next"; 10. The info in a summary shows an employee's name and surname (It is correct in this step)- Click "Sign & Submit"; 11. In the window "Name" is automatically written Store Director's (Form owner's) name, but it needs to be editable for the employee to fill out.

Video is in the attached.
column11:
Not a bug.
New feature configuration added.
Here are the changes we are now adding as part of the hotfix :
1) Allow user to input "Name" in the Name field below the free form Signature field.
2) Limit the characters that can be input to 100. 
=> SYSTEM_CODES to determine the max char limit as below (Default Value is 100, max can be till 500):
"ATTR_TYPE": "PULSE_SETUP",
"ATTR_ID": "SIGNATURE_NAME_CHAR_LIMIT",
"ATTR_VALUE": "100"
3) Enable Configuration of this field - default set to "Disable user name input".
=> SYSTEM_CODES to determine the if user name input is disabled as below (Default Value is N):
"ATTR_TYPE": "PULSE_SETUP",
"ATTR_ID": "SIGNATURE_NAME_ENABLE_FLAG",
"ATTR_VALUE": "N"
=> N means input field will be disabled.
=> Y means input field will be enabled.
column17: Not a bug. Working as designed.
column21: Provided information.  However, based on customer ask, created a new feature configuration.
column24:
We have validated this issue on latest hotfix build 24.10.2.5 on FARMACITY client (Pre-prod environment) and found that issue is working fine.

URL :  [https://knlcl17pp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/controller/ui/security/configurer/domaineditor/FARMACITY.view]

Credentials : SYSADMIN/M1nDSt0rmSYSADM@1218

As per [~PK3866] 's previous comment; issue is working fine on web accordance to the changes which are added as part of this hotfix.

_1) Allow user to input "Name" in the Name field below the free form Signature field. :_ "{*}Working"{*}
_2) Limit the characters that can be input to 100._
_=> SYSTEM_CODES to determine the max char limit as below (Default Value is 100, max can be till 500):_
_"ATTR_TYPE": "PULSE_SETUP",_
_"ATTR_ID": "SIGNATURE_NAME_CHAR_LIMIT",_
_"ATTR_VALUE": "100" :_ "{*}Working - User is now able to add name with character length 100 and not more than that" Values more than 100 will not be saved, System will throw an error and will notify to pass value which is set to 100"{*}
_3) Enable Configuration of this field - default set to "Disable user name input"._
_=> SYSTEM_CODES to determine the if user name input is disabled as below (Default Value is N):_
_"ATTR_TYPE": "PULSE_SETUP",_
_"ATTR_ID": "SIGNATURE_NAME_ENABLE_FLAG",_

_ATTR_VALUE": "N"_
_=> N means input field will be disabled. -_ "{*}If "N" is present, Name is not editable. User has to submit the form/walk with the default form/walk owner's name"{*} 
{_}=> Y means input field will be enabled. "{_}{*}If "Y" is present/enabled in the domain config. user can edit the name and provide value upto 100 characters successfully. Same has been validated in form/walk reports" Please find attached snapshots.{*}

Form Template name : Zebra 1911 24Copy-TESTING LT 24 

Walk Template name : Zebra -Ability to edit walk template @09/07

Since this issue has been fixed only for web, we have validated on web and found that this is working fine. 

Mobility related issue can tracked under this EPIC :https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-48920.

As this issue is working fine on latest hotfix release, closing and marking this as DONE.
column25:
We have validated this issue on latest hotfix build 24.10.2.5 on FARMACITY client (Pre-prod environment) and found that issue is working fine.

URL :  https://knlcl17pp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/controller/ui/security/configurer/domaineditor/FARMACITY.view

Credentials : SYSADMIN/M1nDSt0rmSYSADM@1218

As per Prasad Kalyanapu 's previous comment; issue is working fine on web accordance to the changes which are added as part of this hotfix.

1) Allow user to input "Name" in the Name field below the free form Signature field. : "Working"
2) Limit the characters that can be input to 100.
=> SYSTEM_CODES to determine the max char limit as below (Default Value is 100, max can be till 500):
"ATTR_TYPE": "PULSE_SETUP",
"ATTR_ID": "SIGNATURE_NAME_CHAR_LIMIT",
"ATTR_VALUE": "100" : "Working - User is now able to add name with character length 100 and not more than that" Values more than 100 will not be saved, System will throw an error and will notify to pass value which is set to 100"
3) Enable Configuration of this field - default set to "Disable user name input".
=> SYSTEM_CODES to determine the if user name input is disabled as below (Default Value is N):
"ATTR_TYPE": "PULSE_SETUP",
"ATTR_ID": "SIGNATURE_NAME_ENABLE_FLAG",

ATTR_VALUE": "N"
=> N means input field will be disabled. - "If "N" is present, Name is not editable. User has to submit the form/walk with the default form/walk owner's name" 
=> Y means input field will be enabled. "If "Y" is present/enabled in the domain config. user can edit the name and provide value upto 100 characters successfully. Same has been validated in form/walk reports" Please find attached snapshots.

Form Template name : Zebra 1911 24Copy-TESTING LT 24 

Walk Template name : Zebra -Ability to edit walk template @09/07

Since this issue has been fixed only for web, we have validated on web and found that this is working fine. 

Mobility related issue can tracked under this EPIC :https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-48920.

As this issue is working fine on latest hotfix release, closing and marking this as DONE.

column11: Changing the configuration of the batch size notifyAlertsExecutorBatchSize from 100 to 500 will result in an improvement in the notifier processing performance. This will reduce the delay between the __raisedOn and __pickedOn times.

column21: Changes made in TM-43732 to change the value of kernel.notifier.alerts.notify.job.batch.records in bootup.properties file from 100 to 500 records. We can see from the above table that a significant improvement in the notifier processing performance is noticed:- from 3 hours to 8 minutes for a sample file of 10000 records.

column3: Tasks will not Auto-Complete and remain in Overdue status
column7: Projects/tasks sent to stores with auto-completion selected are not completing and are staying on stores project lists as overdue. This was first reported after our production upgrade to 24.10 on 10/23. I attached photos of the project details showing auto-complete definition and the project as it shows for the stores.
column11:
- Project Launch with Future Date.
- Project Launch with Future Date and Auto Complete enabled.
- Auto Complete of Project with Future Date
- Post-Launch Edit Project with Future Date.
- Post-Launch Edit Project with Future Date and Auto Complete enabled.
column17:
- When the future-dated project is launched via Batch (i.e., PENDING_PROJECTS), a record of the LAUNCH event is maintained in the RTM_ENTITY_EVENT_HISTORY collection with the INITIATOR param value as "BATCH".
- We send the Requestor Name in the Project Edit ETLs for Auto-Complete and Post-Launch Edit. In the ProjectEditExtractProcessor.java and TaskEditExtractProcessor.java, the getRequestByName method retrieves the userName of userId available in the INITIATOR field of the RTM_ENTITY_EVENT_HISTORY collection.
- However, in this scenario, the INITIATOR param holds the value as "BATCH" since the project is launched through Batch as it is a future-dated project and there is no user available with the ID as BATCH, the system returns an empty list of users.
- When the system attempts to get data from an empty list, an IndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown failing in the PROJECT_AUTO_COMPLETE batch job.

column7: When certain characters are copied from a message and pasted into a chat, they appear incorrectly. Detailed in comments below - issue on iOS and Android apps

Code Review Done : Yes
Internal Impact – (Function Areas) : 1. Verify that HTML tags should not be visible on the left panel when content is copied and pasted in qchat
2. Verify that HTML tags should not be visible on the left panel when a User is tagged in Qchat
External Impact – Product Names : Mobility

column17:
When user copies data from outside sources, it can contain HTML formatting like bold, list, table etc. 
We do not show the formatted content on left side chat preview panel. Here only plain text should be visible. But as per existing logic we did not drop the html formatting and therefore it was shown as plain text content
column21: Added a client side fix to drop the HTML tags and convert it to plain text and then display the plain text in preview.

column3: How do we prevent closed stores from receiving program projects?
column7:
When a store is closed for an extended period of time, we need to stop projects from generating.

To stop repeating projects we apply a blackout day and this works as expected.

However please can you advise how we can prevent program projects from generating?

Currently, we apply the following attribute "Exclude demo store"
Should the following property in the project type setup "Allow demo stores in the rollout?" be switched on or off?

As we have different project types that have this switched on and off, yet all still seem to allow the program project to be launched to stores with the exclude store attribute. 

Example, store 7400 has the exclude demo store attribute. Please see attached screenshot, which shows they still received the the following project types:

Date code management spot checks - Property switched on - Project still generates 
Store task - Property switched off - Project still generates
column24:
Hi [~PA1587] 
 *  Looks like client has enabled property Allow Demo Stores.
 * So the project created using such project type, will not remove demo stores from rollout when the project is launched.
 * Client has two options, either we can disabled the project type property, or make it configurable at project level, so creator can decide whether it wants to include or exclude demo stores during launch.
column25:
Hi Priyanka Anumula 

  •  Looks like client has enabled property Allow Demo Stores.
  • So the project created using such project type, will not remove demo stores from rollout when the project is launched.
  • Client has two options, either we can disabled the project type property, or make it configurable at project level, so creator can decide whether it wants to include or exclude demo stores during launch.

column11: MYWORK application went down because of FORM_MODEL index issue from Mongo.
column17:
MYWORK application went down because of FORM_MODEL index issue from Mongo.
Old Index on FORM_MODEL Collection was dropped and new Index was created however, Mongo did not utilize the new Index thereby causing slow queries which impacted the application performance.
column21:
on CL 17 PR, we re-created old index back which fixed the issue as a workaround.

We have created a Mongo case to know the RCA and future steps to avoid such issue.

As of now we Mongo has asked to avoid dropping an index before creation of new index.

Once the application starts using the new index then DB team can execute the drop index script.
column24:
Hi [~NS2154] [~JD9860]  - As a recommendation from MongoDB, they suggested us to use hidden index instead of dropping old index. Hidden index hides the index from query planner and we can make it available as and when needed.

[https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/core/index-hidden/] 

CC: [~KR1312] [~PC3488]
column25:
Hi Nikhil Shende Jaganmohan Devendraguru  - As a recommendation from MongoDB, they suggested us to use hidden index instead of dropping old index. Hidden index hides the index from query planner and we can make it available as and when needed.

https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/core/index-hidden/ 

CC: Kommareddy Maheshwar Rao Prasanna Chintala

column11: Register device and push notifications functionality in MYWORK and Q-Suits apps
column17: When user re-installs the application and logs in, a new record with fresh DEVICE_AUTH_TOKEN is added in RMB_DEVICE_DATA collection. However, the old record with previous token for the same device was not removed. As a result, the system tried to send notifications using the outdated token, causing the error.
column21: To resolve this, we implemented logic to identify and remove any older entries in the RMB_DEVICE_DATA collection associated with the same deviceId, appSourceId  and userId when new record is inserted (REGISTER_DEVICE flow) via service (/service/users/updateDeviceDetails with actionType=RD). This ensures that only the latest record is retained.

column3: v4.5 DJS - Unstable PP Navigation

Hi Team,

Since taking deployment of v45.1.14.2 to PP we have been noticing unstable behaviour.

We will occasionally be logged out when navigating between menus, receiving an "error while processing" message in the top left hand corner. We do not have multiple windows open at the same time.

Additionally, we are experiencing an error message of "No results to display" when trying to Switch To units. Screenshot attached.

Closing the Switch To menu and attempting to switch again will return the same result. Once you press the 'Clear' option, results are returned.

Unfortunately this is intermittent and I have not been able to determine replication steps, it is occurring through ordinary navigation. 

Can we please advise?

Thanks,
Anthony

column7:
Hi there - we've noticed an issue with room checks, but interestingly it only seems to present itself on the Chrome browser. 

The issue we see is that the room checks are showing multiple times. Please see video attached. 

This doesn't happen on the mobile. It also doesn't happen on a firefox browser.

As you know - we don't use the desktop version in our hotels so it's not mega urgent. However, I know that our Central Ops teams will notice this pretty quickly and so it needs to be fixed. 

Please let me know if you need more info - many thanks!
Iain
column24:
hi [~KA6692] 

 

As I investigated the issue, I found that for specific Room Checks, the system filter *{{PAGINATION_LIMIT}}* is set as *{color:#de350b}{{{}NumberLong(20){}}}.{color}* This might be causing data duplication. Can we update the value to *{color:#00875a}20{color}* and check if it resolves the issue?

 

Thank you.

CC: [~DN2676]  [~PG5466] [~AT6994] [~DY1498]
column25:
hi Komal Anbhule 

 

As I investigated the issue, I found that for specific Room Checks, the system filter PAGINATION_LIMIT is set as NumberLong(20). This might be causing data duplication. Can we update the value to 20 and check if it resolves the issue?

 

Thank you.

column3: Cognos Reporting: Datasource Audit AAR (USER ACTION) tables not being populated with data
column7:
The Bank of America AUDIT reports are no longer returning records since the data stopped being populated on August 22, 2024. This date aligns with the timing of the V17 migration to PROD.
The impacted reports are as follows:
...>DESKTOP> (BOA) Hidden - Ad Hoc Reports > USER ACTION REPORTS>.
Reports in this directory:
1. (WFM)-User Action Report - (LOB Admin)
2. (WFM)-User Action Report - (System Admin)
3. (WFM)-User Action Report - (Users)

These reports pull from the Cognos Datasource Audit AAR (USER ACTION). Up through August 22, 2024 these tables were being populated. AFTER August 22, 2024, they are not being populated with data

I have copied these reports for your reference to:
...>DESKTOP> (BOA)-4-Zebra>USER ACTION REPORTS>.

column11:

column17:
APIGEE Team: Kernel Login changed to move the sitekey from a query parameter to a header.

MYWORK Team: Validation of profile and department
column21:
APIGEE Team: Fixed the proxy login to provide the sitekey in both header and query parameter.

MYWORK Team: Removed validation of profile and department from resolver.
column24:
With new changes based on call with APIGEE, we have re-validated the service and below are the observation.

We have validated below flow with postman

1. Giving following parameter to get the data

1. Domain id

 2. AuthToken

 3. Cluster id

 4. requestor user id

5. Unit ID

6. Profile Id

7. Dept Id

8. User Id

Validation for other parameter will not be handled with latest code fixes, even if the values are not correct for other parameter still data will retrieve.

If unit id is incorrect then request will return the master cluster id data.

Please note that,

1. for other mandatory fields we must need to give data, even if those are correct or incorrect.

2. if mandatory field values are blank or not given then service will not return any record, but service will give 200 message.

Author: Pooja Doshi

column3: Release 24.10 - Column headings have changed when pulling reports from Cognos
column7:
Since the 24.10 release, the header title for "Store ID" has changed when it is pulled from Cognos.

All of our reports are set up using the "Store ID" field and this has always pulled through onto the report as "Store ID"

Since the update it has changed and now pulls through as "Level 9 ID"

We have a lot of automated Power BI reporting set up which relies on the headers.

All of these reports have now failed due to this change.

Please can this be looked into urgently, as our risk reporting is incredibly important for our due diligence as a business.

Please see attachment for screenshots.
column11: New Cognos Package was generated and deployed on the environment. Issue is resolved. Hence closing the ticket.
column17: Unit label customization did not happen due to issues with build tool server, which is used to generate client specific package. Build tool server had stack upgrade last month, as a result, some of the libraries required for Cognos process were missing.
column21:
Missing libraries were installed on build tool server and cognos package were generated. Validated the Unit Org level changes after PP deployment. Package was promoted to PROD and Unit label changes seems to be fine.

Will work with build tool team to have a better process incase of customization process fails.
column24:
As per confirmation, the customer issue is resolved by deploying the new Cognos package.
Hence resolving the ticket.
The new package is being deployed to all other clusters through CLM.
column25:
As per confirmation, the customer issue is resolved by deploying the new Cognos package.
Hence resolving the ticket.
The new package is being deployed to all other clusters through CLM.

column3: Desktop myWork: After Adding New User to ROS, User List showing Incorrectly
column7:
We recently had a new person join the team and we were adding a profile for her in preproduction, but after creating the profile we initially got an error message when trying to save that said "Error saving user profile" and after clicking save again it said "User saved successfully".

When going back to the main ROS>User screen though the user's information is displaying incorrectly and I'm unable to open the profile and a "Loading...please wait" message is appearing that doesn't go away. I've attached a screenshot for your reference.
column11: userId null check added in _addUser() function
column17: userId received as null
column21: userId null check added in _addUser() function
column24:
I have validated this issue on latest APPRL domain v25.1.1.0 and found that issue is now working fine.
Corp user is able to create new user with detailed information added to it and saved successfully without any error for the first attempt only. User can be added at any organization level without any error. PFA Snapshpts.

As this issue is working fine on local environment, Closing and marking this as done.
However, this issue needs to be validated once the build is deployed on CVS pre-prod build.

column3: JH Issue 1. User is not able to edit the violation in walk template  Issued Walk -> Monthly H&S Check V2
column7: JH Issue 1. User is not able to edit the violation in walk template  Issued Walk -> Monthly H&S Check V2
column11:
Violation Project/Task > Add/Edit/View dialog.
When Domain does not contains any Form Category Survey it breaks and blocks UI.
Workaround before fix, is to add empty Survey Form Category.
column17:
The issue is because in UI we are concatenating an empty response from /retrieveLInkedCategorySurvey in default dropdown options list.
Then rflx-select-dropdown component fails because of that.
column21: Code fix
column24:
|*Summary*|JH Issue 1. User is not able to edit the violation in walk template Issued Walk -> Monthly H&S Check V2|
|*Status*|Working Fine|
|*Application URL* |[https://knlcl01uspt.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view]|
|*Version*|25.1.0.7|
|*Test Scenario*| * User is not able to edit the violation in walk template Issued Walk.|
|*Test Data*|SYSADMIN/ SYSADMINZebra@123! |
|*Test Steps*| * Login with above credentials
 * Navigate to Walk >> create new Walk Template
 * Open the template >> fill all details
 * Navigate to the "Violation" section
 * Click "Add New Project" 
 * Open the "Execution Level", "Project Type", "Priority", "Assigned To", and "Department Responsible" from  dropdowns and select
 * Click on Surveys >> Show Survey Templates >> it is showing blank as no survey template present in this domain
 * Click on the 3-dots to the right of template >> Delete >> OK
 * Again, create a template and perform all above steps 
 * Publish the template.|
|*Attachments*|[^image (4).png]|
|*Notes*|Now, user is able to select any options in the dropdown and able to edit the violation in walk template Issued Walk.|

Post launch edit for Distribution list type rollout:
Create project and launch with  distribution list.
1. Verify that  if store is deleted from distribution list then project  user is able to remove store by re-saving distribution type rollout  in post launch edit.
2. Verify that if no changes are done for distribution list then project post launch edit works without any issue.
Please note that any changes for rollout in post launch edit will apply only if user saves rollouts manually, if user do not saves rollout in post launch then no store should be removed in project rollouts, irrespective of distribution list  changes.
column17: When a unit was removed from the distribution list and the project was edited, the removed unit’s RRC_FEED wasn’t cleared because it wasn’t tracked as store was deleted from rollout collection.
column21:
Changes done to mark unit status as deleted instead of removing unit from rollout if they’re removed from distribution list and rollout is re-saved in post-launch edit by user.
This allows project change tracking for deleted unit and etl is created for removed store.

column3: CL52-CoopUK-PP: Field view is not opening.
column7: Field view is not opening.
column11:
Preprod DB Server: 4CPU 12GB NON-SSD

PROD DB Server: 16CPU 48GB SSD

Right now, the field view report is running for "Date Range: All". The report is taking long time because the report is scanning 6.75Million records. The older projects were not completed, and because of that reason the report is scanning those many records. 

If we have to run the field view report for in Tesco for "date range to "All" in Preprod, then we have to change it to SSD disk and more hardware.

column24:
We have validated this issue on CL52PP and found that field view reports are opening after waiting for sometime. As per analysis provided by Dileep, CL52PP server is in NONSSD and very less hardware.
If we apply particular filters for less data, field view reports are opening correctly without any slowness. Please find attached snapshots.
Since this is working fine on latest pre-prod build, moving this to DONE.

column3: PreProd - 24.10 - not launching some project external walks
column7:
Hi there - I'm testing the 24.10 update on PP. 

When selecting a walk to complete in MyWork, it tries to open it, and then says it has been completed. This is without completing anything in the walk. 

Please see attached - do let me know if you need any further information.

With many thanks
Iain
column11:
- Project Launch with External Walk/Form as survey 
 - Post launch edit of projects  with External Walk/Form as survey
 - Repeating child generation. Immediate child and future child projects which gets launched through scheduler/cron.
 - Create Project From template where template contains walk/form for project/task
 - Post Launch Actions - Make sure at execution end, users are still able to give responses, after post launch actions.
 - Copying Existing Projects which had walk/form as survey which have been withdrawn.
 - Create Project From Template Rest API.
column17: Feedback service used through webapp when used in background jobs caused error since logged in user details were not available.
column21: Code fix added to handle above scenario. Validation function now is not dependent on logged in user details to call to store walk api, it will use nodeToken and get required details.
column24:
We have validated this hotfix on local QA application with 24.10.2.2 version and below cases are validated and working fine.

Application Link: [https://knlcl01uspt.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view]
|Test Scenarios|Conditions|Expected Working|Working Status|
|Will inactive/withdrawn walk/survey be visible during project creation ?| |No|Working|
|When user copies a project which has inactive/withdrawn walk/survey attached, will it get copied to new project ?| |No|Working|
|If we have a draft project which had a walk/survey attached in project/task, and after that walk is withdrawn| |Selected Walk/Survey won’t be visible in feedback creation, but it will be still attached to project/task and visible in project summary and can be still launched. User is free to update it to another.|Working|
|Will inactive/withdrawn walk/survey be visible during project creation from template where project template had a walk/survey attached which is now withdrawn ?| |No|Working|
|Project Launched with Active Walk/Survey|Active|While completing project/task walk/survey will be available for execution|Working|
|Project Launched with Active Walk/Survey, but walk/survey has been made inactive after launch|Inactive/Withdrawn after launch|Store users can still use walk/survey to submit response. Withdrawal of walk doesn’t impact existing already launched projects at stores.|Working|
|Repeating child project launch with active Walk/Survey|Active|Same as case 1|Working|
|Repeating child project launch when walk/survey was made inactive after some days|InActive/Withdrawn|Survey/Walk will not be attached project or task while launching child project|Working|
|violation project with external survey - expiry|While adding survey it was active but while conducting the walk it become inactive or withdrawn|As survey is already attached, it should launch with survey similar to draft project behaviour|Working|
|Current and next day child having survey and walk attached| |If attached survey are active then it should be present in current and batch generated child as well|Working|
|store side execution of current and future child and its responses in feedback report| |User should be able to conduct the survey while project or task completion and responses should be there in reports|Working|

Reference of evidence for one of the project.

Master Created on 9th with external Survey - Active Status.
 * First Child - Survey got attached properly.
 * Second Child - Survey was not attached, as there was issue.
 * Third child - Survey got attached , as this child was generated after hotfix deployment is done.
 * Forth Child - Survey is not attached, as the survey template has been withdrawn before child is launched.

!image-2024-10-12-19-33-57-034.png|width=549,height=295!
column25:
We have validated this hotfix on local QA application with 24.10.2.2 version and below cases are validated and working fine.

Application Link: https://knlcl01uspt.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view

Test Scenarios Conditions Expected Working Working Status
Will inactive/withdrawn walk/survey be visible during project creation ?   No Working
When user copies a project which has inactive/withdrawn walk/survey attached, will it get copied to new project ?   No Working
If we have a draft project which had a walk/survey attached in project/task, and after that walk is withdrawn   Selected Walk/Survey won’t be visible in feedback creation, but it will be still attached to project/task and visible in project summary and can be still launched. User is free to update it to another. Working
Will inactive/withdrawn walk/survey be visible during project creation from template where project template had a walk/survey attached which is now withdrawn ?   No Working
Project Launched with Active Walk/Survey Active While completing project/task walk/survey will be available for execution Working
Project Launched with Active Walk/Survey, but walk/survey has been made inactive after launch Inactive/Withdrawn after launch Store users can still use walk/survey to submit response. Withdrawal of walk doesn’t impact existing already launched projects at stores. Working
Repeating child project launch with active Walk/Survey Active Same as case 1 Working
Repeating child project launch when walk/survey was made inactive after some days InActive/Withdrawn Survey/Walk will not be attached project or task while launching child project Working
violation project with external survey - expiry While adding survey it was active but while conducting the walk it become inactive or withdrawn As survey is already attached, it should launch with survey similar to draft project behaviour Working
Current and next day child having survey and walk attached   If attached survey are active then it should be present in current and batch generated child as well Working
store side execution of current and future child and its responses in feedback report   User should be able to conduct the survey while project or task completion and responses should be there in reports Working

Reference of evidence for one of the project.

Master Created on 9th with external Survey - Active Status.

  • First Child - Survey got attached properly.
  • Second Child - Survey was not attached, as there was issue.
  • Third child - Survey got attached , as this child was generated after hotfix deployment is done.
  • Forth Child - Survey is not attached, as the survey template has been withdrawn before child is launched.

column3: Unable to force close an unwanted plan
column7:
Hi, we have encountered another example of not being able to force close an unwanted plan our Flight Plan 2025 Calendar in Production. Despite our attempts to force close this, the system returns an error, resulting in the plan remaining visible to stores. We kindly request Zebra’s assistance in force closing the following on our behalf: Plan Name: UK Promo - Tier 4: Week 27 - BAU
Plan Identifier:1126219
Plan Date: 29/10/2024 - 30/10/2024
Thank you
column11:
Plan Force Close Action by both Creator and last Approver each from Project inbox for following Approver setup:
- Without any approvers
- Last Approver as Role based approver having creator profile and dept
- Last Approver as Role based approver without creator profile and dept
- Last Approver as User based approver having creator profile and dept
- Last Approver as User based approver without creator profile and dept
column17:
- The root cause for the failure of force close action was that the "businessAppr" parameter was passed as null to the backend resulting in an IllegalArgumentException with "Invalid business approver. Project cannot be submitted"
- For Pre-Plan Projects, when the final approver is user-based, and the current user is the final approver, the "businessAppr" parameter can be null during force close actions. This happens because the user dropdown is hidden in the force close pop-up for the final approver, so the "businessAppr" isn't sent from the UI side.
column21: We have added the change for plan to get the applicable business approver when the businessAppr parameter is null. If the CurrentUser is the final Approver we return its UserID and set it as the businessAppr.

ID/PASS-SYSADMIN/SYSADMINZebra@123!

Scenarios:
 * Verify that Force Close Action is working if plan created without any approvers in Plan type.
 * Verify that Force Close Action is working if plan created with Plan type where Last Approver is User based approver having creator profile and dept
 * Verify that Force Close Action is working if plan created with Plan type where Last Approver is User based approver without creator profile and dept
 * Verify that Force Close Action is working if plan created with Plan type where only one Approver is added as role based approver having creator profile and dept
 * Verify that Force Close Action is working if plan created with Plan type where only one Approver is added as role based approver without creator profile and dept

Hence closing this issue

column11: Informed configuration to change default font family
column17: Font family is changing when user deletes all text from the notes
column21: Informed that the font family / size is configurable by the feature config 'CKEDITOR_CONFIG'. If they don't want the font family to be arial, but always 'default', disable the config for 'font family'. This way default font size will still be 14, but default font will be the browser.

column11: Broadcast details view inline media handling & external link handling.

[https://mwdryrun05qa.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view]

The user is now able to add an embedded video link in the broadcast message and that video is now successfully playing in an inline video player in the application itself without any issue.

PFA the video snippet.

Closing this ticket.

Author: Nikhil Khandelwal

column3: Auto Complete in Prod not Correct
column7: I was reviewing how the Auto Complete is working in Prod. We have all of our Communications with the Action Assign All Template with an Auto Complete after 100 days. It looks like it's changing the Responses from Completed/Completed on Time to Completed Late. And then some are still left Overdue. Why is it doing this? This is not correct. We have been tracking completion since the beginning and we know we have the majority completed On Time for these Projects.
column11:
- Project launch with "Allow multiple assignments to be sent as tasks to each user" enabled and Auto Complete defined. ( Auto Complete should mark the  status of the child feed to complete correctly)
- Project launch with "Allow multiple assignments to be sent as tasks to each user" enabled without Auto Complete.
- Normal Project Launch with Auto Complete defined.
- Normal Project Launch without Auto Complete.
column17:
Child feeds are not auto-completed after the AUTO_COMPLETE job when “Allow multiple assignments to be sent as tasks to each user” is enabled has been fixed.
Previously, even though the Master feed was marked as Completed after the AUTO_COMPLETE job, the child feeds remained in Overdue status.

Root Cause:
The STOREUSERS.csv file was missing from the extract for the Auto Complete Job.
column21:
With this change, the STOREUSERS.csv file will now be included in the extract for Auto Complete when “Allow multiple assignments to be sent as tasks to each user” is enabled.
	The files will be located in the /{PROJECT_ID}/AUTO_COMPLETE/ folder.
	Additionally, the STORELIST.csv and CORE.dat files will also be included in the same folder.

Subject: APIGEE v3 vs v2
Hello Jag:
I wanted to start the conversation regarding API fixes and versions.
Just as a point of reference, I am citing here a recently resolved ticket - TM-47785. Invalid root.id with underscores from Q-Walk.
The team is fixing the latest bugs in v3 and/or v4. But it looks like customers are still using v2. CFQ team is validating in v2 as well as v3, which does not make sense because the fix is not being done in v2.
 
We have to decide from the following options.
Option 1) We  advise customers to move to v3 and announce withdrawal of support for v2 OR 
Option 2) We continue to fix the issues in v2.
 
My recommendation is that we should go with option 1. We should communicate to customers that we no longer support v2 and that they should move to v3
 
Thanks and regards
 
 
 
 
Prasad Kalyanapu
 
ZEBRA TECHNOLOGIES CORPORATION
www.zebra.com
 
Prasad Kalyanapu

Subject: Re: APIGEE v3 vs v2
Including the @Maddirala, Umakanth/@Sutaone, Harsha

@Thondapu, Jagadesh,

We have requested OBI via customer team in June 2025 and they came back that they no plans to upgrade the APIGEE to v3 in near future, then how long we need to support old APIGEE versions if customer is not willing to move further.

Just FYI: All the new development of APIGEE will be planned for v4.

We need to work with customers with the action plan via PDM, customer service team to socialize this plan of action.

@Kalyanapu, Prasad: Even I am also aligned with Option 1 otherwise customer will not proceed further.

Thanks,
Prashant G

From: Kalyanapu, Prasad <prasad.kalyanapu@zebra.com>
Date: Thursday, 18 September 2025 at 15:10
To: Thondapu, Jagadesh <jagadesh.reddy@zebra.com>, Walvekar, Avdhoot <avdhoot.walvekar@zebra.com>, Bihani, Nilesh <nilesh.bihani@zebra.com>, Gupta, Prashant <prashant.gupta@zebra.com>, Tiwari, Ashish <ashish.tiwari@zebra.com>, Gangad, Nitin <nitinkumar.gangad@zebra.com>, Pawar, Nilesh <nilesh.pawar@zebra.com>, Jain, Ankit <ankit.jain@zebra.com>, Ranade, Kapil <kapil.ranade@zebra.com>, Rane, Chetan <chetan.rane@zebra.com>, Vijay Patil, Abhay <abhay.patil@zebra.com>, Krishna Kumar, Kantha Lakshmi <kanthalakshmi.krishnakumar@zebra.com>, Anil, Vernekar <vernekar.anil@zebra.com>, Prabu, Yogesh <yogesh.prabu@zebra.com>
Subject: APIGEE v3 vs v2
Hello Jag:
I wanted to start the conversation regarding API fixes and versions.
Just as a point of reference, I am citing here a recently resolved ticket - TM-47785. Invalid root.id with underscores from Q-Walk.
The team is fixing the latest bugs in v3 and/or v4. But it looks like customers are still using v2. CFQ team is validating in v2 as well as v3, which does not make sense because the fix is not being done in v2.

We have to decide from the following options.
Option 1) We advise customers to move to v3 and announce withdrawal of support for v2 OR
Option 2) We continue to fix the issues in v2.

My recommendation is that we should go with option 1. We should communicate to customers that we no longer support v2 and that they should move to v3

Thanks and regards

Prasad Kalyanapu

ZEBRA TECHNOLOGIES CORPORATION
www.zebra.com

Prasad Kalyanapu

column3: 2024 ADSF Remediation: Stored XSS Possible Via <embed> HTML Tag (Stored XSS)
column7:
P2 VULNERABILITY (DUE 10/27/2024): FIX MUST BE INCLUDED IN OCTOBER 25TH MAINTENANCE

Vulnerability Citation 1 (1002002): Stored XSS Possible Via  HTML Tag

Cross-site Scripting (XSS) allows an attacker to submit specially crafted data to the application which is returned unaltered in the resulting
web page. The injected data can include HTML code which alters the appearance and functionality of the page, and/or JavaScript which
executes in the victim's browser. An attacker could use this to steal data from the victim such as session tokens and sensitive personal
data.

Observed URLs include, but are not necessarily limited to:

https://bankofamericapp.reflexisinc.com/RWS4/rosom/orgstructure/distributionlist/DistListMaintainence.jsp
https://bankofamericapp.reflexisinc.com/RWS4/rosom/orgstructure/common/cfg_attr_addedit.jsp

Vulnerability Citation Evidence:

Steps to Reproduce:
1. From the sidebar, navigate to Organization -> Distribution List
2. Click on an entry on the "List Name" column.
3. Insert  tag into the Description field. Example:
http://attackersite.example.com/xss.html>
4. Save.

See attached PDF for evidence

Recommendation:

Apply input filtering and output encoding to user supplied data before returning it to the user's browser. 
Apply business logic filters to user input (including cookies, POSTs, GETs, and headers), allowing only characters necessary for the requested input. Apply HTML or URL encoding to any returned values to neutralize any remaining and potentially dangerous characters that would otherwise be interpreted as HTML or script by the browser ("'`()=[];?*$%^&|/{} ) .

THIS FIX MUST BE APPLIED TO ALL FREE FORM FIELDS THAT ARE NOT DISABLED (at minimum)
column11: All code changes from Kernel side have been fixed and validated. The final fix will be tracked under WFM-46949  and WFM-46229.
column17: Please see ticket
column21: Code changes made to address the XSS issue identified by BOA security scan.
column24: All code changes from Kernel side have been fixed and validated. Based meetings between WFM and Kernel teams it is agreed that Kernel side changes are done and subsequent changes required to handle page wise security policy overrides will be dealt from WFM side ( WFM-46949  and WFM-46229).

column24:
Hi Team

1) Custom Email flow is not an issue. It has been working from a long time.

2) Actual Issue is RTM product specific XSLT templates were missing post RWS migration.

3) We have re-added the templates back in PR and PP 
PR - RCON-1511
PP - RCON-1512
4) We have informed to migration team to review the migration steps regarding XSLT template artifacts to  avoid this issue in future migrations.

Thanks,

Priyanka

column3: Gap Check Q4 not showing in reports
column7:
Completed Gap Checks are not showing in Walk Score Summary Report.

There is no option to choose Q4 Gap Check from the list 
We are unable to complete our reporting requirements.
column11:
Walk Template data did not sync with RAR
Some Walk Violation Tasks records had corrupted FORMULA_ID (null) and VIOLATION_ID(blank) records because of which ETL execution failed thereby the Template ETL transaction got rollbacked.

Please check Violation Data is generated properly by verifying below feature/functionality :
Copy Template
Import Template
Copy Violation Tasks
Re-sequence Violation Tasks

RAR should receive Walk Template/Violation  data correctly.
column17:
Technical Issue : Some Walk Violation Tasks records had corrupted FORMULA_ID (null) and VIOLATION_ID(blank) records because of which ETL execution failed thereby the Template ETL transaction got rollbacked.

Root Cause : Walk Violation Master or Walk Violation Task record got inserted with corrupted FORMULA_ID (null) and VIOLATION_ID(blank) using import export or copy Form functionality.
column21:
Corrective Action : Code fix done to not insert  Walk Violation Master or Walk Violation Task record  if FORMULA_ID is null thereby not inserting any corrupted records.

If Violation Id is blank in Walk Violation Task record then SWA application will send -1 as default value to avoid ETL error.

Formula Id is now a mandatory parameter from the UI to save Violation Master record.

Data Fix script given to delete corrupted records.

column3: RFX - Coppel, S.A. de C.V. - Error en configuración de preguntas de Caminatas, Matriz/Númerico | 20000882
column7:
Error en configuración de preguntas de Caminatas, En preguntas tipo Matriz/Númerico.
La plantilla es "Hoja de Sondeo Cobranza" (En la categoría Cobranza), el error se presenta en la pregunta 1 del 2do grupo de dicha caminata.

Donde se le está dando un Rango en la pregunta Matriz tipo númerica de:
Valor minimo: 90000000
Valor Máximo: 99999999

No Caminata no respeta dicha configuración y no permite un número dentro de este rango que débería ser el comportamiento esperado. Comparto evidencia en los adjuntos.

Tema URGENTE. TEMA DE COBRANZA
column11: Min and max range will display in the validation message for matrix numeric type question. Fixed in TM-45533
column17: Fixed in TM-45533
column21: Fixed in TM-45533. Data fix script executed for the immediate resolution of the SFDC ticket
column24:
I checked this issue on the latest HOSPITALITY (v24.10.2.0) environment and found that the functionality is now working fine.

[https://knlcl01uspt.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/HOSP.view]

The user is now able to:
 * Create a numeric type question with decimal and negative values allowed. The values are now successfully accepted by the application and 'undefined' is no more mentioned as a value in the error message.
 * Create a matrix numeric type question with decimal and negative values allowed. The values are now successfully accepted by the application and 'undefined' is no more mentioned as a value in the error message.

The video snippet can be found under TM-47681 as that ticket is a complete duplicate of this one.

There are a couple of observations that I noticed while testing this issue. They have been reported under TM-47766 and TM-47767.

Closing this ticket.

https://knlcl01uspt.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/HOSP.view

The user is now able to:

  • Create a numeric type question with decimal and negative values allowed. The values are now successfully accepted by the application and 'undefined' is no more mentioned as a value in the error message.
  • Create a matrix numeric type question with decimal and negative values allowed. The values are now successfully accepted by the application and 'undefined' is no more mentioned as a value in the error message.

The video snippet can be found under TM-47681 as that ticket is a complete duplicate of this one.

There are a couple of observations that I noticed while testing this issue. They have been reported under TM-47766 and TM-47767.

Closing this ticket.

Right now we have an issue with the Time Owed Form when people are trying to answer question 4.

column3: RFX - Servicios Liverpool S.A. de C.V. - No permite restablecer contraseñas a usuarios. | 19976590
column7:
Se presenta problema para que los usuarios finales puedan restablecer su contraseña de manera automática asi mismo desde el perfil de gatekeeper no permite restablecer contraseñas. Al realizar la operación de restablecimiento de contraseña en automatico se sale de sesión y no permite concluir la operación esto ocurre en el caso del gatekeeper.

Para el caso del usuario al dar en la opcion ¿Olvidó su contraseña? arroja un error. Cabe destacar que el usuario se encuentra activo y no es el único caso, han habido mas casos por los que si los enlistamos sería repetir el mismo sintoma. Esperando nos puedan ayudar lo mas pronto posible.

column11:
The search filter was changed to do a server load when user clear the entire filter (filter is back to unset) using backspace (or select all + delete). 

Following screens were updated:

- Plan inbox
- Plan template
- Project inbox
- Project template
- Project approval 
- Project approval queue
- Project sponsor queue
column17: When user search for some term and no result is found, if the text is cleared using backspace or delete the screens do only a soft search and display 'no results'
column21:
Now when user clears the search field entirely (set to empty), new items will be retrieve from server, respecting the other fields defined on advanced filtering.

Following screens were updated:

	Plan inbox
	Plan template
	Project inbox
	Project template
	Project approval 
	Project approval queue
	Project sponsor queue

column11: Form Messaging Screen when Reviewer User sends a form message to Form Instance Submitter having a comma in Username
column17:
Root Cause : This is a corner case scenario which would replicate when username has a comma (",").

Ex : Issue would replicate for Users having Username : "Cruise, Tricia".

This would work fine if Username does not have comma Ex : "Ian Gill".

 

This is existing issue and not a regression in 24.8 version as it works fine when username does not have a comma.

Please verify with Form Instance submitted by username : "Ian Gill".

{DOMAIN_ID:121660099,FORM_TRACE_ID:1726069646614}
MW16_MYWORK.FORM_MESSAGE

{DOMAIN_ID:121660099,FORM_TRACE_ID:1726069646614}

column17: Incorrection configuration/Permission enabled for Non-Store Manager
column21: Correct Permission to be enabled. Store Reports in TM are allowed only for Store Manager or User/Role who can see Project Assignment of other Users/Roles. View Reports permission to be disabled for all other Users/Roles
column24:
Hi Pramod/Kyle,

[~PD4492] [~KS2461] 

Not sure whether you got a chance to read the comments added by L3 team.

_*"Our development team has confirmed that the application does not support the  permission titled "Allow user to view Associated departments projects in AAR Reports" at the store level."*_

The above statement provides a different meaning than the one we have added in the comment. Allow User to View Associated Department is supported for Store Reports.

{color:#00875a}Product does not support Report View permission for Store users, other than Store Manager role or Role who is allowed to see projects assigned to other roles/users.{color}

Please do change the permission (Security Group permission) for the profile not to have Report View permission.

Client does not have mentioned about enabling Associated department functionality. (atleast at the time of this ticket creation).  If enabled, Store reports should work.

[~DG4952] [~GR2722] 

Thanks!
column25:
Hi Pramod/Kyle,

Pramod Duraphe Kyle Sledge 

Not sure whether you got a chance to read the comments added by L3 team.

"Our development team has confirmed that the application does not support the  permission titled "Allow user to view Associated departments projects in AAR Reports" at the store level."

The above statement provides a different meaning than the one we have added in the comment. Allow User to View Associated Department is supported for Store Reports.

Product does not support Report View permission for Store users, other than Store Manager role or Role who is allowed to see projects assigned to other roles/users.

Please do change the permission (Security Group permission) for the profile not to have Report View permission.

Client does not have mentioned about enabling Associated department functionality. (atleast at the time of this ticket creation).  If enabled, Store reports should work.

Dileep Guntupalli Gaurang Redker 

Thanks!

column11:
Following scenarios were fixed on distribution section:

- When department is present on all stores rollout, on post launch edit if user save the existing rollout it wont get new stores
- On post launch edit, a click on existing attribute rollout will display only the stores present in the previous version of this rollout. New stores added to attribute won't be displayed
- On post launch edit, when user save existing attribute rollout it wont get new stores added to this attribute, only existing ones on previous rollout. 
- On post launch edit, a click on existing favorite list rollout, it will only show units which existed in previous rollout. New units added to list wont be displayed
- On post launch edit, saving existing favorite list rollout does not adds new units from the list to the rollout
column17: On 'All stores', 'Favorite list' and 'Attribute' rollouts it was possible to add new stores to existing rollout.
column21: No new store is added in existing rollout now. It will only contains the stores which were present in the previous version of this rollout. New stores should be added in new rollouts.
column24:
I have tested mentioned scenarios on below env and working fine.

Scenarios covered:-
 * All stores
 *  When department does not exists on one of the stores, its converted into 'Specific stores' on launch, so no issue on post launch edit of this rollout
 *  When department is present on all stores, on post launch edit a click on the rollout does not displays the newly added units on ui (and on search)
 *  When department is present on all stores, on post launch edit if user save this rollout it automatically get new stores


 * Attributes
 *  On post launch edit, a click on rollout will display the new stores present on this attribute. 
 *  On post launch edit, when user save this rollout it automatically get new stores


 * Hierarchy
 *  No new store is added on rollout save (or get units) on post launch edit. 


 * Specific store
 *  No new store is added on rollout save (or get units) on post launch edit. 


 * Uploading list
 *  No new store is added on rollout save (or get units) on post launch edit. 


 * Favorite list
 *  On post launch edit, a click on this rollout shows the new units added to the favorite list
 *  On post launch edit, saving this rollout adds new units to the rollout (visible on the eye / database)

For optional task Rollouts:
 * Uploading list
 * No new store is added on rollout save (or get units) on post launch edit. 


 * Attributes
 *  On post launch edit, a click on rollout will display the new stores present on this attribute. 
 *  On post launch edit, when user save this rollout it automatically get new stores
 * store is added on rollout save (or get units) on post launch edit. 


 * Specific store
 *  No new store is added on rollout save (or get units) on post launch edit. 

 

Status - Working fine and moving this ticket to done.

column17: Attached images are having EXIF Metadata Orientation which is not preserved while saving images in WALK / FORM.
column21:

Author: Mani Soundarajan

column3: RTM Form - End User Support V1 - Error - 'Script Code in message'
column7:
Hi Team, 

Whilst we are conducting our trial for Forms across 25 shops I have been presented with an error when using the messaging tab. Are you able to take a look into this and advise? From what I can see, there is no script code front facing. Are you able to work out why it is reading this error displayed in the attached screenshot? This is having an impact on the try is and stop us from getting back to shops to help resolve their queries. 
Kind Regards, 

Jason
column17:
Issue 1 :When a User adds a message with a keyword "Refresh" then Security error is displayed which does not allow the User to add a message.
Issue 2 : When User adds a message with HTML entity, then encoded text is displayed.
Technical Issue 1 : XSS Pattern check restricts user to enter "Refresh" keyword
Technical Issue 2: Kernel pacifies the HTML entities added by the User and encodes the response.
column21:
Fix for Issue 1: Removed the XSS Pattern check as Kernel already verifies malicious content/ XSS attack.
Fix for Issue 2 : If HTML entity is added as a message then Kernel pacifies the response if kernel security policies are enabled. Application will decode such response to display at UI side as Kernel already validates malicious patterns.

column3: No Funciona la "Historia" de las aplicaciones de las Caminatas
column7:
No Funciona la "Historia" de las aplicaciones de las Caminatas

Se aplicó la Caminata de manera normal y cuando se envió, le llegó al "Revisor" a un Gerente de Zona, ya que esta caminata cuenta con Revisor.
Posterior a que se enviara la Caminata, Este Gerente Rechazó y puso un Comentario el por que la Rechazó, y no aparece en ningún lado este comentario del Rechazo.

Te adjunto la evidencia en los Adjuntos.
column11:
Notifier box is not running hence all the Messages are not triggering what is expected.
Model History is triggered by that FLOW.

Verify notifier box is up and running and run FORM utility for each affected Form/Walk.
column17:
Notifier box is not running hence all the Messages are not triggering what is expected.
Model History is triggered by that FLOW.
column21:
Verify notifier box is up and running
Once it is done, run FORM utility for each affected Form/Walk to reprocess all failed notification messages.

Then Model history will be working fine.
column25:
Hi Shandilya Gade ,

We have analyzed the issue and we determines the root cause is the notifier box is not running on PP env.

The Model History collection is updated by this FLOW. If notifier box is not running the messages will  no trigger the FLOW, hence the data is not going to be seen in the execution History tab.

Once you verify notifier box start running. It should start working for new rejections.

db.getCollection('NOTIFICATION_DATA').find({"DOMAIN_ID": 121740099, "REFERENCE_ID": "1726163068385", "INPUT_MESSAGE":/MODEL_HISTORY/})

All walks rejected from same FORM/WALK have same issue as you can confirm on NOTIFICATION_DATA

{"_id":{"$oid":"66e32e215e811a311bcf4698"},"DOMAIN_ID":{"$numberInt":"121740099"},"NOTIFICATION_ID":{"$numberInt":"43269"},"INPUT_MESSAGE":["MODEL_HISTORY,121740099,1726163068385,2100,R,R,PR,R,,,,,SYSADMIN,CORP,CORP,SYSADMIN,Testing%2Bto%2Bsee%2Bif%2Brejection%2Bcomments%2Bappear%2Bfor%2Bstore.%2B,R,FORM_1040,Rejecting%2BWalk%2BTest,Rejecting%2Ba%2Bwalk%2Binstance%2Band%2Bchecking%2Bfor%2Brejection%2Breason%2Bfrom%2Bstore%2Bview.%2B,001,,SYSADMIN,1,0,1,7200,23,C,SYSADMIN%2BAdminstrator,W,,N,-1,"],"RESULT":"{\"response\":\"Error[PulseNotification.sendNotification]:Unable to forward request to NotifierCore\",\"status\":\"ER\"}","STATUS":"E","CREATION_TIME":{"$date":{"$numberLong":"1726164513637"}},"REFERENCE_ID":"1726163068385","MODEL_ID":null,"FILE_KEY":null,"CLIENT_INFO_MAP":{"AGENT":"BROWSER","TYPE":"WEB","INSTANCE_ID":"was02-mw-inst01"}}

column11:

Code Review Done	Yes
Internal Impact – (Function Areas)	Walk Template > Approve after rejected multiple times
Form Template > Approve after rejected multiple times
Walk Instance > Approve after rejected multiple times 
Form Instance > Approve after rejected multiple times
External Impact – (Product Names)	N/A
API Test	N/A
JUnit Test	Yes

Solution:
Increasing cycle no as well on model state listing in both workflows.
Improving api responses adding some message.
column17:

Logs showed it was not able to find the model state listing by increased cycle no.

column17: MONITOR_HEADER values for FLOW-1 was having data issue.
column21: Corrected MONITOR_HEADER with correct values
column25:
Shilpa Pandey/Sachin Sharma: Based on our call, we found that there was some data issue in MONITOR_HEADER, please see below.
DOMAIN_ID were set as NumberLong
COUNT was set as double value instead of NumberInt

Correction Scripts:

db.MONITOR_HEADER.update({ DOMAIN_ID : 121960099 , "FLOW_ID" : "FLOW-1" },{$set:{DOMAIN_ID : NumberInt(121960099)}}, {"multi" : true });
db.MONITOR_HEADER.update({ DOMAIN_ID : 121960099 , "FLOW_ID" : "FLOW-1" , "COUNT" : 1 },{$set:{"COUNT" : NumberInt(1) }}, {"multi" : true });

CC: Ashish Tiwari, Prasad Kalyanapu

Hi Mayura,

[~MT1932] 

This is not an issue.

Walk Reports display data based on Walk Date, which is minimum of Walk Start Date or Walk Claim Date.  Once a User claims a Walk Instance, Walk Date is recorded in Reporting system.

Please refer to the screenshot where Walk Claim Date shows August 30 2024. Please change the date filter and Walk Information for the Area displays in the reports.

Please do resolve the ticket as Not a Bug

[~DG4952] 

Thanks!

Author: Rohit Sonar

column3: User ID instead of user name in project edits
column7:
Issue details: User ID instead of the username appears in project notes when viewing project edits with track edits option enabled.
Expectation: username instead of user ID is shown without re-opening the project.
Priority: below low.
Affected users: administrators who approve projects.
Replication steps:
1) Log-in to prod
2) Launch a project for STORE1 
3) Now submit change request to approver by editing project notes
4) Log - in as approver "Formātu procesu attīstības daļa"
5) Open projects "approval inbox"
6) Choose previously edited project
7) Take action - edit
8) Go to next page "next" 
9) Enable "track edits"
10) Click on the highlighted fields in the notes section
11) Observe that pop-up contains user ID instead of user name who made changes to notes
12) Now return to "approval inbox" and edit the same project again
13) Open project notes, enable "track edit" again
14) Click on the highlighted fields in the notes section
15) Now you can see user name

column3: Error en el reporte análisis de desempeño, no muestra todas las Caminatas Activas
column7:
Error en el reporte análisis de desempeño, no muestra todas las Caminatas Activas.

Se busca la Caminata en el Reporte "Resumen de la Caminata" y posterior a esto se busca la misma caminata en el "Reporte Análisis de desempeño" y no cuadran las Instancias Activas a como se muestra en imagen adjuntada. En la Imagen Adjunta viene toda la información.
column11:
Issue : Performance Analysis Report does not show all Active Walks
Impact Desc : Template Override Scenario where Template Creator overrides a Walk Template when Store User is actively working on the walk instance and responses are saved by auto save call.

Please find root cause for replication steps below.
column17:
Root Cause :

In Template Override Scenario when Old Template is copied and Override option is selected, System would update Old MODEL_ID to new MODEL_ID for all Inactive Instances along with deleting Question Response related data.
But when during this process, if a Store User is already in the Walk Instance screen (conducting the old instance) and auto save call is triggered then it would save the Question Responses with Old Model Id present in the User Session hence creating data issues (Some responses are saved with Old MODEL_ID).

However on Click of Next button, User is thrown an error message and navigates out of the Walk Instance screen as per functionality.

When User resumes the same instance again, Responses are saved with new MODEL_ID as per the functionality.

Here Issue is , during auto save call, System allows to save Question Responses with old MODEL_ID.
column21:
Corrective Action :

We would compare the QUESTION_DATA creation time of new MODEL_ID with Walk Instance creation time and if Questions are edited then a Error Message is displayed ("Walk is being edited and all the responses will get discarded.") not allowing User to save Question Response during auto save call.
This functionality is already present for other button types like Next, Review etc.
In this issue we have fixed for auto save button type ("Save and Continue").
column24:
I checked this issue on the latest APPRL (v25.1.0.3) environment and found that the functionality is now working fine.

[https://mwdryrun05qa.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view]

The user is now kicked out of the walk during the auto save call due to the walk being edited at the creator's end. This doesn't allow the system to save the data against the wrong model ID, and saves the integrity of the walk reports.

PFA the snapshot.

Closing this ticket.

column3: Field Leaders unable to see store Comm
column7:
Hello - We went live with a new hierarchy on Sept 1. @ of our 4 orgs are not seeing accurate information. 

WHBM District Leaders should only see WHBM Frontline communication and can see Soma and WHBM outlet comm.
Outlet Leaders should see Chico's, WHBM and Soma outlet comm and can only see Chicos' outlet comm.

Examples: Unit D3000 has access to only WHBM frontline stores. When you view the Store project calendar it is showing Soma and WHBM outlet comm
Unit D7000 has access to Chico's, Soma, WHBM outlet comm and can only see Chico's outlet comm on the Store Project Calendar. 
The field view tab is also impacted.

This is high priority for us as we do not send field leaders comm separate, they view the comm assigned to their stores.

Author: Nipunjay Shukla

column3: Show more task button is not working correctly
column7: When viewing a completed project (daily safety walks) in the incoming screen, the 'Show more tasks button' only works once. This button should allow you to press it multiple times to show all tasks. In the daily safety walk project there are 21 tasks but this will not show the last 10. The second press of the button does appear to expand the tasks further but these are obscured by other projects on the incoming screen below this project. Please see attached video.
column11: Show/Hide task functionality of notifications with quick search result in Incoming view.
column17: The issue occurred only in case when quick search applied because the index for displaying tasks was being calculated based on the original list. This lead to incorrect placement of task as displayed notification list used the filtered list, but the index calculation was still referencing the original list.
column21: Updated the index calculation to reference the filtered list instead of the original list when displaying additional tasks under show task section. This ensures the task are correctly inserted below the corresponding parent project notification.

column3: Reflexis - James Hall and Co Ltd - TM - System Loading Very Slowly | 19612007
column7:
Hi,

We have noticed that both the desktop and mobile app are running extremely slow. We have tested the store and head office network, all seem fine. Just that the application is very slowly loading on all hardware.

column11:
Monthly recurrence was fixed for the scenario where the first valid date is on next month. 
Impacted Functionalities -  All Adhoc Frequency Types Repeating child launch, View Schedule screen on summary, and Post Launch Edit
column17: When the first valid occurrence of the monthly recurrence was on next month and the interval between them was greater than one, the calculation to get the repeating dates was incorrect
column21: Monthly recurrence class was refactored to always consider the interval, so now the get repeating dates will display the dates correctly.
