column3: v17_Walgreens_Prod_-Project Formatting
column7:
In V16, project creators were able to format the Notes section with a format painter (to replicate text format within notes) and a find and replace feature. V17, these options do not seem to be available. Is there a new way to use these formatting features?
Are these missing and will be updated?
There is no information about this in the Knowledge Center https://guides.zebra.com/content/saas/us/en/real-time-manager/manuals/rtm-manuals/project-creator-user-guide/project-inbox/creating-projects/notes.html

Thank you,
Bridget
column11:
Bellow functionalities were added:

Subscript
Copy formatting
Insert special characters
Find
Replace

Translation was updated to add new values for those new functionalities.

A script was created to update the translations automatically on new builds (impact only for dev team)

Impacted screens: notes, overview notes, exported pdf, external mail, mywork incoming, leadership

Documentation for changes are visible on: https://confluence.zebra.com/display/RAMTD/CK+Editor+upgrade+from+v41+to+v43.2
column17: Some functionalities which were present on v16 were not added to ckeditor on v17
column21: Missed functionalities were added into ckeditor. CK Editor translations were updated to add new functionalities.

Author: Prasad Kalyanapu

column3: Reflexis - Coop Switzerland - Shared Project Notification Missing since 24.08. Release | 19757890
column7:
With the new Release 24.8. on Production the Shared Project Notification to regional creators (Verfasser VRE in Retail Banner) is missing when projects are created with Project Type BE1. Only Project Type BE1 is touched by the issue.
Issue occurs on PreProd as well but unfortunately this has not been detected during UAT at Coop.

Steps to reproduce:
Login as TESTRTMDIR3 and create a new project using Project Type BE1. It is enough to select German only language and select BE, NWZZ, OT for distribution. Forward project to next approver which ist Verfasser_2.
Login as TESTRTMGKBE and switch to Hauptsitz. Approve and forward project and then again approve and forward the project (twice needed because of optional translation services step).
Project splits into regions and sits now at the regional gatekeepers desk.
In parallel a Shares Project Notification should have arrived at regional creators desk which is not the case.
If you log in as TESTRTMVREOT or TESTRTMVRENZ in Project Inbox you can see that "Shared Project" entries are only to be seen before the release 24.8. on August 27
column11: This impacts only Shared Project Notification functionality being used by COOP Switzerland. Also it can affect any other custom flows being used other clients.
column17: There is custom flow being used by client to send extra notification to users when project is being split. This flows were configured in existing approval workflow. In the approval workflow message, there is one "To Org Level" field. This value was not being used in out existing base workflows, so it didn't affect core approval functionality. But this value was used in custom configuration of share project which got impacted.
column21: Code fix was done to send appropriate value for this To Org Level field. This field was not set properly only in case of split optional approval workflow functionality.

Issue is not reproducible on TASK-24.9.1.6

URL-[https://knlcooppp.reflexissystems.de/kernel/views/samlhandler/COOP/W.view]

 # sudo login as TESTRTMDIR3
 # Create blank project > select project type BE1
 # Fill in required details and submit project for approval
 # Sudo login as TESTRTMGKBE
 # Switch to haupsitz and approve project ( 2 times you need to approve due to translation roles)
 # Switch to home now , final approve and launch project.
 # you can login as TESTRTMVRENZ as example one of the the VERFASSER_VRE Profile to look for the shared project.

column24:
Hi [~DR8222],

We are testing with CVS , a Kernel attribute (includeHierarchyForSecondaryUnits) + API based solution that was already tested for Walgreens. 
This will bypass the need for a custom solution altogether.

Meanwhile we have setup email alerts for the file Dataload. If we or the client doesn't receive an email for CVS_USER_SS.csv, we internally check if the report failed on a day.
We just regenerate it , so it gets picked up the next day.

If you have added an Event to monitor the status of the schedule, please add the DL RFXrflx.ramcsi@zebra.com.

Current report export and upload timings 
Report Export -
User Secondary Feed - 10:30 PM EST
User Secondary Feed MC - 10:50 PM EST
 
Upload job - 
CVS_USER_SS-en-us.csv - 11:00 PM EST
CVS_USER_SS_MC-en-us.csv - 11:10 PM EST

Thanks !
Harsha
CC: [~UM2540], [~JD9860]
column25:
Hi Dhanuskodi Rengasamy,

We are testing with CVS , a Kernel attribute (includeHierarchyForSecondaryUnits) + API based solution that was already tested for Walgreens.
This will bypass the need for a custom solution altogether.

Meanwhile we have setup email alerts for the file Dataload. If we or the client doesn't receive an email for CVS_USER_SS.csv, we internally check if the report failed on a day.

column3: MyWork > Calendar > Store Projects empty in some languages.
column7:
MyWork > Calendar > Store projects. Empty in some languages.
Case:
User open MyWork Calendar and choose Store-Projects > Projects shown.
User change language (English  SK)
open MyWork Calendar and choose Store-Projects > no Projects shown.

Example:
Same User, same rights, same units.
Calander-engl - OK
Calander Cz - OK
Calander DE - OK
Calander Error SK - not OK.

Pls check.
Problem: 
For our SK User the store project calendar is empty, in her mother language. If they switch to english calendar they saw the store projects. Hard to explain.
column11: When user is updating the language to Slovakia (sk_SK), the projects are not shown in the Calendar.
column17: The locale code for Slovakia (sk_SK) is missing from two tables 'RAR_UNIT_HIER_D' and 'RAR_PROJECT_TYPE_D'. The data is not in sync among the tables shown above.
column21: Need to sync the data among tables using topology trigger for the mentioned UNIT_ID 'CZECH' and for PROJECT_TYPE_SKEY 4000060 for the locale code (sk_SK) so that it gets updated in the table to make the locale code updated.

column25:
Assigning the ticket to L2 team

column7:

I've attached the original communication as well as two screenshots showing the differences in view from the Gatekeeper side (expected view) and the DPC - District - District side in D2221 (blank).

Can you please look into why the view is blank for our field users?

We did create another Updated project utilizing the same soft copy of the communication and it is showing up fine.

column3: Dashboard: Completion Rate
column7:
When you hover over the store details under the Completion Rate widget in Dashboard, what are the 2 columns of project details calculating?  We thought it might be last "period" (which is last week) in the first column and this "period" (this week) in the second (or maybe vice versa??), but it didn't add up when we counted them from the store active projects in MyWork.  

Is that not what those 2 columns represent, did we have them backwards, or is there a possibly a sync issue?

The myWork project "Point of Care Testing: Supplies and Training Review WE 8/24" contains a survey and is unable to be completed by our store teams.

I've attached a video showing that when I go to complete the project, the survey isn't opening and the store is unable to complete the project.

Please take a look into this ASAP as the survey is a crucial part of this project and not being able to complete it and complete the project is a big issue.
column17: Fixed under TM-45450
column21: Fixed under TM-45450
column24:

Application Link - [{color:#0052cc}http{color}|https://acuityeyecarepp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/AEG.view] [s://cvspp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/web/CVS.view|https://cvspp.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/web/CVS.view]

Issue validation - https://jira.zebra.com/browse/TM-46439

Following scenarios has been covered as part of hot fix -
 * Verify project and task survey got completed successfully with simple survey
 * Verify project and task survey got completed successfully with having numeric question with following combination

 * 
 ** Numeric question with decimal option
 ** numeric question with mandatory attachment
 ** Numeric question with Optional attachment and decimal option
 ** Numeric question with decimal option with mandatory attachment and question
 * Verify that if allowed decimal is enabled and type is "DIGIT" than user is not able to type more than max length number
 * Verify user able to complete project and task with simple survey with all type of question
 * Verify that error message is getting displayed when user is adding more than max or less than min digit value
 * Verify that project is getting completed successfully with existing external survey attached to project as well as task having numerical question with decimal value as enabled.
 * Verify that project is getting completed successfully with new external survey attached to project as well as task having numerical question with decimal value as enabled.
 * Verify that completed survey is getting displayed correctly in completion report.
 * Verify that completed survey is getting displayed correctly in project summary.

 

Below are the validation type completed along with hot fix.
 # L1 validation
 # L2 Validation

Please make note that we haven't tested mobile application since we dont have SSO credentials

column3: Bashas - PreProd - No Units Populating in Switch To
column7:
Hello Team,
We have a critical issue where we can no longer switch into specific units via the Switch To function. When we navigate to switch into a location at the CORP level, no units are populating on the page. I have verified that we have the units configured in both the ORG - Units page and RWS - Units page. This functionality was working last night. We have our Train the Trainer session tomorrow and need to have the Switch To function working by the start of that meeting otherwise, we run the risk of delaying the project from entering the UAT phase. 
Steps to Replicate:
1) Login to the Bashas environment using a SYSADMIN login
2) Select the top right corner of the page on the user name
3) Select "Switch To" from the dropdown
4) Notice no units are "Switchable" and the page says "No Results to display"

column3: Date Range switches on Zebra Devices
column7:
Dear All, I have noticed that there are different ways to open Standort Pulse. It is somehow counterintuitive to me, that the pre-selected date switches.

I have added 4 screenshots, please find them attached. 

Is this intended? and if so, can we please set it to include the current date?

Have a nice weekend
Patrick
column17: Currently the UTC date is sent to mywork & mywork is expecting the date as per unit/user timezone.
column21: Sending the date after converting to unit/user timezone. We were having the date only so while converting the date to unit/user timezone we are using the timestamp when the action is performed.
column24:
Hi [~PK3866], 

The initial issue was because AAR is not considering the user timezone  and sending the date in UTC. But MYWORK is treating those date, as those are as per User timezone and in some edge case scenario we show data discrepancy in 2 systems.

*This issue is fixed and part of 25.1. So now before sending date to MYWORK, AAR convert the dates in User timezone.*

But QA re-opened this as the date ranges is not matching with data shown as part of filter. Below is scenario.

*Scenario:*
 * AAR execute the query to find the minimum and maximum start date of project.
 * It doesn't consider any priority or any other filter at that time.
 * Data display in UI  based on priority.
 * Suppose User clicking the medium priority, it redirect to the MYWORK and we send the same dates(fetched in steps 1) and medium filter.
 * Filters sent, is applied to MYWORK screen.
 * The projects shown after applying filter doesn't have the same date range applied in filter.

The reason for that as we are not considering any filter while fetching dates from our system. It will impact the overall execution if we need to provide dates based on filters selection. *The actual issue related to count mismatch is fixed.*

cc: [~NT8452] 

Thanks,

Gourav Bansal
column25:
Hi Prasad Kalyanapu, 

The initial issue was because AAR is not considering the user timezone  and sending the date in UTC. But MYWORK is treating those date, as those are as per User timezone and in some edge case scenario we show data discrepancy in 2 systems.

This issue is fixed and part of 25.1. So now before sending date to MYWORK, AAR convert the dates in User timezone.

But QA re-opened this as the date ranges is not matching with data shown as part of filter. Below is scenario.

Scenario:

  • AAR execute the query to find the minimum and maximum start date of project.
  • It doesn't consider any priority or any other filter at that time.
  • Data display in UI  based on priority.
  • Suppose User clicking the medium priority, it redirect to the MYWORK and we send the same dates(fetched in steps 1) and medium filter.
  • Filters sent, is applied to MYWORK screen.
  • The projects shown after applying filter doesn't have the same date range applied in filter.

The reason for that as we are not considering any filter while fetching dates from our system. It will impact the overall execution if we need to provide dates based on filters selection. The actual issue related to count mismatch is fixed.

cc: Naresh Tirgar 

Thanks,

Gourav Bansal

Author: Mani Soundarajan

column3: myWalk: Users able to Complete Walk after Expiration Time
column7:
I was looking at the myWalk Schedule Report and noticed there were several walk instances in the month of August with a status of "Completed Late" which users should not be able to do.

The AM Daily Compliance Checklist is set to end every day at 12:00 PM local time and expire 0 hours after which means it should never fall into an Overdue status. There are 22 instances where the walk was able to be completed after the 12:00 PM expiration time. I've provided screenshots from store CVS00023 showing the walk being in red (indicative that it was past due),  but marked complete with a claim time of 12:30 PM and a completion time of 12:32 PM, both times after it's expiration.

Can you please look into how this is occurring?

I've attached 4 screenshots, 2 are the CVS00023 example, one of the myWalk Schedule Report showing there are 22 instances of a store able to complete a walk after it's expiration time with the filters used for the report, and the final one showing more stores with a "Completed Late" status from the report.
column11:
Walk Expiry Conduit.
Walk Instance Submission after Walk Expiry Date is past.
column17:
Walk Expiry Conduit is scheduled to run every 1 hour.
Walk Instance is scheduled to expire 1 min after Walk End Date.
Walk Expiry Conduit would not always pick the Walk Instance as per Expiry Time as it may run late or is busy with processing other Walk Instances.
Hence Walk Instance was not expired on time which allowed the User to submit the Walk Instance even if Walk Expiry time is past.
column21:
System will not allow User to submit Walk Instance if Walk Expiry time is past and will throw below error : "This Walk has already expired and cannot be submitted. The status will be updated to 'Expired' shortly."
This validation will not allow User to submit a Walk Instance whose Expiry date is past.
Meanwhile once Conduit picks the Walk Instance it will expire the Walk Instance.

column3: H&M FR - Not possible to save new password when using french locale
column7:
When a user login for the first time or their password has been reset, the user login with a default password and then is asked to set the security question and answers and set a new password.

column3: RTM/PLN - Template inbox covering both modules for RTM Creator
column7:
Hi Team,
In testing 24.7 (although this is also in Prod as we are only just starting to use templates in PLN) we have noticed that the template inbox under RTM is covering RTM & PLN. 
When opening the template inbox as a RTM creator I see plans and projects, (78 at the top of the inbox)
If I open the filter there is no option for plans, just projects.
If I open a plan template and navigate back the inbox reduces to 17 - only plans. If I do the same from projects there is no change. 

If i log on as a PLN creator I have template in look ahead (PLN) too, this inbox has the 18, BUT the RTM inbox still has both modules.

Expectation is that the template inbox relates to the module it is has been navigated too from.

Video attached showing the behaviour.

Thanks

Steph

Author: Rohit Sonar

column3: Reflexis - Dollar General Corporation - Unable to COMPLETE a Project with Survey Questions | 19475297
column7:
Task is THURSDAY - DG Fresh - Complete Damages/Expired Product Rotation Event for 8/1.  Stores are unable to take action on the project to complete and answer the 2 survey questions. 

Video is attached.
column11: While completing/force close RTM project with feedback survey
column17:
This is a regression for existing data due to new feature.

This cluster got upgraded to 24.7 yesterday, and there were some projects which were launched before upgrade having simple survey with numeric type question and decimal flag turned on.

After upgrade while opening up survey,in RRC_PROJECT_DATA, it is expecting a flag called "DECIMAL_PRECISION" with value as 4 in COMPLETION_SURVEY_URL property for questions of type N and allow decimal flag =Y. Since this flag will be sent only for projects which created after 24.7 upgrade, its not present in previous projects and hence the above exception.
column21:
For default DECIMAL_PRECISION, if fldAttr jsonobject, doesn't contains DECIMAL_PRECISION, we add   jInpFld.put("fldDecimalRange", Integer.parseInt("4"));  
	For default NUMERIC_RANGE_TYPE, if fldAttr jsonobject, doesn't contains NUMERIC_RANGE_TYPE, then we add
	
		If MIN_VAL, MAX_VAL is present in question attributes then its default value is  R,  
		If MIN_ALLOWED_DIGIT, MAX_ALLOWED_DIGIT is present in question attributes then its D.

column3: Force Close for projects not working properly
column7: Force close option is only working for one store within the overall project, then shows the project as force closed overall but it's really only force closed for one store, and there's no further actions available to take. This is the scenario as an example where we saw it happen (and Leire, you have the screen record of this happening when Shannon shared her screen at our last bi-weekly status call): *Went in to force close a project for a single store, Store 6308. See screenshot for list of projects we went in to force close; when i go to those projects in the Inbox, it let me force close the project for one store but not any of the others. The project now shows as force closed (see second screenshot attached), but it is only really force closed for one store. And when you go in to the project, you can see that it is still listed as overdue for 148 stores. And I am not iven any actions to perform aside from "Reset" - we don't normally use reset so we didn't select that to try to do anything with that. I waited a few daus from when that happened to see if it was a fluke, but it did the same thing again for another project on that list in the first screenshot. I force closed one store and now it won't let me take any further actions. (third screenshot for this second example)

column3: RTMxQWALKxREPORTING: submitted SW is not visible in reports
column7:
Issue details: similar issue as in Case #18869758
Environment: PROD Issue details: Storewalk "Evakuācijas izejas un ejas" - no answers are visible in reporting "Performance analysis report" and responses in project are in double.
Expectation: all responses are visible in Performance analysis report and responses are not double when viewing project
Replication steps: 
1. Login to PROD as Administrators - Formātu procesu attīstības daļa 
2. Open RTM Project Inbox and find project "APTAUJA: Evakuācijas durvis un evakuācijas ejas veikalos"
3. Project has storewalk "Evakuācijas izejas un ejas" as task completion survey 
4. Now scroll down and select "View responses" in Task Store Walk section 
5. Observe that it has responses in double and it is not possible to view attachments for Q1 and Q2
6. Now switch to R095 as Store director. 
7. Filter Completed projects and find same project
8. Hit "eye" icon to open project summary 
9. Scroll down to summary and select "View responses" in Task Store Walk section 
10. Observe that there are responses to all questions and it is possible to view attachments for Q1 and Q2
Video attached. Please fix this ASAP as we need to provide reports to management.
column11: If any questions are moved from one question group to another and the unwanted group is deleted, it was causing issues in the report. The responses were displaying against both groups. We have now fixed that issue.
column17:
If any questions are moved from one question group to another and the unwanted group is deleted, it was causing issues in the report. The responses were displaying against both groups. We have now fixed that issue.

We have resolved the report issue, and now the response won’t display multiple times against multiple groups. The fix will be part of the TASK-25.2.0.5 release. Please validate the report after deploying the release and let us know for any issues.
column21: We have resolved the report issue, and now the response won’t display multiple times against multiple groups. The fix will be part of the TASK-25.2.0.5 release. Please validate the report after deploying the release and let us know for any issues.

column3: Desktop myWork: Saving Project Summary as PDF
column7:
When saving a myWork project as a PDF, there are special characters in the PDF that do not appear in the project itself. I've attached a project that was saved as a PDF with a few characters appearing (questions marks appearing randomly) and I've also attached a screenshot of the same project as it appears in the tool, without those special characters.

Can you please look into this and see if it is possible to remove those special characters when saving a project as a PDF?
column11:
Not all copy/paste and characters are supported by the third party pdf library.
Looks like this notes were copied from some external tools like sharepoint, excel or some more Microsoft related products and some websites as well. There is some special character called as "zero width white space" which is added in notes.
As suggested by Rohit, please inform the customer to perform post launch edit, remove that line of text and type it again. Please avoid cut/copy and paste of same line, else those characters won't get removed.

This ticket is a deep dive into the overall reporting discrepancies & monitors to be put in place. KITS are heavily dependent on reporting data and they want to make sure it is always accurate.

column3: Task Approver Display Preference Not Populating for an Approver
column7: Hello! We have a Task Approver who's default display is not responding as we've set it. For Task Approver profile, I've updated the display preference to land on the messaging tab under MyWork (see preference set screenshot). It is working as expected for a few Task Approvers with Corp Admin status (see Correct_EmployeeeXX Ximage) For one Task Approver (see Issue_EmployeeXXX), it defaults to Project Inbox instead of Messaging. The only difference between employee 52340 and employee 26072 examples I've attached is that one is a "Corp Admin" and one is just "SSC". We DO NOT want to make employee 26072 a Corp Admin. Why is this issue happening? Shouldn't #26072 default to messaging tab anyway because he is a Task Approver? Please assist.
column17: Not an issue, KNL expected behavior.
column21: KNL expected behavior.
column24:
Hi [~PA1587] 

This is the expected KNL behavior.

Here, the landing page will be picked in the order in which the profile is defined. It looks for a landing page from the first profile (ex: HR) if not found it'll try to find it in the next profile (ex: APPROVER ) so on.

for ex :  

"profileIds" : [
        "HR",    --> if the landing page is defined. it'll consider. else it'll try to look next profle.
        "APPROVER", -> If landing page found. it'll land page here itself. it won't look for next profile.
        "CREATOR"
    ],

cc : [~AJ8037]

column3: Projects with feedback surveys won't complete
column7:
Good afternoon,
A store brought an issue to our attention.  We have a project come out on Fridays called "Out of Stock - Store Survey and Reporting".  The manager stated that the system wouldn't let her complete the project after inputting her answers.  I remoted in and watch her do it and sure enough, when she clicked on the submit button nothing happened.  I then noticed that the Project Visible dates at the top left of the screen were showing "06/6/2024 to 06/13/2024".  I had her refresh her browser, once refreshed the dates changed to "06/07/2024 to 06/14/2024".  She tried it again and was able to complete the project just fine after entering the same numbers.  I think this would happen for any project that has feedback questions.  For some reason this calendar isn't changing at midnight when the system is logged in overnight.  I believe this may also be causing the issue with projects not arriving correctly (case 18340392).  Can't this date automatically change at midnight?
Thank you,
Jesse Vernon

Author: Vishal Kulkarni

column3: Project date and time in inconsistent in Fresh food code checks
column7:
Project type: Fresh food code checks
Project: Fresh food code checks

This project should be available over two days, starting at 9:30am and ending at 10am the following day. Please see screenshot 'Fresh food code checks'

However I have noticed there are 50 stores within this project, who show the end time of 11:59pm. Please see the attached excel report which was pulled from the project dated 18/07/2024

Please see screenshot 'Fresh food code checks - 3731' for an example of one store, their dates show the task is live until 11:59pm on the 19th July, however the master project is set for it to end at 10am on the 19th.

Please can this be looked into.
column11:
Changes added will have an impact in the following scenarios
1. Repeating child project generation
2. Project launch preprocessor job (project launch.).

The impact is for project types having working days and time-sensitive property enabled.
column17: This issue occurred because both collect working days and time-sensitive properties were enabled for the reported project type. Ideally, both these properties can't be enabled simultaneously for project types. In the RTM16 16.10 version, we used to allow both these properties to be enabled at a time but from 16.11 we don't allow it. This issue is there for clients who migrated directly from 16.10 to v17.
column21: We have added code changes to handle specific to this case. If the project is repeating child and both collect working days and time-sensitive properties were enabled for the project type then the end date will have timing as per master project's end date.

column3: Error in Project Summary PDF versus Project Notes
column7: Hello, there are a few projects that have been showing question marks at the end of some sentences in the exported project summary PDF, however in the notes, it is normal and no question marks present. Why does this glitch happen with the PDF? Please see attached for examples.
column11:
Not all copy/paste and characters are supported by the third party pdf library.
Looks like this notes were copied from some external tools like sharepoint, excel or some more Microsoft related products and some websites as well. There is some special character called as "zero width white space" which is added in notes.
As suggested by Rohit, please inform the customer to perform post launch edit, remove that line of text and type it again. Please avoid cut/copy and paste of same line, else those characters won't get removed.
column17:
Not all copy/paste and characters are supported by the third party pdf library.
Looks like this notes were copied from some external tools like sharepoint, excel or some more Microsoft related products and some websites as well. There is some special character called as "zero width white space" which is added in notes.
As suggested by Rohit, please inform the customer to perform post launch edit, remove that line of text and type it again. Please avoid cut/copy and paste of same line, else those characters won't get removed.

Rubi Deb:
Please review Rohit's analysis. As mentioned, not all copy/paste and characters are supported by the third party pdf libraries.
Looks like this notes were copied from some external tools like sharepoint, excel or some more Microsoft related products and some websites as well. There is some special character called as "zero width white space" which is added in notes.
As suggested by Rohit, please inform the customer to perform post launch edit, remove that line of text and type it again. Please avoid cut/copy and paste of same line, else those characters won't get removed.

There will be no further action from L3.

CC:Shilpa PandeyGaurang RedkerUmakanth Maddirala

column11:
"Allow Group Owner to Start Walk" Walk feature will work when you give Schedule Permission to Group Owner.

If no Schedule Permission is given to Group Owner, in this case only Walk Owner will be able to Start the Group Walk (using Adhoc My Walk Tab).

 

Note: To allow Group Owners to Start Walk then please do below activity:

Update the Walk Template and Add Schedule Permission to one or more Group Owners (whom you want to start the Walk)
Update Schedule Tab to include Schedule Type
Publish the Walk Template
Login with Group Owner and go to Walk for Others to schedule the Group Walk
Schedule the mentioned Walk and then you would see group Owner can start the Walk from My Walk Tab.
column17: Group Owners did not have Schedule Permission to start Group Walk.
column21:

column3: ORG: Device Status Report (Case #16141395)
column7:
/Data should be populating but if you see any further discrepancy then please create a new case with details that we can investigate accordingly./
Issue details: Device Status report does not show neither username nor user last login time in PROD. Report works fine in PrePROD
Expectation: all data is visible in report regardless of system environment
Affected users: Admins
Replication steps:
1. Login to PROD
Administrators - Formātu procesu attīstības daļa
2. Open ORG -> Device Status report
3. Observe report does not show neither username nor user last login time in PROD.
4. Now open MyWork on mobility and select "Clear data"
5. Scan PROD QR code and login to PROD.
6. Now open Device Status report again
7. Observe that device was added to list but neither username nor user last login time is shown.
All images available in previous case Case #16141395
column11: In SAML authentication, applicationId and appVersionNo are now being forwarded to the IDP in case "samlAuthUrlRedirectWithUrlParams" is true.
column17: "samlAuthUrlRedirectWithUrlParams" is not set as true. In SAML authentication, applicationId and appVersionNo were not being forwarded to the IDP even when it was true
column21: Set samlAuthUrlRedirectWithUrlParams as true through domain import and Code fix (Extracted applicationId and appVersionNo from the request and in case they are not null, added to the postParams)

column3: Walk on mobile - Issue when photos are attached to questions
column7:
Good afternoon,
Today while doing an inspection with one of our field users, I noticed there is an issue when there is a photo attached to a walk question.  When you are answering the questions in the section that includes an attached photo, the screen moves down and then back up.  This happens each time you answer a question in that section.  Once you move onto a new section that doesn't have any attached photos, the issue doesn't happen.  If you would like to test, the walk named "New Store Checklist - v0.0.3" is the one I noticed it on.  This is only happening on Mobile.
Thank you,
Jesse Vernon
column17:
User sees a momentary flickering of the screen when a photo is attached. 
There is no impact on functionality.
column21: Code fix has been done to stop flickering the image
column24:
I checked this issue on the latest Walk (v2025.1.0) application and found that the functionality is now working fine.

The user is now able to attach images and browser through the questions containing images without any screen flicker. The images are uploaded smoothly and the user can browse through the questionnaire without any issue.

PFA the video snippet.

Closing this ticket.

column3: Project reading force closed incorrectly and we are now unable to edit
column7:
Good morning, we are seeing an issue with a project where on 7/19 I force closed a single store out of 268 from the project. I've attached the project summary for your reference as well as some screenshots that show the following:

	I completed a single store force close for store 2251 on 7/19. Now when I go back to the project to make another edit it shows as over all force closed and I cannot edit or make any changes.
	The other stores are still live. I went a checked a store who's listed as Not Started (store 0511) and they still have the project in their queue.
Why is this happening like this? Is it a glitch? How can it be updated so I can continue to monitor and update the project for the remaining 267 stores as needed?

  • Verify that launched project should be visible in "Field View Execution Metrics" reports.
  • Verify that user should be able to take post launch action as recall on created simple project from project inbox.
  • Verify that once the project is recalled, project status should get changed as recalled in inbox.
  • Verify that project should not be shown in reports once recalled.
  • Verify that other post launch actions such as edit, complete, force close action should get updated correctly in inbox and Field View Execution Metrics reports.

 

Author: Vaishnavi Dalu

column3: Reflexis -  MPREIS WARENVERTRIEBS GMBH - can't  sign & send walks | 18586168
column7:
Dear team,

we have another issue with walks. I have filmed the error (1 Minute, 200 MB), if you are interested. Here is my description of the event (walk name was Revisionscheck 1.07):

We conduct a walk.
1. png shows the end of the walk with "sign and send". 
Notice that the completion bar is at 66% (top left corner).

2.png shows an error that questions have not been entered.
This is wrong. E.g., question 1 enables or skips all further questions. No actions are possible.

HOWEVER, when we close the walk, open it through the main menu (3.png) in read only mode (4.png), click through all questions again without entering any information, all missing data suddenly appears. 

Best
Patrick

Author: Shilpa Pandey

column3: Desktop myWork: When Editing Project, Unable to Use Backspace Key
column7: After a project has launched, when going in to edit the project, you are unable to utilize the backspace key when editing in the notes section. I've attached a video of the issue in a dummy project in Pre Production, however, I was alerted to this issue first in Production.
column11:
Notes component on post launch edit was changed to better handle backspacing for project notes, task notes, simple project notes. 
Impacted features -
Post launch edit of project notes, task notes when backspace or delete button is used to delete certain section of notes.

Control-z will also be impacted. Once user 'backspace' or 'delete' a line, we will lose the entire change history on ckeditor, so it wont be possible to undo a change, need to be done manually by breaking line again.
column17: CKeditor handling for backspace for line breaks when track changes is enabled is different from how we expect it to work on our app
column21: Adapted track changes to handle backspace for line breaks as expected of our app.
column24:
Issue: working fine.

Software version: TASK-25.7.0.6

Url: [https://mwdryrun05qa.reflexisinc.com/kernel/views/authenticate/W/APPRL.view]

Credentials: SYSADMIN

Steps:

*Scenarios:*
 * Verify the user is able to add text in notes 
 * Verify the user is able to delete or clear the space with the help of backspace key 
 * Verify the user is able to add new notes in post launch edit 
 * Verify the track edit is properly showing the deleted text and elements
 * Verify the same on watchout notes 
 * Verify the same on Task notes and overview notes
 * Verify the same on Plan Notes

As per above comments, 
 * When we need to merge two existing lines together the change history is being lost and the 'undo' functionality looses all it history. On all other scenarios it will work as it worked before. 

PFA:

[^Backspace_is working.mp4]

Hence closing this issue.

column3: RTMxQWALK: wrong end date for Schedule Walk notification
column7:
Issue details: Schedule Walk Notification has due date that is different from Schedule settings and End date that is visible in Key Details.
Expectation: Due date matches walk end date.
Impacted users: all store users 
Replication steps: 
1. Login to PROD 
2. Configure Repeating Schedule for Walk template In our case - walk "Sajūtu vizīte" in category "Aptaujas" has schedule for 2 roles (see attachment). 
3. Now switch to store that has this walk and schedule enabled In our case - R560 
4. Find Schedule Walk Notification 
5. Open this notification and observe that Due date is 15.07.2024 but Walk End date is 09.07.2024
Screenshots attached.
column11: Verify issue with steps mentioned in original issue.
column17: Code error logic while calculating the endDate using same method to calculate the next schedule date.
column21: Code fix
column24:
I checked this issue once against based on Sunit's comments and I found that the functionality is working fine (and is consistent with v16) as of now for all the generated walks.

I configured three different types of walks as mentioned in my comments above and the behavior is consistent with the two walk generating triggers (application and conduit) mentioned in Sunit's comments.

Closing this ticket.

Some open concerns about walk end date calculations are being addressed under TM-50277.

column11: Issue: date format in walk scheduled notification for store is incorrect. Stores see start and end dates as MM/DD/YYYY, it should appear in DD/MM/YYYY format.
column17:
As we do not store history records for Domain Attributes, we would not know why some Templates had correct date format.

This may happen if correct value was stored in Domain Attributes Collection and later was deleted due to some upgrade.

Engg team does not give insert/update scripts for Domain specific records.

Author: Vishal Kulkarni

column3: Issue related to 18932501
column7:
Issue identified where the violation task start date may have discrepancies between the core system and reporting for the below 3 walks. This was caused by the utility that syncs the data from core system to reporting database. Effected instances below



WALK_1358876 : 2024-03-11 16:12:20

WALK_1426109 : 2024-05-27 10:08:16

WALK_1462008 : 2024-07-01 22:13:29
column11:
Impact Description :

Issue : Violation Start Date/End Date is calculated incorrectly when Form Recovery Tool is used to correct Walk Instance Data.

Root Cause :

-Violation Task Start Date is calculated using Calendar.getTime() which is correct as it assumes Violation should start as soon as Walk Instance is submitted.
-However when using Form Recovery Tool as Walk Instance record is processed at a later date, this creates a data issue as Violation Start Date cannot be the same as current date.

Corrective Action :
-To Fix this issue, we are now using Walk Submit Date from WalkScheduleInfo record to properly calculate Violation Task Start/End Date.

Impact Area : Violation Task Start/End Date in RAR reports.
column17:
Violation Task Start Date is calculated using Calendar.getTime() which is correct as it assumes Violation should start as soon as Walk Instance is submitted.
-However when using Form Recovery Tool as Walk Instance record is processed at a later date, this creates a data issue as Violation Start Date cannot be the same as current date.
column21: To Fix this issue, we are now using Walk Submit Date from WalkScheduleInfo record to properly calculate Violation Task Start/End Date.
column24:
Impact Description :

Issue : Violation Start Date/End Date is calculated incorrectly when Form Recovery Tool is used to correct Walk Instance Data.

Root Cause :

-Violation Task Start Date is calculated using Calendar.getTime() which is correct as it assumes Violation should start as soon as Walk Instance is submitted.
-However when using Form Recovery Tool as Walk Instance record is processed at a later date, this creates a data issue as Violation Start Date cannot be the same as current date.

Corrective Action :
-To Fix this issue, we are now using Walk Submit Date from WalkScheduleInfo record to properly calculate Violation Task Start/End Date.

Impact Area : Violation Task Start/End Date in RAR reports.

 

Note : As per Kernel team suggestion, we are sending only nodeToken parameter in cases where authToken is not available (Form Recovery Tool case) for kernel/pulse/unit/infotype.json Kernel API.

As per dev testing, it is now working fine.

 

CC:[~NP5386] [~AJ8037] [~PK3866]
column25:
Impact Description :

Issue : Violation Start Date/End Date is calculated incorrectly when Form Recovery Tool is used to correct Walk Instance Data.

Root Cause :

-Violation Task Start Date is calculated using Calendar.getTime() which is correct as it assumes Violation should start as soon as Walk Instance is submitted.
-However when using Form Recovery Tool as Walk Instance record is processed at a later date, this creates a data issue as Violation Start Date cannot be the same as current date.

Corrective Action :
-To Fix this issue, we are now using Walk Submit Date from WalkScheduleInfo record to properly calculate Violation Task Start/End Date.

Impact Area : Violation Task Start/End Date in RAR reports.

 

Note : As per Kernel team suggestion, we are sending only nodeToken parameter in cases where authToken is not available (Form Recovery Tool case) for kernel/pulse/unit/infotype.json Kernel API.

As per dev testing, it is now working fine.

 

CC:Nilesh Pawar Ankit Jain Prasad Kalyanapu

column3: PDF version of project showing deleted attachment
column7: Once post launch changes been made to a project, PDF version still shows old attachment
column11:
- Project attachments in the PDF Export and Print PDF.
- Deleted attachments in post-launch edits should not be visible in PDF Export.
column17:
- The issue occurred when attachments were deleted in the post-launch edit and changes were applied.
- Old attachments are not hard deleted in the backend and are marked as "D" and such attachments were also passed in the context to projectSummary.html
column21: We are filtering out attachments with "D" status for  export PDF before passing the context to projectSummary.html
